K01bhivin_u:5: bhagavān samyaksambuddho yadarthaṃ samudāgato tadartham abhisambhāvayitvā śākyeṣu
K01bhivin_u:6: viharati śākyānāṃ kapilavastusmin nyagrodhārāme śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyānāñ ca buddho
K01bhivin_u:7: bhagavān satkṛtogurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito arcito apacāyito lābhāgrayaśo-'graprāpto
K01bhivin_u:9: tatra cānupalipto padmam iva jalena puṇyabhāgīyān satvān puṇyehi niveśayamāno phalabhāgīyān
K01bhivin_u:10: satvān phalehi pratiṣṭhāpayamāno vāsanābhāgīyān satvān vāsanāyām avasthāpayamāno
K01bhivin_u:11: amṛtam analpakena devamanuṣyān samvibhajanto prāṇikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇy amṛtaṃ
K01bhivin_u:13: kṣeme śive same sthale abhaye nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayamāno āvarjayitvā aṅgamagadhavṛjimallikāśikośalakurupañcālacedivatsamatsyaśūrasenaśividaśārṇa cāsvakiavanti /
K01bhivin_u:14: jñāne dṛṣṭaparākramo svayāṃbhūḥ divyehi vihārehi viharanto brāhmehi vihārehi āryehi
K01bhivin_u:15: vihārehi aniñjehi vihārehi viharanto brāhmehi vihārehi āryehi vihārehi aniñjehi vihārehi
K01bhivin_u:16: sātatye hi vihārehi buddho buddhavihārehi jino jinavihārehi jānako jānakavihārehi
K01bhivin_u:17: sarvajño sarvajñavihārehi cetovasiparamapāramipraptāś ca punar buddhā bhagavanto
K01bhivin_u:18: yehi yehi vihārehi ākāṅkṣanti tehi tehi vihārehi viharanti vihārakuśalāś ca punar
K01bhivin_u:20: 2. atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī cchandāya cchandakapālāya dāsacchandāye cchandakamātare
K01bhivin_u:21: ca pañcahi ca śākiyānīśatehi sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ
K01bhivin_u:22: pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi ekāntasthitā mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavantam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:24: bhagavāṃs caitarhi loke utpanno tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho dharmo ca deśayati aupasamiko pārinivāṇiko sugatapravedito amṛtasya prāptaye nirvāṇasya sākṣātkriyāya samvartati /
K01bhivin_u:25: sādhu bhagavan mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadaṃ bhikṣuṇibhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:27: mā te gautami rocatu tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadā bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
K01bhivin_u:29: na khalu bhagavān mātṛgrāmasya avakāśaṃ karoti tathāgata pravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvāyeti /
K01bhivin_u:30: sā bhagavato pādau śirasā vanditvā sārdhaṃ cchandāya cchandakapālāye dāsacchandāye cchandakamātare ca yena tāni pañca śākiyānīśatāni tenopasaṃkramitvā śākiyānīyo etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:31: na khalu āryamiśrikāyo bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāupasaṃpadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvāya /
K01bhivin_u:32: kim puna vayam āryamiśrikāyo sāmam eva keśān otārayitvā kāṣāyāni vastrāṇi ācchādayitvā
K01bhivin_u:33: kośakābaddhehi yānehi bhagavantaṃ kośalehi janapadehi cārikāṃ caramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭhimena pṛṣṭhim ābandhema /
K01bhivin_u:34: sace mo bhagavān anujāniṣyati pravrajiṣyāmo no ca anujāniṣyati evam tu tāyi bhagavato
K01bhivin_u:35: santike brahmacaryañ cariṣyāmaḥ sādhu āryeti tāyo śākiyānīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye pratyāśrauṣi /
K01bhivin_u:36: 3. atha khalu bhagavān kapilavastusmin nagare yathābhiramyaṃ viharitvā kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmi /
K01bhivin_u:37: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī sārdhaṃ cchandāye cchandakapalāye dāsacchandāya
K01bhivin_u:38: cchandakamātare ca pañcahi ca śākiyānīśatehi sātmaneva keśān otārayitvā kāṣāyāṇi
K01bhivin_u:39: vastrāṇi ācchādayitvā kośakabaddhehi yānehi bhagavantaṃ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ
K01bhivin_u:41: 4. atha khalu bhagavān kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caramāno mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcahi bhikṣuśatehi yena kośalānāṃ śrāvastīnagaraṃ tad avasāri /
K01bhivin_u:42: tad anuprāptas tatraiva viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
K01bhivin_u:43: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi /
K01bhivin_u:44: ekāntasthitā mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavantam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:46: bhagavāṃś caitarhi loke utpanno tathāgato rhaṃ samyaksambuddho dharmo ca deśate aupasamiko ca pārinirvāṇiko sugatapravedito amṛtasya prāptaye nirvāṇasya sākṣātkriyāya samvartati /
K01bhivin_u:47: sādhu bhagavan mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:48: evam ukte bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:49: mā te gautamī rocatu mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāupasampadābhikṣuṇibhāvo /
K01bhivin_u:51: na khalu bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāya upasampadāya bhikṣuṇibhāvasyeti /
K01bhivin_u:52: sā bhagavato pādāṃ śirasā vanditvā jetavanasya ārāmadvārakoṣṭhakasamīpe rodamānī asthāsi pādāṇguṣṭhena bhūmiṃ vilikhantī /
K01bhivin_u:53: addaśāśi khu anyataro bhikṣur mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ jetavanasya ārāmadvārakoṣṭhasamīpe
K01bhivin_u:54: rudamānīn tiṣṭhantīṃ pādāṅguṣṭhena bhūmiṃ vilikhentīṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar yenāyuṣmān
K01bhivin_u:55: ānando tenopasaṃkramitvā āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:56: eṣā āyuṣman ānanda mahāprajāpatī gautamī jetavanasya ārāmakoṣṭhakasamīpe rudamānī tiṣṭhati pādāṅguṣṭhena bhūmiṃ vilikhantī /
K01bhivin_u:57: gacchāvusānanda jānehi kiṃ mahāprapatī gautamī rodīti /
K01bhivin_u:58: 6. atha khalu āyuṣmān ānando yena mahāprajāpatī gautamī tenopasaṃkramitvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:60: evam ukte mahāprajāpatī gautamī āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:61: alam me āryānanda ruṇṇena yatra hi nāma evaṃ durlabho buddhotpādo evaṃ durlabhā saddharmadeśanā /
K01bhivin_u:62: bhagavāṃś caitarhi loke utpanno tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho dharmo deśīyati aupasamiko pārinirvāṇiko sugatapravedito amṛtasya prāptaye nirvāṇasya sākṣātkriyāyai samvartati /
K01bhivin_u:63: na ca bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāyopasampadāya
K01bhivin_u:64: bhikṣuṇībhāvasya ścai sādhu tāvāryānanda bhagavantaṃ yāca yathā labheya mātṛgrāmo
K01bhivin_u:65: pi tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:66: 7. sādhu gautamīti āyuṣmān ānando mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye pratiśrutvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādauśirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi /
K01bhivin_u:67: ekāntasthito āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat durlabho bhagavan buddhotpādo
K01bhivin_u:68: durlabhā saddharmadeśanā bhagavān cetarhi loke utpanno tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho
K01bhivin_u:69: dharmo ca deśyate aupasamiko pārinirvāṇiko sugatapravedito amṛtasya prāptaye nirvāṇasya
K01bhivin_u:71: sādhu bhagavan mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upadampadāṃ bhikṣuṇibhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:72: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:73: mā te gautamīmātā rocatu mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadā bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
K01bhivin_u:75: bhagavān nāvakaśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgata pravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāupasaṃpadāye bhikṣuṇībhāvasyeti /
K01bhivin_u:76: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā yena mahāprajāpati gautamī tenopasaṃkramitvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:77: na khalu gautamī bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāyopasaṃpadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvāya /
K01bhivin_u:78: evam ukte mahāprajāpatī gautamī āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:79: sādhu tāvāryānanda dvitīyaṃ pi bhagavantaṃ yāca yathā mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāṃ upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ
K01bhivin_u:80: sādhu gautamīti āyuṣmān ānando dvitīyaṃ pi mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye pratiśrutvā yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi /
K01bhivin_u:81: ekānte sthito āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:82: durlabho bhagavan buddhotpādo ti tad evaṃ sarvaṃ yāva bhikṣuṇībhāvo ti evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:83: māte gautamī mātā rocatu mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyā upasaṃpadā bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
K01bhivin_u:84: saṃyathāpi nāmānanda sampanne yavakaraṇe ca kāraṇḍavaṃ nāma rogarājā ti upanipateya
K01bhivin_u:85: evan taṃ sampannaṃ yavakaraṇaṃ mahatā upakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ bhavati evam eva gautamī
K01bhivin_u:86: mātā yasmin prāvacane mātṛgrāmo pi labhati pravrajyām upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ
K01bhivin_u:87: evan taṃ prāvacanaṃ mahatāmupakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:88: sayyathāpi nāma gautamī mātā sampanne ikṣukaraṇe mañjiṣṭhā nāma rogarājā ti evan taṃ sampannaṃ ikṣukaraṇam mahatā upakleśena upakliṣṭam bhavati
K01bhivin_u:89: evam eva gautamī mātā yasmin prāvacane mātṛgrāmo pi labhati pravrajyām upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ evan taṃ prāvacanam mahatā upakleśena upakliṣṭam bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:90: sayyathāpi nāma mā te gautamī mātā rocatu mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadā bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
K01bhivin_u:92: bhagavān nā vakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāyopasaṃpadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvasyeti /
K01bhivin_u:93: yena mahāprajāpatī gautamī tenopasaṃkramitvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:94: na khalu gautamī bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāyopasaṃpadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvasyeti /
K01bhivin_u:95: evam ukte mahāprajāpatī gautamī āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:96: sādhu tāvāryānanda tṛtīyaṃ pi bhagavantaṃ yāca yathā mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ
K01bhivin_u:97: sādhu gautamītī āyuṣmān ānando tṛtīyaṃ pi mahāprajāpatīya gautamīya pratiśrutvā yena
K01bhivin_u:98: bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣīdi ekāntaniṣaṇṇo
K01bhivin_u:100: purimakānāṃ bhagavan tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ kati parṣāyo abhuvan /
K01bhivin_u:101: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:102: purimakānām ānanda tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ catvāri pariṣāyo abhuvan sayyathīdaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:104: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:105: ye ime bhagavan catvāro śrāmaṇyaphalā sayyathīdaṃ śrotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam agraphalam arhatvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:106: bhavyo eteṣāṃ mātṛgrāmo pi eko 'pramatto ātāpi vyupakṛṣṭo viharanto sākṣīkartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:107: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:108: yānīmāni ānanda catvāri śrāmaṇyaphalāni sayyathīdaṃ śrotaāpattiphalaṃ yāvad agraphalam arhatvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:109: bhavyo eteṣāṃ matṛgrāmo pi eko 'pramatto ātāpi vyupakṛṣṭo viharanto sākṣīkartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:110: 10. evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:111: yato khalu bhagavan purimakānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ catvāro parṣāyo abhūṃsuḥ bhikṣubhikṣuṇī upāsakopāsikā /
K01bhivin_u:114: bhavyo eteṣāṃ mātṛgrāmo pi eko apramatto ātāpi vyupakṛṣṭo viharanto sākṣīkartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:115: sādhu bhagavan mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:116: duṣkarakārikā ca bhagavato mahāprajāpatī gautamī āpāyikā poṣikā janetrīye kālagatāye stanyasya dāyikā bhagavāṃś ca kṛtajño kṛtavedī /
K01bhivin_u:117: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:118: evam etad ānanda duṣkarakārikā ānanda tathāgatasya mahāprajāpatī gautamī āpāyikā poṣikā janetriye kālagatāye stanyasya dāyikā tathāgato ca kṛtajño kṛtavedī ca /
K01bhivin_u:119: api cānanda tathāgato pi mahāprajāpatīya gautamīya duṣkarakārako /
K01bhivin_u:120: tathāgataṃ hy ānandāāgamya mahāprajāpatī gautamī buddhaśaraṇaṃ gatā /
K01bhivin_u:122: saṃghaśaraṇaṃ gatā tathāgataṃ hy ānandāgamya mahāprajāpatī gautamī
K01bhivin_u:128: tathāgataṃ hy ānandāgamya mahāprajāpatī gautamī śraddhayā vardhati /
K01bhivin_u:129: śīlena vardhati śrutena vardhati tyāgena vardhati /
K01bhivin_u:131: tathāgataṃ hy ānandāgamya mahāprajāpatī gautamī duḥkhaṃ jānāti samudayaṃ jānāti /
K01bhivin_u:134: 11. yaṃ ānanda pudgalo pudgalam āgamya buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati /
K01bhivin_u:137: iminā ānanda pudgalena imasya pudgalasya na supratikaraṇaṃ bhavati yāvajjīvaṃ pi na upasthiheya yad uta cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārehi
K01bhivin_u:139: yaṃ ānanda pudgalo pudgalam āgamya yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātāto prativiramati /
K01bhivin_u:144: iminā pudgalena imasya pudgalasya na supratikaraṃ bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:148: yaṃ ānanda pudgalo pudgalam āgamya śraddhayā vardhati śīlena śrutena tyāgena prajñayā vardhati /
K01bhivin_u:149: iminānanda pudgalena imasya pudgalasya na supratikaraṃ bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:150: yāvajjīvaṃ pi na upasthiheya yad uta cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārehi /
K01bhivin_u:151: evaṃ pi se na supratikāram bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:152: yaṃ ānanda pudgalo pudgalam āgamya duḥkhaṃ jānāti samudayaṃ jānāti nirodhañ jānāti mārgañ ca jānāti /
K01bhivin_u:153: iminā ānanda pudgalena imasya pudgalasya na supratikāram bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:154: yāvajjīvaṃ pi na upasthiheya yad uta cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārehi /
K01bhivin_u:155: evaṃ pi se na supratikaram bhavati //
K01bhivin_u:157: sace khalu aham ānandasya gautamasya putrasya yāvattṛtīyakaṃ api prativahiṣyāmi bhaviṣyati ca se cittasyānyathātvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:158: śrutā pi se dharmā sammohaṃ gamiṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:159: kāmaṃ varṣasahasraṃ pi me saddharmo sthāsyati /
K01bhivin_u:160: mā haivānandasya gautamīputrasya bhavatu cittasyānyathātvaṃ mā pi se śrutā dharmā sammoṣaṅ gacchantu /
K01bhivin_u:161: kāmaṃ pañcāpi me varṣaśatāni saddharmo sthāsyati /
K01bhivin_u:162: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayati sma /
K01bhivin_u:163: sayyathāpi nāmānanda iha puruṣo parvatasaṃkṣepe setuṃ bandheya yāvad eva vārisya
K01bhivin_u:164: anatikramaṇāya evam evānanda tathāgato bhikṣuṇīnām aṣṭa gurudharmān prajñāpeti ye
K01bhivin_u:165: bhikṣunīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā anatikramaṇīyā
K01bhivin_u:170: 13. varṣaśato pasampannāye ānanda bhikṣuṇīye tadahopasampannasya bhikṣusya śirasā pādā vanditavyā /
K01bhivin_u:171: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ prathamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣūṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāva anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa //
K01bhivin_u:173: aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇī deśitāśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye ubhayato saṃghe upasampadā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:174: ayam ānanda dvitīyo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo yāva velā iva samudreṇa //
K01bhivin_u:176: āvaḍḍo ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhikṣuṣu vacanapatho bhūtena vā abhūtena vā anāvaḍḍo bhikṣusya bhikṣuṇīṣu vacanapatho bhūtena no abhūtena /
K01bhivin_u:177: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ tṛtīyo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo vistareṇa //
K01bhivin_u:179: bhaktāgraṃ śayyāsanaṃ vihāro ca bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣuto sādayitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:180: ayam ānanda caturtho gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo vistareṇa //
K01bhivin_u:182: gurudharmāpannāye ānanda bhikṣuṇīye ardhamāsam bhikṣuṇīsaṃghe mānatvaṃ yācitavyaṃ ubhayato saṃghe ca āhvayanaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:183: ayam ānanda paṇcamo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo vistareṇa //
K01bhivin_u:186: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnām ṣaṣṭho gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo vistareṇa /
K01bhivin_u:188: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi abhikṣuke āvāse varṣām upagantuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:189: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ saptamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo vistareṇa //
K01bhivin_u:191: varṣoṣitāhi ānanda bhikṣuṇīhi ubhayatosaṃghe pravāraṇā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:192: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ aṣṭamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyo pūjayitavyo anatikramaṇīyo velā iva samudreṇa /
K01bhivin_u:193: ime ānanda bhikṣuṇīnām aṣṭau gurudharmā ye bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā anatikramaṇīyā velā iva samudreṇa
K01bhivin_u:194: 14. sace nāmānanda mahāprajāpatī gautamī imān aṣṭa gurudharmān pratīcchati catuhi ca patanīyehi dharmehi anadhyācārāya śikṣāṃ śikṣati /
K01bhivin_u:197: sādhu bhagavann iti āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā yena mahāprajāpatī gautamī tenopasaṃkramitvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:199: sayyathāpi nāma gautamī iha puruṣa parvatasaṃkṣepe setuṃ bandheya yāvad eva vāriṣya
K01bhivin_u:200: anatikramaṇāya evam eva gautamī bhagavān bhikṣuṇīnāṃ aṣṭagurudharmān prajñāpeti ye
K01bhivin_u:201: bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā anatikramaṇīyā
K01bhivin_u:203: 15. katame 'ṣṭa / varṣaśatopasampannāya gautamī bhikṣuṇīya tadahopasampannasya bhikṣusya pādā śirasā vanditavyā /
K01bhivin_u:204: ayaṃ gautamī bhikṣuṇīnām prathamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yo anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva samudreṇa /
K01bhivin_u:207: yāva sace khu tvaṃ gautamī imān aṣṭa gurudharmān pratīcchasi catuhi ca patanīyehi dharmehi anadhyācārāya śikṣāṃ śikṣasi /
K01bhivin_u:208: eṣā eva te adyadagreṇa pravrajyā eṣā upasampadā eṣa bhikṣuṇībhāvo //
K01bhivin_u:209: 16. evam ukte mahāprajāpatī gautamī āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:210: sayyathāpi nāmānanda iha syāt yuvā puruṣo maṇḍanajātīyo śīrṣasnāto āhatavastranivastro
K01bhivin_u:211: utpalamālām vā campakamālām vā kumudamālām vā tṛṇamolikamālām vā śirasā pratīccheya
K01bhivin_u:212: evam evāham āryānanda imān aṣṭagurudharmān śirasā pratīcchāmi catuhi ca patanīyehi
K01bhivin_u:214: 17. atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī sārdhaṃ cchandāyi cchandakapālāye dāsacchandāye
K01bhivin_u:215: cchandakamātare ca pañcahi ca śākiyāniśatehi sārdhaṃ yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkramitvā
K01bhivin_u:216: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:218: tasmād iha bhave bhikṣuṇīyo adydagreṇa mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ saṃghasthavirāṃ saṃghamahattarīṃ saṃghathaviriṇā vikandhāvetha /
K01bhivin_u:219: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ praṇāmayitvā bhagavantam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:220: ye ime bhagavan bhikṣuṇīnāṃ aṣṭagurudharmā bhagavatā saṃkṣiptena bhāṣitā vistareṇa vibhaktā labhyā te 'smābhir vistareṇa śrotuṃ //
K01bhivin_u:224: kinti dānī gautamī varṣaśatopasampannāye bhikṣuṇīye tadahopasampannasya bhikṣusya abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalīkarma samīcīkarma kartavyaṃ
K01bhivin_u:226: yadāhaṃ varsaśatopasampannā bhaviṣyaṃ bhikṣu ca tad ahopasampanno bhaviṣyati tadāham abhivādanavandanapratyutthānamañjalīkarma sāmīcikarma kariṣyaṃ
K01bhivin_u:227: 20. atha khalu sarvāhi bhikṣuṇīhi sthavirīhi vā navāhi vā madhyamāhi vā sarveṣāṃ
K01bhivin_u:228: bhikṣūṇām stherāṇāṃ navānāṃ madhyamānāṃ abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalīkarma sāmīcikarma kartavyaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:229: ete dāni bhikṣū bhikṣūṇīupāśrayaṃ praviṣṭā bhavanti /
K01bhivin_u:230: sarvāhi bhikṣuṇīhi stherīhi vā navāhi vā madhyamāhi vā sarveṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ stherāṇāṃ navānāñ ca madhyamānām abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalīkarma sāmīcīkarma kartavyaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:231: 21. atha dāni bhikṣuṇī jarādurbalā vā bhavati vyādhidurbalā vā yattakānāṃ abhisaṃbhuṇoti tattakānāṃ pādā śirasā vanditavyā /
K01bhivin_u:234: etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuvihāraṃ nirdhāvanti sarvāhi bhikṣuṇīhi stherīhi vā navāhi vā madhyamāhi vā sarveṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ therāṇāṃ navānāṃ madhyamānāṃ pādā śirasā vanditavyā /
K01bhivin_u:235: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī jarādurbalā bhavati vyādhidurbalā vā yattakānām abhisaṃbhuṇoti tattakānāṃ pādā śirasā vanditavyā śiṣṭakānāṃ mūrdhni añjalīṃ kṛtvā vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:237: 22. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya paribhavanena koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā ḍhossabhikṣū ti
K01bhivin_u:238: vā kṛtvā vaidyabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā akhallamahalle ti vā akuśalo ti vā apratikṛtijño
K01bhivin_u:239: ti vā kṛtvā na śirasā pādān vandati gurudharmam atikrāmati /
K01bhivin_u:240: evaṃ gautamī varṣaśatopasampannāye bhikṣuṇīye tadahopasampannasya bhikṣusya śirasā vanditavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:241: ayaṃ gautamī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ prathamo gurudharmo yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyo pūjayitavyo anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva samudreṇa //
K01bhivin_u:243: 23. kinti dāni gautamī aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dvevarṣāṇi śikṣitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye ubhayatosaṃghe upasampadā pratyāsaṃsitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:244: yā dāni eṣā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā bhavati tāye bhikṣuṇīsaṃghe dvevarṣāṇī śikṣādeśanāsaṃmuti yācitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:247: iyam itthannāmā nāma aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:248: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ iyamnāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā saṃghaṃ dvevarṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ yāceyā /
K01bhivin_u:249: yāciṣyati āryamiśrikāyo saṃgho iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dvevarṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ /
K01bhivin_u:250: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:253: aham itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣāmi tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:254: sāhaṃ saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ yācāmi /
K01bhivin_u:255: sādhu vata me āryasaṃgho dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ detu /
K01bhivin_u:258: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ yācati /
K01bhivin_u:259: tasyā āryasaṃgho itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutin dadyāt /
K01bhivin_u:262: iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:263: seyaṃ saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ yācati /
K01bhivin_u:264: tasyā saṃgho itthan nāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutin deti /
K01bhivin_u:265: yasyā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇī śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ dīyamānāṃ saṃghena sā tūṣṇīm asya /
K01bhivin_u:267: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ pi tṛtīyaṃ pi dinnāmāryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiḥ saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:268: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:270: sarvabhikṣuṇīnān navikā sarvaśrāmaṇerīṇāṃ vṛddhā āsanaparyanto tāye sādayitavyo [1] /
K01bhivin_u:271: bhaktaparyanto tāye sādayitavyo [2] yvāguparyanto tāye sādayitavyo [3] yat tasyā
K01bhivin_u:272: 'miṣam akalpikam taṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āmiṣaṃ kalpikaṃ [4] yaṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āmiṣaṃ kalpikaṃ
K01bhivin_u:273: tasyā taṃ āmiṣaṃ akalpikaṃ [5] bhikṣuṇīyihi tasyāḥ tena parivartaśeyyā kartavyā [6]
K01bhivin_u:274: tāya pi śrāmaṇerīṇāṃ tena parivartakaśeyyā kartavyā [7] /
K01bhivin_u:275: bhikṣuṇīyihi sā pratigrāhaṇikā kārāpayitavyā sthāpayitvā agnikalpañ ca [8] /
K01bhivin_u:276: jātarūparajatañ ca [9] tāye pi śrāmaṇerīyo pratigrāhaṇikā kārāpayitavyāyo [10] /
K01bhivin_u:277: 27. na kṣamati tāye poṣadho vā pravāraṇā vā abhisaṃbhuṇituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:278: atha khalu yadā poṣadho vā pravāraṇā vā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:279: tadaho tāyi vṛddhāntam āruhya mūrdhni añjaliṃ kṛtvā vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:282: vandāmi āryāyo viśuddhāṃ dhārayetha trīṇi vārāṃ jalpīya gantavyaṃ [11] na kṣamati sā prātimokṣasūtraṃ śrāvayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:283: atha khalu yattakaṃ pāriyati padaphalakāye grāhayituṃ tattakaṃ grāhayitavyā [12] / vaktavyam /
K01bhivin_u:284: na kṣamati abrahmacaryaṃ pratisevituṃ [13] na kṣamati adinnam ādayitum [14] /
K01bhivin_u:285: na kṣamati svahastaṃ manuṣyavigrahaṃ jīvitād vyoparāyituṃ [15] na kṣamati abhūvanam uttarimanuṣyadharmam prajānituṃ [16] /
K01bhivin_u:286: evaṃ yattakaṃ pārīyati padaphalake grāhayituṃ tattakaṃ grāhayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:293: yattakāni divasāni adhyācarati tattakāni divasāni uktāni śikṣā śikṣitavyā [18] //
K01bhivin_u:294: 28. yaṃ kālaṃ dve varṣāṇi bhavanti tato tāya saṃgho upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ yācitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:296: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā
K01bhivin_u:297: paripūraśikṣā ākāmkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadām bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:298: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve vaṣrāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā /
K01bhivin_u:300: yāciṣyati āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmā aṣṭādaśāvarṣā kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā dve varsāṇi upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ /
K01bhivin_u:301: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇim etad dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:303: vandāmi āryasaṃgham aham itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarśā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā /
K01bhivin_u:305: sādhu me āryā saṃgho upasthāpanāsaṃmutin detu /
K01bhivin_u:307: vandāmi āryāyo aham itthan nāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā /
K01bhivin_u:312: iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā sā saṃghaṃ upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ yācati /
K01bhivin_u:313: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthan nāmāye aṣṭādeśavarṣāye kumārī bhūtāye dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye upasthhāpanāsaṃmutin dadyāt /
K01bhivin_u:315: 30. śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho iyaṃ itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārī bhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūrṇaśikṣā /
K01bhivin_u:317: tāya saṃgho itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ deti /
K01bhivin_u:318: yāsāṃ āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśa varṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ dīyamānāṃ saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:323: 31. dinnā āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśa varṣāye kumāribhūtāye dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye upasthāpanāsaṃmuti saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:324: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:326: vandāmy ārye aham itthannāmā āryām upādhyāyinīṃ yācāmi /
K01bhivin_u:328: evaṃ dvitiyam pi tṛtīyam pi yācitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:330: anuśrāvaṇācāryā paryeṣitavyā dve rahānuśāsanācāryā paryeṣitavyā yo gaṇo samudānayitavyo gaṇasya upanāmayitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:331: 33. karma / śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho iyam itthannāmā itthannāmāya upasampādyā /
K01bhivin_u:332: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ itthaṃnāmā ca itthannāmā ca itthannāmāṃ raho 'nuśāseyyā /
K01bhivin_u:333: anuśāsiṣyati āryasaṃgho itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca itthannāmāṃ raho /
K01bhivin_u:334: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etan dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:335: 34. tāhi dāni sā anuśāsitavyā gaṇasya nātidūre nātyāsanne saṃkṣiptena vā vistareṇa vā /
K01bhivin_u:338: śṛṇu kuladhite yaṃ yad evātra saṃghamadhye pṛcchiyasi tat tad eva yaṃ asti tam astīti vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:342: śṛṇu kuladhīte ayaṃ satyakālo ayaṃ bhūtakālo yāva sadevakaṃ lokaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ
K01bhivin_u:343: saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāṃ visamvādeyyā yā ca tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ
K01bhivin_u:344: samyaksambuddhasya śrāvikāsaṃghaṃ visamvādeyyā imaṃ tato mahāsāvadyataraṃ /
K01bhivin_u:345: yaṃ yad eva saṃghamadhye pṛcchiyasi taṃ tad eva yaṃ asti taṃ astīti vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:368: cirā parinivṛto kho puna so bhagavāṃs tathāgato rhan samyaksambuddho //
K01bhivin_u:404: 36. santi kho punar imasmin kāye vividhā anuśayikā ābādhā sayyathīdaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:412: santi te ete vā anye vā vividhā anuśayikā ābādhāḥ kāye 'smin na vā /

K01bhivin_u:879: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī itthannāmāya ca itthannāmāya ca antevāsinīnāṃ tatrasthitānām ihasthitaṃ saṃghaṃ dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān yāceya /
K01bhivin_u:880: yāciṣyati bhante saṃgho dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī itthannāmāye ca itthannāmāye ca antevāsinīnām upasaṃpādyānāṃ tatrasthitānāṃ ihasthitaṃ saṃghaṃ dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān /
K01bhivin_u:881: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:884: tasyā me itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinīyo upasaṃpādyāyo /
K01bhivin_u:886: sāhaṃ dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī itthannāmāye ca itthannāmāye ca antevāsinīnāṃ upasaṃpādyānān tatrasthitānām ihasthitaṃ saṃghaṃ dūtopasaṃpādāpratigrāhakān yācāmi /
K01bhivin_u:887: sādhu bhava me āryo saṃgho itthannāmāye ca itthannāmāye ca antevāsinīnāṃ upasaṃpādyānāṃ tatrasthitānām ihasthito saṃgho dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān detu /
K01bhivin_u:888: evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi yācitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:891: tasyā itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinīyo upasaṃpādyāyo /
K01bhivin_u:893: seyan dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī itthannāmāye ca itthannāmāye ca upasaṃpādyānāṃ tatrasthitānām ihasthitaṃ saṃghaṃ dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakā yācayati
K01bhivin_u:894: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmaṃ ca itthannāmaṃ ca dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān sammanyeyā /
K01bhivin_u:897: iyaṃ dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī tasyā itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinī upasaṃpādyā tāsām ihāgacchantīnāṃ syād brahmacaryāntarāyo /
K01bhivin_u:898: seyaṃ dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī itthannāmāye ca itthannāmāye ca antevāsinīnāṃ upasaṃpādyānāṃ tatrasthitānāṃ ihasthitaṃ saṃghaṃ dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān yācate /
K01bhivin_u:899: tān saṃgho dharmadinnāye bhikṣuṇīye itthannāmaṃ ca itthannāmaṃ ca dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān sammanyati /
K01bhivin_u:900: yeṣām āyuṣmantānāṃ kṣamati dharmadinnāye bhikṣuṇīye itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān sammanyiyamānān saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:904: evaṃ dvitīya tṛtīyā karmavācanā iti kartavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:906: dharmadinnāye bhikṣuniye itthannāmāye ca itthannāmāye ca antevāsinīnāṃ tāsām ihāgacchantīnāṃ
K01bhivin_u:907: syād brahmacaryāntarāya iti kṛtvā tatrasthitānām ihasthitena saṃghena itthannāmo
K01bhivin_u:908: ca itthannāmo ca bhikṣū dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakāḥ kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm
K01bhivin_u:910: 77. tehi dani sammatehi samānehi dharmadinnāye bhikṣuṇīye upāśrayaṃ gantavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:911: tāhi dāni dharmadinnāya antevāsinīhi te yācitavyāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:912: vandāmy āryaṃ ihasthitāyo itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca āryāye dharmadinnāye upādhyāyinīye upasaṃpādyāyo /
K01bhivin_u:914: itthannāmāya ca itthannāmāya ca āryāya raho'nuśāstāyo tāsām asmākaṃ tatragacchantīnāṃ syād brahmacaryāntarāyo /
K01bhivin_u:915: tā vayaṃ itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca āryāya dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitaṃ saṃgham upasaṃpadaṃ yācāmaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:918: anukampatu me āryo saṃgho anukampako anukampām upādāya /
K01bhivin_u:921: yaṃ kālaṃ ubhayato saṃgho upaviṣṭo bhavati tato dharmadinnāya yācitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:924: tasyā itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinīyo upasaṃpādyāyo /
K01bhivin_u:927: sāhan dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī itthannāmāya ca itthannāmāya ca antevāsinīnām upasaṃpādyānāṃ tatrasthitānām ihasthitaṃ saṃghaṃ upasaṃpadaṃ yācāmi
K01bhivin_u:928: upasaṃpādetu tāyo saṃgho mayā itthannāmāya upādhyāyinīya /
K01bhivin_u:929: evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyaṃ pi yācitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:933: iyan dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī tasyā itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinyo upasaṃpādyāyo /
K01bhivin_u:935: tāhi itthannāmāya ca itthannāmāya ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitāhi ihasthitaḥ saṃgha upasaṃpadaṃ yācitaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:940: evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi yācitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:942: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho iyaṃ dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:943: tasyā itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinīyo upasaṃpādyāyo itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca raho'nuśāstāyo /
K01bhivin_u:944: tāsām ihāgacchantīnāṃ syād brahmacaryāntarāyo tāhi itthannāmāya ca itthannāmāya ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatra sthitāhi ihasthitaḥ saṃgho upasaṃpadaṃ yācito /
K01bhivin_u:951: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ itthannāmāṃ ca itthannāmāṃ ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitāyo ihasthito saṃgho upāsaṃpādeyyā /
K01bhivin_u:955: tasyā itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinīyo upasaṃpādyāyo /
K01bhivin_u:958: tāhi itthannāmāya ca itthannāmāya ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitāhi ihasthito saṃgho upasaṃpadaṃ yācito /
K01bhivin_u:966: tāyo saṃgho itthannāmāṃ ca itthannāmāṃ ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya ihasthito saṃgho upasaṃpādeti /
K01bhivin_u:967: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamati itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitāyo ihasthitena saṃghena upasaṃpādīyamānāyo /
K01bhivin_u:973: upasampannā bhante saṃgho itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitāyo ihasthitena saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:974: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etan dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:975: evam upasaṃpadāya tehi dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakehi bhikṣuṇyupāśrayaṅ gatvā tāyo upasaṃpannāyo vaktavyāyo /
K01bhivin_u:976: etā itthannāmāyopasaṃpannāyo sūpasaṃpannāyo traivācikena karmaṇā jñapticaturthena /
K01bhivin_u:984: dharma guru ca saṃgha guru ca /
K01bhivin_u:994: so vo 'rtho anuprāpto labdhā vo upasaṃpadā // [2]
K01bhivin_u:995: aśokaṃ virajaṃ kṣemaṃ dvīpaṃ lenaṃ parāyaṇaṃ
K01bhivin_u:996: taṃ prāpuṇatha nirvāṇaṃ eṣā vo sarvasaṃpadā // [3]
K01bhivin_u:998: evaṃ gautami aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārī bhūtāye ubhayataḥsaṃghe upasaṃpadā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:999: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ dvitīyo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
K01bhivin_u:1001: 83. kin ti dāni gautami āvaḍo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhikṣūhi vacanapatho bhūtena vā abhūtena vā anāvaḍo bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīhi vacanapatho bhūtena abhūtena
K01bhivin_u:1002: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣuṃ dharṣiya vaktuṃ koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā vaidyabhikṣū ti vā cūḍabhikṣū ti vā akhallā mahallaapratijñaakuśalo ti vā vaktuṃ
K01bhivin_u:1004: 84. atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye kaścit pravrajito bhavati jñātiko vā bhrātā vā /
K01bhivin_u:1006: na kṣamati adhyupekṣituṃ nāmapi kṣamati dharṣiya vaktuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1007: atha khalu prajñayā samjñāpayitavyo yadi tāvat taruṇako bhoti vaktavyo /
K01bhivin_u:1008: sālohita idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi /
K01bhivin_u:1009: kin dāni yadā jīrṇo vṛddho mahallako adhvagatavayan anuprāpto bhaviṣyasi /
K01bhivin_u:1010: etat tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ yac ca uddiśeśi svādhyāyesi bhadrako guṇavān śikṣākāmo bhavesi buddhānām śāsane yogam āpadyesi /
K01bhivin_u:1013: idanīṃ imīdṛśo punas tvaṃ taruaṇakāle idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi /
K01bhivin_u:1014: kin dāni yadā maṇḍaladvāram anuprāpto bhaviṣyasi tadā śikṣiṣyasi yā py eṣā tava parṣā
K01bhivin_u:1015: sāpi tava dṛṣṭā anukṛtim āpadyamānā anayavyasanam āpadyiṣyatīti etat tava sādhu etat
K01bhivin_u:1016: pratirūpaṃ yat tvam uddiśasi svādhyāyesi bhadrako guṇavān /
K01bhivin_u:1017: śikṣākāmo bhavesi buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesi sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena
K01bhivin_u:1018: vā koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā vaidyabhikṣū ti vā cūḍabhikṣū ti vā akhallamahallaaprakṛtijñaakuśalo
K01bhivin_u:1019: ti vā dharṣiya jalpati gurudharmam atikramati /
K01bhivin_u:1020: 86. anāvaḍo bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīhi vacanapatho bhūtena vā abhūtena iti na kṣamati bhikṣuṇā bhikṣuṇīṃ dharṣiya vaktuṃ muṇḍastrī chinnakavaḍeti jalpati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1021: 87. atha dāni bhikṣor mātā vā bhaginī vā pravrajitikā bhavati sā ca uddhatā vā unnaḍā vā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1022: na kṣamati adhyupekṣituṃ yadi tāvat taruṇikā bhoti /
K01bhivin_u:1024: sālohite idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣiṣyasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi /
K01bhivin_u:1025: kiṃ dāni yaṃ kālaṃ jīrṇavṛddhā mahallikā bhaviṣyasi etat tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ
K01bhivin_u:1026: yat tvaṃ uddiśesi svādhyāyesi bhadrikā guṇavatī śikṣākāmā bhavesi buddhanāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesi /
K01bhivin_u:1029: sālohite idānīṃ tvam īdṛśī kīdṛśī punas taruṇīkāle idānīṃ tvan na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi
K01bhivin_u:1030: kin dāni yaṃ kālaṃ maṇḍaladvāram anuprāptā bhavisyasi tadā śikṣiṣyasi yā py eṣā tava
K01bhivin_u:1031: parṣā sāpi tava dṛṣṭā anukṛtim āpadyamānā anayena vyasanam āpadyiṣyatīti /
K01bhivin_u:1032: etat tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ yat tvaṃ uddiśesi svādhyāyasi bhadrikā guṇavatī śikṣākāmā bhavesi buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesīti /
K01bhivin_u:1033: eṣa gautami āvaṭo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhikṣūhi vacanapatho bhūtena vā /
K01bhivin_u:1035: anāvaṭo bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīhi vacanapatho bhūtena no abhūtena /
K01bhivin_u:1036: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnām tṛtiyo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
K01bhivin_u:1038: 89. kin ti dāni gautami bhaktāgraṃ śayanāsanāgraṃ vihārāgrañ ca bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣusaṃghāto sā dayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1039: eṣo dāni koci bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya bhaktaṃ karoti vaktavyo /
K01bhivin_u:1041: atha dāni so āha nāsti mama taṃhi śraddhā nāsti prasādo ti vaktavyaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1044: dattapūrvaṃ teṣāṃ mama mātrā vā pitrā vā goṣṭhīsambandhena vā śreṇīsaṃbandhena vā samayasambhandhena vā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ na kadācin mayā bhaktaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1045: pratigṛhṇantu āryamiśrikā ti antamasato ekapiṇḍapātaṃ pi dāpayitvā bhikṣusaṃghasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho śatarasaṃ pi bhojanaṃ praticchati anāpattiḥ
K01bhivin_u:1047: eṣo dāni kocid bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya śayanāsanaṃ dadāti /
K01bhivin_u:1049: atha dāni so āha nāsti mama tahiṃ śraddhā nāsti prasādo / vaktavyaṃ / vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1052: dattapūrvaṃ mama ārye bhikṣusaṃghasya śayanāsanaṃ mātrā vā yāvat samayasambandhena vā /
K01bhivin_u:1054: ]kā mañcaṃ pi bhikṣusaṃghasya dāpayitvā mahārhaṃ śayanāsanaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaḥ pratīcchaty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1056: eṣo dāni kocit bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati /
K01bhivin_u:1062: vaktavyaṃ vayaṃ pi na pratīcchāmo ti /
K01bhivin_u:1064: ārye kārāpitan teṣāṃ vihārāḥ mātrā vā yāvat samayasambandhena vā pratīcchantv āryamiśrikā
K01bhivin_u:1065: vihāran ti antamasato gomayagṛhaṃ pi piṣṭhagṛhaṃ pi bhikṣusaṃghasya dāpayitvā bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho
K01bhivin_u:1067: 92. tā etā bhikṣuṇīyo avajñāya paribhavena vā koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā /
K01bhivin_u:1069: akhallamahallāprakṛtijño tī vā kṛtvā bhaktāgraṃ śayanāsanāgraṃ vihārāgraṃ bhikṣusaṃghāto na śātiyati gurudharmam atikrāmati /
K01bhivin_u:1070: evaṃ gautamī bhaktāgraṃ śayanāsanagraṃ vihārāgraṃ bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣusaṃghāto sātayitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:1071: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ caturtho gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
K01bhivin_u:1073: 93. kin ti dāni gurudharmāpannāya bhikṣuṇīya ardhamāsaṃ mānatvañ caritavyaṃ ubhayataḥ saṃghe āhvayanaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1074: sā dāni eṣā bhikṣuṇī gurudharmān apannā bhavati tāya ardhamāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghe mānatvaṃ caritavyaṃ ubhayataḥ saṃghe ca āhvayanaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1075: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā yāvad akuśalo ti vā kṛtvā gurudharmāpannā samānā nārdhamāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghe mānatvaṃ carati ubhayataḥ saṃghe ca āhvayanaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1077: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pañcamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
K01bhivin_u:1079: 94. kin ti dāni anvārdhamāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣusaṃghāto ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ yadaho dāni poṣadho bhavati tadaho bhikṣuṇīsaṃghena bhikṣuvihāraṃ gantavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1080: atha dāni sarvasaṃgho na gacchati ardhasaṃghena gantavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1081: ardhasaṃgho na gacchati aṣṭāhi vṛddhatarikāhi gantavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1082: aṣṭa vṛddhatarikā na gacchanti antamasato māsacārikiṇīhi pakṣacārikiṇīhi vā cchandārhaṇāṃ chandaṃ gṛhṇīya gantavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1083: yadi tāvad anukālyaṃ bhavati stūpo tāvad vanditavyo /
K01bhivin_u:1084: stūpaṃ vanditvā yo tahiṃ bhikṣur abhilakṣito bhavati parijñāto vā tasya chando dātavyo /
K01bhivin_u:1086: āryasamagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagrasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pādān śirasā vandati /
K01bhivin_u:1091: ahaṃ saṃghasthaviro ahaṃ tatradeśako ahaṃ bhikṣuṇīovādako ti tābhir api ete trayo varjaṃ kṛtvā śiṣṭakānāṃ chando dātavyo chandaṃ datvā bhikṣuṇīupāśrayaṃ gantavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1092: yaṃ kālaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho upaviṣṭo bhavati poṣasdhakarmāya sūtroddeśikāya sūtraṃ pragṛhītaṃ bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1093: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho adya saṃghasya cāturdaśiko vā pāñcadaśiko vā sandhipoṣadho vā viśuddhinakṣatraṃ ettakaṃ ṛtusya nirgataṃ ettakam avaśiṣṭaṃ
K01bhivin_u:1095: alpārtho 'lpakṛtyo bhagavataḥ śrāvikāsaṃgho śobhati anāgatānām āryamiśrikāṇāṃ chandapariśuddhiṃ ārocetha /
K01bhivin_u:1096: nīto chandahārikāhi chando ti tāhi vṛddhāntam āruhitvā sāmīciṃ kṛtvā vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1097: nīto 'smābhiḥ chandahārikābhiś chando itthan nāmenāryeṇa pratīcchito /
K01bhivin_u:1098: 96. yaṃ kālaṃ bhikṣusaṃgho upaviṣṭo bhavati sūtroddeśakena sūtraṃ pratigṛhītaṃ bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1099: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho adya saṃghasya cāturdaśiko vā pāñcadaśiko vā sandhipoṣadho vā viśuddhinakṣatraṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1101: kiṃ saṃghasya pūrvakṛtvā alpārtho alpakṛtyo bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho śobhati /
K01bhivin_u:1104: ko bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīnāṃ chandahārako tenotthāya vṛddhāntaṃ āruhya vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1105: vandāmy āryasaṃghaṃ samagro hi bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagrasya pādāṃ śirasā vandati /
K01bhivin_u:1108: evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1109: yadi tahiṃ bhikṣuṇītovādako sammatako bhavati vaktavyo / ovādāhīti /
K01bhivin_u:1110: 97. atha dāni na kocid bhikṣuṇīyovādako bhavati tatra yo dvādaśehi aṅgehi samanvāgato bhavati so sammanyitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:1114: anumātreṣv avadyeṣu bhayadarśī samādāya śikṣitaśikṣāpadeṣu kāyakarmavākkarmaṇā sammanvāgataḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1116: bahuśrutaś ca abhidharme bahusrutaś ca bhavaty abhivinaye partibalo ca bhavaty adhiśīlaśikṣāyām vinayituṃ / ṇka /
K01bhivin_u:1117: pratibalo bhavaty adhicittaṃ śikṣāyāṃ vinayituṃ / tṛ /
K01bhivin_u:1124: na ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ gurudharmaṃ āpadyitā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1125: to kalyāṇavacanaś ca bhavati kalyāṇavākkaraṇopetaś ca bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1126: pauryavācā samanvāgato vispaṣṭāya anelāya arthasya vijñāpanīya /
K01bhivin_u:1128: imehi dvādaśehi aṅgehi samanvāgato bhikṣuṇīovādaka sammutīya saṃmanyitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:1130: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho ayam itthannāmo ti bhikṣur aṅgopeto /
K01bhivin_u:1131: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ bhikṣuṇītovādakaṃ saṃmutīya saṃmanyeya ovayikā eṣā jñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1132: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho ayam itthannāmo bhikṣur taṃ saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ bhikṣuṇīovādakaṃ saṃmutīya sammanyati /
K01bhivin_u:1133: yeṣām āyuṣmantānāṃ kṣamati itthannāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ bhikṣuṇīovādakaṃ saṃmutīya sammanyiyamānaṃ saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:1136: iyaṃ prathamā karmavācanā evaṃ dvitīya tṛtīyā karmavācaneti /
K01bhivin_u:1137: sammato bhante saṃgho itthannāmo bhikṣuḥ bhikṣuṇīovādaka saṃmutīya saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:1138: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:1139: 99. tena dāni sammatena samānena tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo ovāditavyāyo nākāle [1] /
K01bhivin_u:1152: adeśo nāma veśikāsāmante vā dyūtakaraśālāsāmante vā /
K01bhivin_u:1154: vadhabandhanāgāraśālāsāmante vā atibhūṇḍe vā atiprākaṭe vā pradeśe [2] /
K01bhivin_u:1155: kin ti dāni nānāgate kāle anāgato nāma kālo pratipade dvitīyāyām vā [3] /
K01bhivin_u:1157: atikrānto nāma kālo caturdaśīyām vā pañcadaśīyām vā /
K01bhivin_u:1158: atha khu tṛtīyāprabhṛti tāvad ovaditavyā yāvat trayodaśīti [4] /
K01bhivin_u:1166: na tāvat tava parṣā ovaditavyā tavādya parṣāye ovādakavāro tavādya parṣāye ovādakavāro ti /
K01bhivin_u:1168: kin ti dāni na dīrghovādena ovaditāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1172: eṣa bhaginīyo ovādo śiṣṭakaṃ parikathā bhaviṣyati /
K01bhivin_u:1176: yadi so bhikṣuṇīovādako deśāntaraṅ gato bhavati tato ye tasya sārdhevihārikāvā antevāsikā bhavanti te bhikṣunīsaṃghena utsāhayitavyāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1178: teṣān dāni gacchantānām āgacchantānāñ ca pathy adanenāvaikalyaṃ kartavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1179: āgacchantasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃghena chatradhvajapatākehi yojanaṃ panthasya pratyudgantavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1180: yaṃhi vihāre avatarāya taṃhi ubhayasaṃghasya saptāhaṃ bhaktaṃ kartavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1181: atha dāni daridro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho bhavati bhikṣusaṃghasyaiva saptāhaṃ bhaktaṃ kartavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1182: antamasato ekapiṇḍapātenāpi pratimānayitavyo tena dāni bhikṣuṇīovādakena bhikṣuṇīhi dhītāsaṃjñā upasthāpayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:1183: tāhi bhikṣuṇīhi tasmin bhikṣuṇīovādakehi pitṛsaṃjñā upasthāpayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:1184: 101. na kṣamati tena bhikṣuṇīovādakena ghoṭena yathā prasārya grīvāṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo ovādituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1185: atha khalu yugamātraṃ nirīkṣante na tāyo ovāditavyāyo /
K01bhivin_u:1186: yadi kadācit tahiṃ bhavet keśāvartena vā kṛtena /
K01bhivin_u:1187: akṣīhi vā añcitena ākoṭitamaṣṭehi vā cīvarehi /
K01bhivin_u:1192: he avyakte akuśale idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi yaṃ kālaṃ jīrṇavṛddhā mahallikā
K01bhivin_u:1193: adhvagatavayam anuprāptā bhaviṣyasi yā pi tavaiṣā parṣā sā pi tava dṛṣṭvā anukṛtim
K01bhivin_u:1195: etaṃ tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ bhadrikā guṇavatī śikṣākāmā bhavesi buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesi /
K01bhivin_u:1196: atha dāni sā vṛddhā bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1197: sālohite idānīṃ īdṛśī kīdṛśī tvam āsi taruṇe kāle idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi /
K01bhivin_u:1198: yaṃ kālaṃ maṇḍaladvāram anuprāptā bhaviṣyasi yāpi tava eṣa parṣā sāpi tava dṛṣṭvā
K01bhivin_u:1199: nukṛtim āpadyamānā anayā vyasanam āpatsyati etat tava sādhu etaṃ pratirūpaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ
K01bhivin_u:1200: bhadrikā guṇavatī śikṣākāmā bhavesi buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesi /
K01bhivin_u:1201: 102. atha dāni so bhikṣuṇīyovādako gocaraprasṛto rathyāyaṃ bhikṣuṇīn paśyati keśāvartena vā kṛtena /
K01bhivin_u:1205: citrakūṭāhi vā upānahāhi na dāni kṣamati nahi kīñcij jalpituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1206: mā jano ojjhāpeya paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇako bhāryām iva śravaṇikām ovadati /
K01bhivin_u:1210: kā se ācāryā paścād uktaṃ tahiṃ gatvā ovaditayvā /
K01bhivin_u:1211: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā /
K01bhivin_u:1212: vaidyabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā cūḍabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā /
K01bhivin_u:1213: akhallamahallaakuśalaaprakṛtijño ti vā kṛtvā anvārdhamāsaṃ bhikṣusaṃghāto ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na pratyāśaṃsati gurudharmam atikramati /
K01bhivin_u:1214: evaṃ gautami anvardhamāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣusaṃghāto ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1216: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ ṣaṣṭo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
K01bhivin_u:1218: 103. kin ti dāni na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi abhikṣuke avāse varṣām upagantuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1219: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi abhikṣukehi grāmanagarehi varṣām upagantuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1220: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī jñātikehi grāmavāsakehi nimantrīyati /
K01bhivin_u:1221: ihāryā varṣāvasāna ti na ca tahiṃ keci bhikṣū bhavanti bhikṣuṇī ca jñātikāmanukaṃpitukāmā bhavanti vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1231: teṣām āgatānāṃ samānānāṃ āhāreṇa avaikalyaṃ kartavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1233: tāya bhikṣuṇīya tahiṃ varṣām tāya bhikṣuṇīya teṣām bhikṣūṇāṃ mūle anvardhamāsaṃ ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1234: 104. atha teṣām bhikṣūṇāṃ varṣām upagatānāṃ antaravarṣā-r-astu /
K01bhivin_u:1236: na dāni kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya kahiñci gantuṃ yāvat pravāraṇākālaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1237: yadi tāvat kṣemam bhavati tato te śabdāpayitavyāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1240: āgatānāṃ samānānāṃ bhaktena pratimānīya ācchādīya yathā samvibhāgan dātavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1241: pravārite kiñcāpi yaṃhi chando tahiṃ gacchati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1242: 105. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā koṇṭa bhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā /
K01bhivin_u:1243: vaidyabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā kṛtvā cūḍabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā khallamahallaakuśalaaprakṛtijño ti vā kṛtvā abhikṣuke āvāse varṣām upagacchati gurudharmam atikramati /
K01bhivin_u:1244: evaṃ gautami na kṣamati bhikṣunīya abhikṣuke āvāse varṣām upagantuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1245: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ saptamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvaj jīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
K01bhivin_u:1247: 106. kin ti dāni varṣoṣitāhi bhikṣuṇīhi ubhayato saṃghe pravāraṇā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:1248: yadaho dāni saṃghasya pravāraṇā bhavati tadaho bhikṣuṇīhi pravārayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1249: aparejjukāto pratipade kalyato ye ca nirdhāviya bhikṣuvihāraṃ gantavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1250: yadi tāva samagro bhikṣusaṃgho bhavati na kṣamati sarvāhi bhikṣuṇīhi apūrvācarimaṃ prāvarayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1256: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīm saṃghasya pravārāyikāṃ saṃmanyeya /
K01bhivin_u:1260: tāṃ saṃgho itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ saṃghasya pravārāyikāṃ saṃmanyati /
K01bhivin_u:1261: yāsām āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ saṃghasya pravārāyikāṃ saṃmanyiyamānāṃ saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:1267: sammatā āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmā saṃghasya pravārāyikā saṃghena kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evaṃ dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:1270: samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagraṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pravāreti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
K01bhivin_u:1271: ovadantu mo āryo saṃgho arthakāmo hitaiṣī anukampako anukampām upādāya jānantyo paśyantyo smarantyo yathā dharmavinayaṃ pratikariṣyāmaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1273: atha dāni samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho bhavati saṃbahulā bhikṣū bhavanti /
K01bhivin_u:1275: samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho saṃbahulān bhikṣūn pravāreti dṛṣṭena śrutena yāvat pratikariṣyāmaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1277: 109. atha dāni samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho bhavati eka bhikṣu ca bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1279: samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho āryaṃ pravāretīti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā yāvat pratikariṣyāmaḥ evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi /
K01bhivin_u:1282: vaktyavyaṃ saṃbahulāḥ āryamiśrikāḥ samagraṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pravārenti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā yāvat pratikariṣyāmaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1284: atha dāni saṃbahulā ca bhikṣuṇīyo bhavanti saṃbahulā ca bhikṣu bhavanti /
K01bhivin_u:1286: saṃbahulā āryamiśrikāḥ saṃbahulān āryamiśrān pravārenti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā yāvad /
K01bhivin_u:1287: yathā dharmaṃ yathā vinayaṃ tathā pratikariṣyāmaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1292: saṃbahulā āryamiśrikāḥ āryaṃ pravārenti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā yāvad yathā dharmaṃ yathā vinayaṃ tathā pratikariṣyāmāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1297: aham itthannāmā saṃghaṃ pravāremi dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
K01bhivin_u:1298: ovadatu mo āryo saṃgho yāvat pratikariṣyāmi evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi /
K01bhivin_u:1302: aham ithannāmā saṃbahulān āryamiśrān pravāremi dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
K01bhivin_u:1303: ovadantu me āryamiśrā yāvad yathādharmaṃ pratikariṣyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:1308: aham itthannāmā āryaṃ pravāremi dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
K01bhivin_u:1309: ovadatu me āryo artha kāmo hitaiṣī anukampako anukampām upādāya jānantī paśyanti smarantī yathā dharmaṃ yathā vinayaṃ tathā pratikariṣyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:1311: 110. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā /
K01bhivin_u:1313: cūḍabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā akhallamahallaakuśalaaprakṛtijño ti vā kṛtvā /
K01bhivin_u:1314: varṣoṣitā ubhayato saṃghapravāraṇān na pratyāśaṃsayati gurudharmam atikrāmati /
K01bhivin_u:1315: evaṃ gautami varṣoṣitāhi bhikṣuṇīhi ubhayato saṃghe pravāraṇā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:1316: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnām aṣṭamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyo pūjayitavyo anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
K01bhivin_u:1317: ime gautami bhikṣuṇīnām aṣṭau gurudharmāḥ ye bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitvyā anatikramaṇīyā velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa
K01bhivin_u:1320: 111. atha khalu bhagavān bhikṣuṇīyo āmantrayate sma tasmāt tahiṃ bhikṣuṇīyo adyadagreṇa mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ saṃghasthavirīṃ saṃghamahattarīṃ saṃghapariṇāyikāṃ dhārayatha /
K01bhivin_u:1321: ya ime bhagavan bhagavatā catvāro patanīyo dharmo abhijñāya deśitāḥ labhyā te bhagavann asmābhi vistareṇa śrotuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1323: 112. pañcārthavaśān saṃpaśyamānāya śraddhāya kuladhītāya alam vinayam uddiśituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1325: 113. ekam idaṃ gautami samayan tathāgato śrāvastīyam viharati /
K01bhivin_u:1326: atha khalu śāriputrasya sthavirasya yāvat ko nu khalu bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yena ihaikeṣān tathāgatānām,
K01bhivin_u:1327: arhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānām atyayena cirasthitikaṃ prāvacanaṃ bhavati cirasthitikaḥ saddharma iti yathā bhikṣuvinaye /
K01bhivin_u:1328: ekam idaṃ gautami samayan tathāgato vaiśālīyam viharati /
K01bhivin_u:1330: tasmāt tarhi gautami bhikṣuṇyāpi atraiva śikṣitavyam /
K01bhivin_u:1336: vistareṇa tasmād iha gautami bhikṣuṇīhi atraiva śikṣitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1337: 114. atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:1339: atha khalu bhagavān sannipatitaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaṃ viditvā yāvac chikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1340: yā puna bhikṣuṇī chandaso maithunaṃ grāmyaṃ dharmaṃ pratiṣeviya antamasato tiryagyonigatena pi sārdhaṃ iyaṃ bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā
K01bhivin_u:1341: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ti upasampannā sūpasampannā traivācikena karmaṇā jñapticaturthena anāghātapañcamena samagreṇa saṃghena ubhayataḥ saṃghena iyaṃ bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:1343: maithunan ti abrahmacaryaṃ grāmyadharman ti grāmasyāpy eṣo dharmo nagarasyāpy eṣo dharmo sarvāvantasyāpi lokasya eṣo dharmo /
K01bhivin_u:1345: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣevati mānuṣeṇa puruṣeṇa mānuṣyakena
K01bhivin_u:1346: paṇḍakena trayāṇāṃ vraṇamukhānāṃ dhanyamārge varcamārge prasrāvamārge anyatarānyatarasmiṃ
K01bhivin_u:1347: vraṇamukhe aṅgajāte aṅgajātaṃ prakṣiptaṃ ārtīyati ārtayitvā svādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1359: paryavasāne svādayati yā āsvādan nigamayati sā pārājikā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1363: evaṃ suptasya mṛtasya aṅgajāte aṅgajātaṃ prakṣipitvā artīyati /
K01bhivin_u:1364: peyālaṃ evaṃ amānuṣasya paṇḍakasya tiryagyonigatasya puruṣasya paṇḍakasya trayāṇāṃ vraṇamukhānāṃ / peyālaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1365: 115. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī raktacittā puruṣaṃ darśanāya uṭṭhāpeti samvaragāmivinayātikramam āsādayati darśanaśravaṇe deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati
K01bhivin_u:1374: 117. pañca bhikṣuṇīyo pañca bhikṣūn balāt prasahyamadhyomardanti pañca bhikṣuṇīyo pārājikāyo bhavanti /
K01bhivin_u:1376: pañca bhikṣū pañca bhikṣuṇīyo balāt pragṛhyamadhyomardanti pañca bhikṣū pārājikā bhavanti /
K01bhivin_u:1378: bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdhaṃ anyonyaṃ vipratipadyati ubhaye pārājikā bhavanti /
K01bhivin_u:1379: bhikṣuṇī śrāmaṇereṇa saha vipratipadyati bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavati śrāmaṇero nāśayitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:1380: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī ārāmikena saha vipratipadyate bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1384: mānuṣeṇa amānuṣeṇa tiryagyonigatena aparehi trihi dhanyamārge varcamārge prasrāvamārge /
K01bhivin_u:1386: dvihi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavati puruṣeṇa paṇḍakena ca /
K01bhivin_u:1387: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī suptā vā bhavati mattā vā unmattā vā vistareṇa puruṣo upasaṃkramya abhiniṣīdati vā abhinipadyati vā /
K01bhivin_u:1395: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī chandaso maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣevatīti /
K01bhivin_u:1402: apy ekatyā rāgābhibhūtā doṣābhibhūtā mohābhibhūtā anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1405: yā punar bhikṣuṇī chandaśo maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣeveya antamasato tiryagyonigatenāpi sārdhaṃ iyaṃ bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asaṃvāsyā
K01bhivin_u:1412: 118. bhagavān chākyeṣu viharati śākyānāṃ kapilavastusmiṃ nyagrodhārāme /
K01bhivin_u:1413: tena dāni kālena tena samayena bhagavatā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ araṇyakāni śayanāsanāni pratikṣiptāni /
K01bhivin_u:1417: sā dāni aparasya sākyasya uduvasite vasati /
K01bhivin_u:1418: sā dāni rāṣṭrā tasya śākiyakumārasya uddiśati /
K01bhivin_u:1419: sā dāni rāṣṭrā prāsādikā darśaniyā avigatarāga /
K01bhivin_u:1421: so dāni tāye trikkhatto devaśikaṃ upalaṅkṛtaṃ kālyaṃ madhyāhne sāyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1422: tāye dāni taṃ śākiya kumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā abhīkṣṇaṃ saṃsevāya ca rāgacittam anudhvaṃsayati /
K01bhivin_u:1423: sā dāni mlāyati pāṇḍukṛśā durvarṇā bhontīmapi bhojanaṃ na chando bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1425: kena tvaṃ bhaginī rāṣṭrā pāṇḍukṛśā durvarṇā /
K01bhivin_u:1429: sā dān āha bhotu bhotu ārya evam eva vartā bhaviṣyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:1431: ārye rāṣṭre kena tvam evaṃ pāṇḍukṛśā durvarṇā /
K01bhivin_u:1436: bhotu bhotu āryamiśrikāyo evam eva vartā bhaviṣyāmīti /
K01bhivin_u:1441: ācikṣāhi kīdṛśehi atra bhaiṣajyehi vā upakaraṇehi vā artho bhaveya /
K01bhivin_u:1442: saced asmākaṃ na bhaviṣyati prātiveśya kulāto uddhāradharmaṇā ānāpayiṣyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:1444: sā dān āha bhotu dīrghāyuḥ evam eva vartā bhaviṣyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:1447: kenāsi pāṇḍukṛśā durvarṇā yāvad grāmāntarāto ānāpayiṣyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:1448: sā dān āha bhotu dīrghāyu evam eva vartā bhaviṣyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:1450: na idaṃ āryāye kiñcit kāyikaṃ gailāyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1454: so dān āha kathaṃ sahyaṃ bhaveya /
K01bhivin_u:1456: yadi evam icchasi evaṃ sahyaṃ bhaveya /
K01bhivin_u:1457: 120. so dān āha / ārye kim artham ahaṃ necchāmi /
K01bhivin_u:1461: kīdṛśehi atra bhaiṣajyehi vā upakaraṇehi vā artho bhaveya /
K01bhivin_u:1462: saced asmākaṃ na bhaviṣyati prātiveśyakulāto uddhāradharmaṇā ānayiṣyāmi antarāpaṇāto vā grāmāntarāto vā ānāpayiṣyāmīti /
K01bhivin_u:1468: anyāhi ahaṃ kāṣāyavasanāhi notsahāmy etaṃ arthaṃ kartuṃ prāg eva āryāya /
K01bhivin_u:1469: āryā mama guru ca bhāvanīyā ca /
K01bhivin_u:1471: nahy aham utsahāmy etaṃ kāryaṃ kartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1473: sādhu tāva me āliṅgasva cumbasva stanodarañ ca me parimardasveti /
K01bhivin_u:1475: sa mātrāliṅgati cumbati stanodarañ ca se parimṛśati /
K01bhivin_u:1477: so pi dāni śākiyakumāro abhīkṣṇasaṃsargeṇa apamlāyati /
K01bhivin_u:1480: evaṃ rañjanīyam evaṃ kamanīyam evaṃ vañcanīyam evaṃ mūrcchanīyam evam adhyohāri evam
K01bhivin_u:1481: antarāyakaram anuttarasya yogakṣemasyādhigamāya yathā puruṣasya strī spraṣṭavyaṃ
K01bhivin_u:1482: strīyā puruṣa iti dāni tena abhikṣṇasaṃsevāya apamlāyati /
K01bhivin_u:1485: mā ārye evaṃ karohi naivaṃ labhyā kartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1488: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsu /
K01bhivin_u:1493: satyaṃ rāṣṭre evaṃ nāma tvaṃ avaśrutā avaśrutasya /
K01bhivin_u:1494: puruṣasya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyāṃ āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyasi /
K01bhivin_u:1499: nanv ahaṃ rāṣṭre anekaparyāyeṇa sarveṣāṃ kāmānāṃ kāmanandīnāṃ kāmanimnānāṃ kāmamūrcchānāṃ kāmapipāsānāṃ kāmaparidāhyānāṃ kāmādhyavasānānāṃ antam vadāmi /
K01bhivin_u:1502: tatra nāma tvaṃ imaṃ evaṃ rūpatvaṃ pāpam akuśalaṃ dharmaṃ adhyācarasi /
K01bhivin_u:1507: naivaṃ karato vṛddhir bhavati kuśalehi dharmehi /
K01bhivin_u:1508: 123. atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:1510: yāvatikā bhikṣuṇīyo kapilavastun nagaram upaniśritya viharanti /
K01bhivin_u:1511: atha khalu bhagavān sannipatitaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaṃ viditvā etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ vistareṇārocayati /
K01bhivin_u:1514: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya adho kakṣābhyām upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyeya iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /
K01bhivin_u:1517: yāvad eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā ti raktacittā /
K01bhivin_u:1523: sādiyeyā ti sātīyati sukhiyati ramīyati āsvāda nigamayati pārājikā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1528: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādayati pārājikā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1529: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutasya paṇḍakasya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādayati pārājikā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1530: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā anavaśrutena paṇḍakena upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyati thūlaccayam āsādyati /
K01bhivin_u:1531: sā pi eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā anavaśrutena puruṣena upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyati thūlaccayam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1532: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā anavaśrutena paṇḍakena upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaṃ parāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyeya thūlaccayam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1533: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā anavaśrutāya striyāya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiya deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati
K01bhivin_u:1534: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā avaśrutena puruṣeṇa upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyati thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1535: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā avaśrutenapaṇḍakena upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyati thūl'-accayaṃ āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1536: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā avaśrutāya striyāya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādayati deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati
K01bhivin_u:1537: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā avaśrutena puruṣeṇa upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādayati deśanāgāmi vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1538: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutena paṇḍakena upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādayati deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1539: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutāya striyāya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādayati samvaragāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1540: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutena puruṣeṇa adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyāṃ yāvat sthūlātyayam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1541: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutena paṇḍakena adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām yāva thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1542: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutāya striyāya adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyāṃ yāvad deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1543: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutena puruṣeṇa adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām yāvat deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsāsdayati /
K01bhivin_u:1544: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutena paṇḍakena adho jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ upari kakṣābhyām yāvat deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1545: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutāya striyāya adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyāṃ yāvat samvaragāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1546: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutena puruṣeṇa adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām yāvat deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1547: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutena paṇḍakena adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām yāvat deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1548: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutāyastriyāya adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām yāvat samvaragāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1549: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutena puruṣeṇa adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām yāvat samvaragāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1550: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutena paṇḍakena adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyāṃ yāvat samvaragāmivinayā tikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:1551: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutāya striyāya adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādīyati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1552: 125 / atha dāni bhikṣuṇī lalāṭasirāṃ vedhāpayati dvitīyāya bhikṣuṇīya mūrdhni ākramitavyā yathā strī spraṣṭavyaṃ saṃjānāti na puruṣa spraṣṭavyaṃ saṃjānāti /
K01bhivin_u:1553: atha dāni bāhuśirāṃ vindhāpayati aparāya bhikṣuṇīya bāhā grahetavyā yathā strī spraṣṭavyaṃ saṃjānāti na puruṣa spraṣṭavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1556: atha dāni gaṇḍaṃ vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā puruṣeṇa pāṭāpayati vā upanāhāpayati vā aparāya bhikṣuṇīya ālambayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1557: na kṣamati sambādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā puruṣeṇa vedhāpayitum vā pāṭāpayitum vā upanāhāpayitum vā /
K01bhivin_u:1558: sambādho nāma pradeśo upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adhaḥ kakṣābhyām /
K01bhivin_u:1560: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya adho kakṣā bhyām upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyeya iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /
K01bhivin_u:1563: 126. bhagavān samyaksambuddho yadarthaṃ samudāgato tadartham abhisambhāvayitvā vaiśālīyām viharati /
K01bhivin_u:1565: tena dāni kālena tena samayena bhagavatā bhikṣuṇīnām āraṇyakāni śayanāsanāni pratikṣiptāni /
K01bhivin_u:1569: sā dāni aparasya licchavikumārasya uduvasite vasati /
K01bhivin_u:1570: sā dāni tasya licchavikumārasya uddeśan dadāti /
K01bhivin_u:1571: sā dāni rāṣṭrapālā tasya devasikam upasaṃkramati kālyaṃ madhyāhne sāyam /
K01bhivin_u:1574: tāye dāni rāṣṭrapālāya abhīkṣṇadarśanena abhikṣṇaṃ saṃsevāya ca rāgacittam anudhvaṃsayati /
K01bhivin_u:1577: yāvad guru ca bhāvanīyā ca yāvan notsahāmi /
K01bhivin_u:1578: 127. sā dān āha / sādhu khalu tāvan me anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhāhi saṃlapāhi /
K01bhivin_u:1587: pīṭhikām vā āpaṇam vā karmāntam vā gamiṣyan ti /
K01bhivin_u:1590: so dāni tāye anto hastapāsasya tiṣṭhati /
K01bhivin_u:1600: so pi dāni licchavikumāro abhīkṣṇadarśanena abhīkṣṇasaṃsevāya apamlāyati /
K01bhivin_u:1602: nāham bhikṣavo 'nyad ekarūpam api samanupaśyāmīti vistareṇa sūtraṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1611: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti /
K01bhivin_u:1617: satyaṃ rāṣṭrapāle evan nāma tvaṃ avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśasya saṃtiṣṭhasi saṃlapasi /
K01bhivin_u:1626: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśasya saṃtiṣṭheta vā saṃlapeta vā /
K01bhivin_u:1633: iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asaṃvāsyā /
K01bhivin_u:1635: yāvat sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā ti raktacittā /
K01bhivin_u:1639: hastagrahaṇan ti haste gṛhṇiya yāvad aṅguṣṭake vā /
K01bhivin_u:1640: cīvaragrahaṇan ti saṃghāṭīyaṃ vā uttarāsaṅge vā aṅtarevāse vā saṃkakṣikāyāṃ vā dakaśāṭikāyām vā /
K01bhivin_u:1642: āgataṃ vā abhinandeyā ti vā svāgatan te anurāgatan te punaḥ puna āgacchesi /
K01bhivin_u:1646: kāyaṃ se anuprayaccheyā ti yenāsau tena kāyaṃ praṇāmeta /
K01bhivin_u:1647: saṃketakṛtaṃ gacched iti yas tasya abhīkṣṇaṃ upacāro bhaved āpaṇo vā pīṭhikā vā kṣetravastraṃ
K01bhivin_u:1648: vā udakasamīpaṃ vā karmāntaṃ vā udyāyaṃ vā mārge vā tahiṃ tiṣṭhed iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī
K01bhivin_u:1650: 130. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśaṃ saṃtiṣṭhati yāvat saṃketaṃ kṛtaṃ gacchati pārājikā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1652: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśaṃ tiṣṭhati yāvat saṃketakṛtam vā gacchati thūl'-accayaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1654: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā avaśrutasya anto hastapāśasya saṃtiṣṭhati yāvat saṃketakṛtam vā gacchati sthūlātyayaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1656: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutena puruṣeṇa santiṣṭhati thūl'-accayam /
K01bhivin_u:1667: atha dāni anukhajjakam āpajjati yadāṣṭau thūl'-accayā bhavanti tadā pārājikā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1668: atha dāni eka samāpadyitvā pratikaritvā yāvat saptamam āpadyitvā pratikaritvā aṣṭamam āpadyati na sā pārājikā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1669: atha dāni saptamam āpadyitvā apratikaritvā aṣṭamam āpadyati pārājikā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:1671: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśasya santiṣṭhed vā /
K01bhivin_u:1679: iyam pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsya /
K01bhivin_u:1684: vaiśālīyaṃ dāni nagare aparasya licchavisya triyantarā dārikā jātā /
K01bhivin_u:1688: gṛhe pi dhāryamāṇā amaṅgalyā kasyeyan dātavyā /
K01bhivin_u:1697: ārye 'smākaṃ triyantarā dārikā jātā adhanyā vāmaṅgalyā vāpraśastā vā /
K01bhivin_u:1707: sā yadā mahantībhūtā tadā tāya pravrajitā /
K01bhivin_u:1715: ārye na dāni pravrajyāyāṃ gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1721: sā paśyati yadi tāvad iyaṃ pratyodhāvati tato me lābhasatkāro 'ntarahāyiṣyati /
K01bhivin_u:1723: sā dāni kleśān asahantī ārāmikaparivrājakehi sārdhaṃ miśribhūtā /
K01bhivin_u:1727: ārye kāli jānāsi tvam etāṃ āgārakehi parivrājakehi saha miśrībhūtāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:1736: 132. etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:1741: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /

K01bhivin_u:2039: ārye rāṣṭre āgaccha yadi mām icchasi jīvantīṃ paśyituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2043: ārye rāṣṭre yan te bhaginī kālagatā kā tāvad imaṃ dārakaṃ parihariṣyati kā tāvad imaṃ mama gṛhaṃ pratijāgariṣyati /
K01bhivin_u:2045: tāye dāni bhavati pāpakāḥ khalu vātā vāyantīti /
K01bhivin_u:2052: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti /
K01bhivin_u:2060: evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ bhikṣuṇīya vinā adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyasi /
K01bhivin_u:2061: tena hi na kṣamati yāvac chikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2064: aparā dāni bhikṣunī prāsādikā darśanīyā taruṇī ucchvāsakārī vā praśvāsakāri vā mārgāto utkramitvā upaviṣṭā /
K01bhivin_u:2068: āryā prāsādikā darśanīyā taruṇī pratyagrayauvane vartasi /
K01bhivin_u:2075: āhaṃsuḥ / ācakṣva tāvat yāvat te tad anantaraṃ parivāriya dhārenti /
K01bhivin_u:2086: tāye dāni kaukṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ kaukṛtyena mahāprajāpatīye ārocayati /
K01bhivin_u:2090: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:2092: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamasato grāmāntaram pi anyatrasamaye tatrāyaṃ samayo akāmikā bhikṣuṇī bhavati glānikā vā /
K01bhivin_u:2100: akāmikā ti hasti kaḍevareṇa aśvakaḍevareṇa gokaḍevareṇa vā manuṣyakaḍevareṇa vā āvṛtā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:2101: glāniketi jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:2104: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo adhvānamārgaṅ gacchanti yāvatā antosīmāṅ gacchanti kiñcāpi dūraṃ dūraṃ gacchanti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2105: atha dāni grāmāntaram vā nagarāntaram vā gacchanti kāntāramārgam vā atikrāmanti /
K01bhivin_u:2109: adhyardham vā dvihastam vā gacchanti thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:2110: atha dāni ekā bhikṣunī āgatvā sīmāntare tiṣṭhati thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:2111: aparā āgatvā atikrāmati imaṃ sīmāntaran ti evaṃ yattikā atikrāmanti sarvāsāṃ thūl'-accayaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2113: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamasato grāmāntaram pi anyatrasamaye /
K01bhivin_u:2121: tasya bhāryā śuklā nāma karmāradhītā prāsādikā darśanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:2122: atha bhagavān kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣtaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2123: sāvadānam piṇḍāya caranto tasya gṛhaṃ gato uddeśe sthitaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2127: tasya dāni bhavati kin tāvad iyam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati /
K01bhivin_u:2128: bhagavatā pi vaineyavaśena prabhā te utsṛṣṭā /
K01bhivin_u:2132: aye hi asti nāma tvaṃ mama bhagavantam āvārayasi /
K01bhivin_u:2135: sā dān āha nāham āryaputrasya anarthakāmā /
K01bhivin_u:2137: api tu mā viprakṛto bhagavantam dṛṣṭvā utthāsyasīti /
K01bhivin_u:2138: tāye dāni bhavati dhig astu mama gṛhāvāsasya /
K01bhivin_u:2141: sā dān āha āryaputra gacchāmy ahaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2150: tāya dāni aṣṭāhena pravrajitāya yuñjantīya vyaṭayantīya vyāsayantīya tisro vidyāḥ ṣaḍabhijñāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2154: tāye dāni śakro 'marasaṃghaparivṛtto pādavando āgato / āha /
K01bhivin_u:2159: maharddhikā bhikṣuṇī tā vijitā indriyāṇī ca /
K01bhivin_u:2164: apareṇa dāni upāsakena mahārheṇa paṭena chāditā /
K01bhivin_u:2166: lakṣmīvān ayam upāsako puṇyam prabhūtam analpakaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2169: ye śuklān na paryupāsanti daivasikān dharmān uttamā // [6] //
K01bhivin_u:2170: taṃ āsecanakaṃ śāntaṃ te vai aprativāṇīyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2172: sā dāni gṛheṇa gṛhaṃ bhāṣaṇāya nīyati /
K01bhivin_u:2177: tato 'syāḥ sarvo janakāyo śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyam manyati /
K01bhivin_u:2181: satyaṃ śukle evaṃ nāma tvayā jambhanaṃ sādhitaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2189: 146. bhūtapūrvam atīte 'dhvānaṃ nagare vārāṇasīyaṃ bhagavati kāśyape tatra dāni rājā kṛkī nāmābhūt /
K01bhivin_u:2195: caturdaśīm pañcadaśīṃ yā ca pakṣasya aṣṭamī /
K01bhivin_u:2197: poṣadham upoṣadhan ti sadā śilena saṃvṛtā //
K01bhivin_u:2198: kāśināñ ca manāpo āsi bhadrako nāma mānavo // [3] //
K01bhivin_u:2201: taṃ ca kālagataṃ jñātvā sarvās tāḥ sapta kumāriyo /
K01bhivin_u:2205: anujānātu mo deva śmaśānaṃ yāmaṃ prekṣitum // [7] //
K01bhivin_u:2206: adya pañcadaśī deva divyā nakṣatra mālinī /
K01bhivin_u:2207: anujānātu mo nātha śmaśānaṃ yāmaṃ paśyituṃ // [8] //
K01bhivin_u:2212: yatra gṛdhrā śṛgālāś ca kākolūkās tathā vṛkāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2214: < yatra gṛdhrā śṛgālāś ca kākolūkās tathā vṛkāḥ> /
K01bhivin_u:2215: astrān ādāya gacchanti śmaśāne kiṃ kariṣyatha // [12] //
K01bhivin_u:2219: keśānām ākare raudre śmaśāne kiṃ kariṣyatha // [14] //
K01bhivin_u:2229: yatra mātā pitā bhrātā bhaginī jñātibāndhavāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2238: yatra annañ ca pānañ ca ratīyo ca upasthitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2239: atra ramatha kanyāyo śmaśāne kiṃ kariṣyatha // [23] //
K01bhivin_u:2243: atra ramatha kanyāyo śmaśāne kiṃ kariṣyatha // [25] //
K01bhivin_u:2245: vayaṃ pi tāta jānāmo śmaśāne bhayabhairave
K01bhivin_u:2246: durgandhaṃ kuṇapaṃ caiva kovidāraṃ ca puṣpitaṃ // [1] //
K01bhivin_u:2247: vayam api tātaṃ jahiṣyāmo tato 'py asmāṃ jahiṣyati /
K01bhivin_u:2248: nānābhāvo vinā bhāvo na cireṇa bhaviṣyati // [2] //
K01bhivin_u:2252: anujñātā kṛkiṇā rājñā niryātāḥ kāśīnāṃ purāt /
K01bhivin_u:2253: sarvās tāḥ ratham āruhya gatāḥ śmaśānaprekṣikāḥ // [4] //
K01bhivin_u:2257: tāyo yānād avataritvāna sarvāḥ sapta kumāriyo
K01bhivin_u:2259: sarvāsāṃ vo ayan dharmaḥ sarvīṣā eṣa dharmatā /
K01bhivin_u:2260: eṣa asya śarīrasya sarvā gāthāṃ karomahe // [6] //
K01bhivin_u:2262: chāyaṃ kulañ ca avekṣamāno so khajjate śivapathikāya madhye // [7] //
K01bhivin_u:2264: yatra rāgasya doṣasya mohasyāpi samūha yaḥ // [8] //
K01bhivin_u:2265: imam nagaram utsṛjya nāgarīśo kahiṃ gataḥ // [9] //
K01bhivin_u:2266: yo dvicakraṃ dviarañ ca imaṃ parihared rathaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2267: imaṃ rathaṃ samutsṛjya śārathī so kahiṃ gataḥ // [10] //
K01bhivin_u:2268: ūrdhvaśākham adho mūlaṃ ya imaṃ parihare dhvajaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2269: imaṃ dhvajaṃ samutsṛjya dhavajahāro so kahiṃ gataḥ // [11] //
K01bhivin_u:2270: ya imaṃ pariharet kāyaṃ aśvaṃ bhadram ca vāṇijo /
K01bhivin_u:2271: imaṃ kāyaṃ samutsṛjya vāṇijo so kahiṃ gataḥ // [12] //
K01bhivin_u:2272: ya imāṃ pariharen nāvaṃ asmimāne mahārṇave /
K01bhivin_u:2273: imān nāvaṃ samutsṛjya nāviko so kahiṃ gataḥ // [13] //
K01bhivin_u:2274: yo 'yam asmin āgāre vāsaṃ kalpeya adhvagaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2275: imam āgāraṃ samutsṛjya adhvago so kahiṃ gataḥ // [14] //
K01bhivin_u:2276: mama gāthā subhaṇitā mama gāthā subhaṇitā /
K01bhivin_u:2278: tataś ca maghavān chakro devarājaḥ śacīpatiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2279: samvegajātās tāḥ kanyāḥ dṛṣṭvā tā upasaṃkramet // [16] //
K01bhivin_u:2280: sarvāsāṃ vo subhāṣitaṃ sarvāsāṃ vo subhaṇitaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2281: varaṃ varetha kanyāyo yat kiñcin manasepsitaṃ // [17] //
K01bhivin_u:2282: ko nu divyena varṇena antarīkṣasmi tiṣṭhati /
K01bhivin_u:2283: ko vā tvaṃ kasya vā putraḥ kathaṃ jānāma te vayaṃ // [18] //
K01bhivin_u:2287: varaṃ varetha kanyāyo yat kiñcin manasepsitaṃ // [20] //
K01bhivin_u:2288: śakraś ca vo varaṃ dadyāt trayastriṃśeśvaraḥ prabhūḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2289: varaṃ varetha kanyāyo kṣipraṃ vyāharato mama // [21] //
K01bhivin_u:2291: yasya mūle chavir nāsti patran nāsti kuto latā /
K01bhivin_u:2292: yo dhīro bandhanān muktaḥ tan me śakra varaṃ dada // [1] //
K01bhivin_u:2294: dhyāyantaṃ vṛkṣamūlasmi tan me śakra varaṃ dada // [2] //
K01bhivin_u:2295: yasya rāgaś ca doṣaś ca avidyā ca pradālitā /
K01bhivin_u:2298: yasya śailopamaṃ cittaṃ sthitan na anukampati /
K01bhivin_u:2299: yo vimuktiṃ saṃjāneyā tan me śakra varaṃ dada // [4] //
K01bhivin_u:2300: yasyā ure ca pāre ca madhye nāsti na kiñcana /
K01bhivin_u:2301: akiñcanam adānaṃ ca tan me śakra varaṃ dada // [5] //
K01bhivin_u:2302: vāri puṣkarapatre vā ārāgre iva sarṣapaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2303: yo na lipyati kāmeṣu tan me śakra varaṃ dada // [6] //
K01bhivin_u:2305: parṇabhāravisaṃyuktaṃ tan me śakra varaṃ dada // [7] //
K01bhivin_u:2307: nāham arhantam īśemi nāham arhanteṣv īśvaraḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2311: asvāmiko varaṃ dattvā kathaṃ śakra kariṣyasi // [9] //
K01bhivin_u:2312: ubhau kūlau asaṃprāptaḥ atīrthe prataren nadīm /
K01bhivin_u:2313: eṣa śakra viṣaṇṇo si paṇkevāsi jaradgavaḥ // [10] //
K01bhivin_u:2315: upāsikā vo kanyāyo api ca ye upāsakā /
K01bhivin_u:2316: dharmeṇa vo ahaṃ bhrātā anujānāmi vo varaṃ // [11] //
K01bhivin_u:2318: naiva te śakra yācāmo nāpi unnodayāma te /
K01bhivin_u:2319: svayam eva śakra jānāhi kiṃ vareṇa kumāriṇāṃ // [12] //
K01bhivin_u:2320: 149.atha bhagavān tāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pūrve nivāsapratisaṃyuktāṃ pratijñākathāṃ vyākārṣīt /
K01bhivin_u:2321: kadāhaṃ vīṇāṃ vā madhurāṃ saptatantrīyutāṃ manoramām /
K01bhivin_u:2322: dharmaṃ pravyāhariṣyāmi tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [1] //
K01bhivin_u:2330: amajjamānā gamiṣyāma tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [2] //
K01bhivin_u:2332: evaṃ hy etad bhagavan eṣāpi tatraivāsi /
K01bhivin_u:2337: saṃghāṭīṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyaṃ tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [3] //
K01bhivin_u:2339: cittaṃ ṛjuṃ kariṣyāmi tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [4] //
K01bhivin_u:2347: pāṇinā parimārjiṣyaṃ tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [5] //
K01bhivin_u:2349: piṇḍapātaṃ cariṣyāmi kadā nas tad bhaviṣyati // [6] //
K01bhivin_u:2358: saṃghaṃ parihariṣyāmi tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [7] //
K01bhivin_u:2359: kadāhaṃ candro ca vimalo viprasanno anāvilo /
K01bhivin_u:2360: śuddhaṃ cittaṃ adhiṣṭhihiṣyaṃ tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [8] //
K01bhivin_u:2368: saṃghe dānāni dāsyāmi tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [9] //
K01bhivin_u:2369: kadāhaṃ mañcam vā pīṭham vā bisi caturasrakāṇi vā /
K01bhivin_u:2370: saṃghe dānāni dāsyāmi tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [10] //
K01bhivin_u:2372: saṃghe dānāni dāsyāmi tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [11] //
K01bhivin_u:2373: kadāhaṃ sumbhakaṃ pātraṃ sukṛtaṃ sādhu niṣṭhitaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2374: saṃghe dānāni dāsyāmi tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [12] //
K01bhivin_u:2376: saṃghe dānāni dāsyāmi tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [13] //

K01bhivin_u:2379: 150. tatra tāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ cakṣur gocaraṃ nāsti /
K01bhivin_u:2385: tena kālena tena samayena aparā hy etā bhikṣuṇīyo kṛkiṇo rājñaḥ sapta dhītaro abhūṣi /
K01bhivin_u:2386: atha śuklā bhikṣuṇī gṛheṇa gṛhaṃ bhāṣaṇāya nīyati /
K01bhivin_u:2387: sā dāni apareṇa gṛhabhāṣaṇāya nītā bhikṣuṇīhi vipravustā /
K01bhivin_u:2388: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato ārocayati /
K01bhivin_u:2395: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ bhikṣuṇībhir vinā vipravasasi /
K01bhivin_u:2396: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi vinā vipravasituṃ ekāṃ rātrim pi /
K01bhivin_u:2401: tahin dāni aparā bhikṣuṇī jarādurbalā vyādhidurbalā sārthāt parihīṇā /
K01bhivin_u:2405: yāvat mahāprajāpatī pi gautamī bhagavato ārocayati /
K01bhivin_u:2414: na kasyacit praveśo dātavyo ti bhagavān prathamaṃ paribhokṣyati /
K01bhivin_u:2416: atha rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kośalasya putro virūḍhako nāma kumāraḥ kapilavastuṃ gatako mātulānām antike śikṣāmāṇāya /
K01bhivin_u:2417: so dāni tehi rakṣapālehi pramattehi saṃsthāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ krīḍanāya /
K01bhivin_u:2418: so dāni tehi rakṣapālehi anyehi ca śākiyehi dṛṣṭo /
K01bhivin_u:2419: te dāni ruṣitā itikitikāya putra dāsīputra kahiṃ praviṣṭo 'si ti /
K01bhivin_u:2421: ekena hastena bāhāyāṃ gṛhītvā dvitīyena hastena grīvāyāṃ saṃsthāgārād bahiś choritaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2423: taṃ dāni tehi śākiyehi saṃsthāgāra puruṣamātrābhūmiṃ khānāpayitvā navena pāṃsunā pūrayitvā gandhodakena siktaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2427: yady ahaṃ rājyaṃ pratilabheyaṃ śākiyānāṃ nidhanaṃ kariṣye /
K01bhivin_u:2431: yadāhaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhito bhaveyaṃ tadā me smārayiṣyasi śākiyānām antam gamiṣyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2433: kadāci dāni rājā prasenajit kośalo udyānabhūmin nirgataḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2437: rājā prasenajit kośalo na bhūyaḥ praveśaṃ labhati /
K01bhivin_u:2439: yasya bhavanto gṛheṇārthaḥ putradāreṇa cārthaḥ sa praviśatu nagaraṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2440: evam akriyamāṇe yuṣmākaṃ putradāraṃ vyasanam āpādayiṣyāmīti /
K01bhivin_u:2445: idānim vā paścād vā etasyaiva etaṃ rājyaṃ gacchatha /
K01bhivin_u:2450: udyānabhūmīyaṃ saṃsthito pānīyapālo mallī ca rājā dṛṣṭasatyo na paritasyati /
K01bhivin_u:2453: yo dāni bhaṇe rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ jugupseya tasya kiṃ daṇḍaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2457: pūrvam ahaṃ kumārabhūtaḥ śākiyānāṃ saṃsthāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ tehi mama jugupsāya saṃsthāgāraṃ
K01bhivin_u:2458: puruṣasaṃsthāgāraṃ puruṣamātraṃ khānāpayitva pāṃsunā pūrayitvā kṣīragandhodakena
K01bhivin_u:2460: mayā teṣāṃ vairaṃ pratikartavyaṃ yadi bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ nānukampati /
K01bhivin_u:2469: bhagavān dāni virūḍhakasya imam evaṃ rūpaṃ cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāya kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā
K01bhivin_u:2470: pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīye nagarīye piṇḍāya caritvā anyataraṃ śākhoṭavṛkṣaṃ niśrāya niṣīdati sma /
K01bhivin_u:2471: atha khalu rājā virūḍhako caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhayitvā hastikāyaṃ aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ śrāvastyāṃ nagaryāṃ niryāti kapilavastuṃ nagaraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2472: adrākṣīd rājā virūḍhako bhagavantaṃ śākhoṭakavṛkṣaṃ niśrāya niṣaṇṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca puna yena bhagavāṃs tena hastināgaṃ prerayati /
K01bhivin_u:2473: atha khalu rājā virūḍhako yāvad eva yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā hastināgāt pratyāruhya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:2475: aśvatthanyagrodhasaptaparṇādyāḥ śobhanāś ca śītalāś ca tān utsṛjya itarasya pratyavarasya viralapatrasya śākhoṭakavṛkṣasyādhastān niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2478: atha khalu rājño virūḍhakasya etad abhavat /
K01bhivin_u:2480: tato yeva pratinivartayitvā śrāvastīn nagaram anupraviṣṭaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2481: bhagavān dāni śrāvastīyaṃ yathābhiramyaṃ viharitvā kapilavastuṃ nagaraṃ prakrāmi /
K01bhivin_u:2487: rājā dāni virūḍhako śākīyān vadhitvā śākiyakanyāyo ādāya śrāvastīṃ pratigataḥ tadyathā /
K01bhivin_u:2494: so dāni sārdhaṃ krīḍanto ramanto paricārayantaḥ abhikṣṇaṃ vadati /
K01bhivin_u:2499: atha khalv abhayā rājadhītā rājānaṃ virūḍhakam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:2500: mā deva evaṃ vada nihatā me grāmakaṇṭakāḥ śākiyā iti /
K01bhivin_u:2510: santi deva śākiyāḥ śrotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino nāgāminas te devena adūṣakā anaparādhino jīvitād vyavaropitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2514: 154. atha rājā virūḍhakaḥ kupitaḥ yāvat kāraṇāntikaṃ mahāmātram āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:2515: tvaṃ hi bhaṇe puruṣa mama bhogehi jāyayasi /
K01bhivin_u:2522: tena hi bhaṇe mahāmātra imāyo śākiyāyinīyo daṇḍahatāyo kṛtvā karṇanāsāhastapādacchinnāyo kṛtvā taptena telena kāyaṃ pariṣiñcitvā jīvantikāyo evaṃ parikhāyāṃ cchorayā /
K01bhivin_u:2524: yan dāni ahaṃ śākiyāyinīnāṃ āsi darśanaṃ pi na labhamāno tāyo etāyo mama hastagatāyo yan nūnam aham etāhi saha krīḍeyaṃ rameyaṃ paricārayeyaṃ
K01bhivin_u:2525: so dāni tāhi sārdhaṃ svake gṛhe pravicārayati /
