K01bhivin_u:2526: aśrauṣīd rājā virūḍhako kāraṇāntikas tāhi sārdhaṃ krīḍati yāvan na ca pi yathoktaṃ karotīti /
K01bhivin_u:2532: tāyo tatra duḥkhaṃ tīvrāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti /
K01bhivin_u:2539: atha khalu bhagavān kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīn nagarīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2542: mahato janakāyasya nirghoṣo yāvad rājñā virūḍhakena ṣaṇṇāṃ śākiyāyinīnāṃ yāvat tasya kṛpaṇena yāvan sūktavādī bhagavān iti krandanti /
K01bhivin_u:2543: sādhu bhagavān arthakāmo jñātīnām anukampyārthaṃ upasaṃkrāmatu /
K01bhivin_u:2544: apy eva nāma bhagavataḥ sammukhād dharmaṃ śruṇitvā api svargopigā bhaveṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2545: 155. atha khalu bhagavāṃ śakraṃ devānām indraṃ samanvāharati sma /
K01bhivin_u:2546: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ śacim āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:2547: eṣa śaci bhagavān jñātīnām upasaṃkramati anukampārthaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2548: gaccha śaci tāyo śākiyāyinīyo parikhāyā uddharitvā saṃprajānaṃ niṣīdāpehi vastreṇācchādehi bhagavān upasaṃkramiṣyati /
K01bhivin_u:2549: atha khalu śacī tāyo śākiyāyinīyo parikhāyā uddharitvā saṃprajānan niṣīdāpayitvā vastreṇācchāditā /
K01bhivin_u:2550: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat tāyomaindryā spharitvā yat kiñcit kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca duḥkhavedanāgataṃ sarvaṃ taṃ pratiprasraṃbheti /
K01bhivin_u:2552: tṛpyatāṃ bhikṣavo bhagavatīṣu ko bhikṣavo bhavam abhinandeya ko upādiyeya anyatra bālapṛthagjanānāṃ andhānāṃ acakṣukānāṃ paśyatha /
K01bhivin_u:2553: bhikṣavaḥ etāyo śākiyāyinīyo manuṣyakehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi krīḍitvā ramitvā pravicārayitvā
K01bhivin_u:2554: etarhi jñātikṣaye ca bhogakṣaye ca karmasya ca sammukhībhāvād duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti /
K01bhivin_u:2556: sacen manyatha bhaginīyo yad idaṃ yuṣmākaṃ hasto ca pādo ca chinno api tu te vedayanti vā na vā /
K01bhivin_u:2559: evaṃ hy etad bhagavan sacen manyatha bhaginīyo cakṣuḥ svabhāvaṃ vedayati /
K01bhivin_u:2560: yāvad asti ca tatpratyayā duḥkhā vedanā /
K01bhivin_u:2566: evaṃ ca punar duḥkhā vedanā parādhīnā parapratibaddhā pratyayādhīnā pratyayapratibaddhā iti viditvā dvā triṃśatīhi ākārehi prakṛti bhinnaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2568: ataś ca bhaginīyo ārya śrāvaka imesāṃ pañcopādānaskandhānāṃ nātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
K01bhivin_u:2571: yāvat tāyo paṭa śākiyāyinīyo dhītāṃ anāgāmitāṃ sākṣāt kuryuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2572: pañcānāñ ca bhikṣuśatānam anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimucyeyuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2573: anekeṣāñ ca devatāśatasahasrāṇāṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣu viśuddhaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2574: 156. athāyuṣmān vāgīśas tasyām eva parṣadi yāvad bhagavān āha /
K01bhivin_u:2580: śūnyam asāram kañ ca kāyaṃ viditvā
K01bhivin_u:2589: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
K01bhivin_u:2590: kiṃ bhagavann imāhi śākiyāyinīhi purā pāpaṃ karma kṛtam yena etāyo evaṃ duḥkhām vedanām vedayanti /
K01bhivin_u:2592: bhūtapūrvam ānanda etāyo śākiyāyinīyo ihaiva śrāvastyāṃ ṣaḍ gaṇikāyo abhūvan /
K01bhivin_u:2593: ihaiva śrāvastīyaṃ kālo nāma pratyekabhuddho abhūṣi /
K01bhivin_u:2594: so dāni piṇḍāya caranto tāhi gaṇikāhi ukto /
K01bhivin_u:2595: ayaṃ dāni śramaṇo svayaṃ kāmān paribhuñjati /
K01bhivin_u:2597: tāhi hāsyābhiprāyāhi viheṭhanābhiprāyāhi anyehi duruktehi vacanapathehi obhartsito aṅgāramallakehi cāvakīrṇaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2598: so dāni ānanda pratyekabuddho duḥkhāya vedanāya spṛṣṭaḥ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanto kāyena ca jīvitena ca ardiyanto tatraiva vihāya samabhyudgamya anupādāya parinivṛtaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2599: pūrvādhiṣṭhitena ca svakena tejodhātunā tasya śarīraṃ vyāpinaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2600: tāyo dāni gaṇikāyo bhītayo pāpakam asmābhiḥ karmopacitaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2609: anāgatam adhvānam vayam etādṛśaṃ śāstāram ārāgayemaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2612: tāyo etāyo tena pāpena karmeṇa kṛtena yāvan narakeṣūpapannāyo etāyo tahiṃ bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi duḥkham anubhaveṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2613: etāhi ānanda bālapṛthagjanāhi hasantīhi pāpakarma kṛtaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2615: yam etāhi sā pūjā kṛtā vipratisāraś cotpāditaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2616: yaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ anāgatam adhvānaṃ etādṛśaṃ śastāram ārāgayemaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2619: yāvat pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ yāvat tatra parinirvāyinyaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2623: tasmāt tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ kāraṇavaipulyan nāma dhāraya idam avocat /
K01bhivin_u:2625: kāścid anto nagare nilīnāḥ kāścid bahir nirgatāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2642: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:2643: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:2644: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā ekarātram pi vipravaseya anyatrasamayena /
K01bhivin_u:2650: ekaṃ rātram pi vipravaseyā ti aruṇamudagame ca anyatrasamaye /
K01bhivin_u:2652: jarāburbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā nagaroparodho vā /
K01bhivin_u:2654: kiñcāpi bhikṣuṇī anto nagarato bahirdhā nirdhāvati bahirdhāto vā anto nagaraṃ praviśati /
K01bhivin_u:2656: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sasūrye vinā bhūtā bhikṣuṇīhi vipravustā aruṇamudghāteti saṃghātiśeṣo /
K01bhivin_u:2657: astamite sūrye vinā bhūtā aruṇamudghātayati thūl'-accayaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2658: bhikṣuṇīvihāre anyatra vā sarvāhi anto hastapāśasya pratikramitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2662: atha khalu yāme yāme purime yāme samavadhānaṃ na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:2663: madhyame yāme na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:2664: paścime yāme na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:2666: atha dāni dvibhūmakaṃ bhavati ekā heṣṭhime pratikramati aparā uparime /
K01bhivin_u:2669: yā punabhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhi vinā ekarātram pi vipravasiya anyatrasamaye /
K01bhivin_u:2671: nagaro parodhe vā ruddhā bhavati ayam atra samayo /
K01bhivin_u:2675: rājagṛhe dāni aparasya abhaṭagaṇasya sudinnikā nāma bhāryā taruṇī /
K01bhivin_u:2689: taṃhi dāni kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī prativasati /
K01bhivin_u:2704: so dāni puruṣo anupūrveṇa śrāvastīṃ gatvā pṛcchati /
K01bhivin_u:2708: pṛcchati yāvād āha katamā āryā kālīti sā dān āha /
K01bhivin_u:2711: prāptakālan nāma āryāye mama bhāryām anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2719: ānetha saṃghāṭiṃ yāvad imaṃ caṇḍāyuṃ dhare cāṭikaṃ bandhāpayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:2721: yāvad iyaṃ śramaṇikā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca bandhāpayeya iti /
K01bhivin_u:2722: so manuṣyo ojjhāyati ca osakkati ca yāvad bahir gatvā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mahājanakāyasyārocayati /
K01bhivin_u:2723: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā bhāryām ca me anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājayati mama ca bhandhanena santarjeti /
K01bhivin_u:2724: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti /
K01bhivin_u:2733: evan nāma tvaṃ anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:2734: tena hi na kṣamati anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2736: paśya bhagavan katham iyaṃ kālīya pratyutpannapratibhānatāya mocitā /
K01bhivin_u:2739: na ceṣā bhikṣuṇīyo kālīya etarhy eva pratyutpannapratibhānatāya mocitā /
K01bhivin_u:2743: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo iyam eva nagarī vārāṇasī /
K01bhivin_u:2744: iyaṃ strī rātrau dārikāṃ skandhenādāya gacchati /
K01bhivin_u:2747: tāya striyāya sā dārikā capeṭāya āhatā /
K01bhivin_u:2748: eko te siṃho khādito etam pi khāditukāmāsi /
K01bhivin_u:2750: yādṛśī eṣā strī dhvāṅkṣā ca mukharā ca khādaty /
K01bhivin_u:2769: sā strī jalpati mā rodāhi dārike /
K01bhivin_u:2770: eṣo tava mātuḥ kenānīto keśehi gṛhītvā /
K01bhivin_u:2771: idāniṃ yan naṃ icchasi taṃ se khādāhīti /
K01bhivin_u:2776: yat tāvad ahaṃ ekaṃ vāraṃ prapalānaḥ kiṃ bhūyo nivartitaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2777: so dāni tasya markaṭasya avadhunitvā prapalānaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2784: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā strī abhūṣi /
K01bhivin_u:2786: iyam eva sā kālī strī abhūṣi /
K01bhivin_u:2787: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā dārikā ti /
K01bhivin_u:2789: iyam eva sā sudinnikā dārikā abhūṣi /
K01bhivin_u:2790: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyo so siṃho abhūṣīti /
K01bhivin_u:2795: 159. atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:2796: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:2797: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayed ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo /
K01bhivin_u:2799: anujñāpakehi ananujñātām iti avūḍhāya dārikāya mātāpitarau anujñāpakā /
K01bhivin_u:2802: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām pravrājayati vinayātikramam āsādyati /
K01bhivin_u:2804: upasaṃpādeti saṃghātiśeṣo eṣā kācit pravrajyāpekṣā āgacchati praṣṭavyā /
K01bhivin_u:2809: vūḍhā vaktavyā patidevarau śvaśruśvaśurāv anujānāpayitvā āgacchāhīti /
K01bhivin_u:2811: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayed ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo /
K01bhivin_u:2816: taṃhi dāni aparasya mallasya bhāryā parapuruṣeṇa sārdham abhicarati /
K01bhivin_u:2820: 'to mā te aham evañ ca evañ ca asat kariṣyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2823: na punar aham ato doṣato viramiṣyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2824: tena sā sahoḍhaṃ gṛhītvā āsane upanāmitā /
K01bhivin_u:2825: iccheyam ahaṃ bhavanto imāṃ svadharmeṇa lambhiyamānāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2827: yā strī anyena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ abhicarati /
K01bhivin_u:2828: sā saptadivasāni dānavisargaṃ kārapetvā ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭīyati /
K01bhivin_u:2831: tena dāni puruṣeṇa gṛhaṃ nayitvā uktā /
K01bhivin_u:2832: itikitikāya dhīte dada yat te asti ca nāsti ca /
K01bhivin_u:2833: sapta divasāni ahaṃ te ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭayiṣyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2834: sā dāni ubhayato jñātisaṃghaṃ sannipātetvā annaṃ pānaṃ khādyaṃ bhojyaṃ samudānīya rodati /
K01bhivin_u:2836: kiṃ ruditena tvayaiva tathā ceṣṭitaṃ yena tvam evaṃ duḥkham anubhaviṣyasi /
K01bhivin_u:2840: api tu ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭayiṣyan ti /
K01bhivin_u:2850: sā tasyā vacanaṃ śrutvā janasya khādyantasya pibantasya pramattasya yathā vā tathā vā nirdhāvitvā anupūrveṇa pṛcchapṛcchikāya śrāvastīm āgatā
K01bhivin_u:2871: putriṇi yā tvaṃ nisṛṣṭā sunisṛṣṭā yā tvaṃ gopāṭikāyāṃ nisṛṣṭā /
K01bhivin_u:2885: prāptan nāmāryāya mama bhāryām anotsṛṣṭām pravrājayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2891: caṇḍāyu coras tvam ocorakas tvam ocaritukāmo tvaṃ śrāvastīyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2892: na tvaṃ jānāsi nityaviruddhāḥ śrāvasteyāḥ āmalakakalyāś ca /
K01bhivin_u:2894: ānehi tāva samaghāṭim yāvad imaṃ caṇḍāyuṃ dhare cāṭikaṃ rājakule bhandhāpemi /
K01bhivin_u:2896: yādṛśī iyaṃ śramaṇikā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ca /
K01bhivin_u:2898: eṣa so dāni puruṣo ojjhāyati ca osakkati ca /
K01bhivin_u:2899: so dāni puruṣo bhikṣuṇī nāṃ mahājanakāyasya ca puro ojjhāyati /
K01bhivin_u:2900: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā bhāryāñ ca me anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājeti /
K01bhivin_u:2902: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti /
K01bhivin_u:2905: evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:2906: tena hi na kṣamati jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:2910: yāvad anyā tāva mayā īdṛśī yeva pravrājitā /
K01bhivin_u:2913: sā dāni aparāparāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām allīnā na kācit pravrājeti /
K01bhivin_u:2920: idānīṃ sā itikitikāya dhītā sumahatā dṛṣṭadhārmikena ca vadhena /
K01bhivin_u:2922: so punar na gaveṣati na pṛcchati /
K01bhivin_u:2923: sā pi dāni tena tīrthikabhāvena tīrthikabhāvenārtīyati /
K01bhivin_u:2927: nagnā ahrīkā anotrāpiṇo istrikāmā pi dūṣenti /
K01bhivin_u:2929: moha bhāginī asmākaṃ pravrajyā gartasmi patitā /
K01bhivin_u:2943: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:2945: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayed anyatra samaye /
K01bhivin_u:2949: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
K01bhivin_u:2951: viditān ti ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya mātṛpakṣasya pitṛpakṣasya ca /
K01bhivin_u:2953: jñātayo nāma kṣatriyāṅ brāhmaṇāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ ambaṣṭhavaidehāḥ bhaṭanāḥ kuṅkumālāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2955: keṣāñcit kīṭena vā kāliñjena vā veṭhayitvā dahyati /
K01bhivin_u:2956: keṣāñcit vālukāghaṭakaṃ kaṇṭhe badhvā udake praveśiyati /
K01bhivin_u:2959: keṣāñcit taptaṃ phālaṃ vraṇamukhe anuśrotaṃ prakṣipīyati /
K01bhivin_u:2961: kṣatriyāṇāṃ palālena śarehi ca veṭhayitvā dahyati /
K01bhivin_u:2962: abhīrāṇām vālukāya ghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe bhadhvā udake prakṣipati /
K01bhivin_u:2965: taptam vā phālaṃ anuśrote vraṇamukhe prakṣipīyanti /
K01bhivin_u:2967: anyatra samaye ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2971: carakaparivrājakanirgranthājīvakatredaṇḍikāḥ mākandikāḥ gudugudukāḥ gautamadharmacintakāḥ vṛddhaśrāvakaḥ dakatṛtīyakāḥ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:2972: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñāti daṇḍaprāptāṃ pravrajayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:2976: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayet /
K01bhivin_u:2984: atha saṃbahulā striyo nadīyam ajirāvatīyaṃ snāyanti /
K01bhivin_u:2986: sā tāvad ekānte cīvarakāṇi nikṣipya bāhubhyāṃ pratīrṇā /
K01bhivin_u:2989: sā kayadhānake muhūrtam viśramitvā punar evāgatā /
K01bhivin_u:2997: mahāprajāpatī gautami bhagavato āroceti yāvad bhagavān āha /
K01bhivin_u:2999: evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ ekākinī nadīṃ tarasi /
K01bhivin_u:3000: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tarituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3001: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:3002: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:3003: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tare ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko /
K01bhivin_u:3006: nadīti yā bahiḥ sīmāto pravahantī bahiḥ sīmām upeti /
K01bhivin_u:3009: yāvatā ca etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo nadīn taranti anto hastapāśe taritavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3012: athavaikā madhye tiṣṭhati aparā taranti thūl'-accayaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3013: yāvad evam aparāparanti sarvāḥ thūl'-accayam āsādayanti /
K01bhivin_u:3014: etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo nadyāṃ snāyanti ante hastapāśena snātavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3017: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tareya /
K01bhivin_u:3022: tahiṃ kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī grāmacārikāṃ gatā /
K01bhivin_u:3023: tasyā gatāya antevāsinīye bhikṣuṇīsaṃghena utkṣepanīyakarma kṛtaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3032: sā dāni anyadā cānyadā ca yadā grāmacārikāṃ caritvā āgatā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:3034: tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo sannipatathety uktā śīghraṃ śīghraṃ sannipatitāḥ kiñcid vaibhaṅgikaṃ dāsyatīti /
K01bhivin_u:3039: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pratyosareya /
K01bhivin_u:3045: yasyā āryamiśrikānāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pratyosāryamāṇāṃ saṃghena sā tūṣṇīm asya yasyā na kṣamati sā bhāṣetu /
K01bhivin_u:3047: evaṃ traivācikaṃ pratyosāritā āryamiśrikā iyam itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:3049: kṣamati taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:3050: atha sā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ceti na kācit pratikṣipati /
K01bhivin_u:3055: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayeyuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3063: duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptām apratikṛtāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3068: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:3070: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ apratikṛtāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3075: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti upasampannā yāvad ubhayataḥ saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:3077: svayam vā jāne parato vā śrutvā /
K01bhivin_u:3085: akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ ti prakṛtisthā bhikṣuṇīyo asaṃjñāpayitvā /
K01bhivin_u:3087: saṃghamadhye avalokanām akṛtvā svayam eva pratyosārayet /
K01bhivin_u:3089: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3094: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī samagreṇa saṃghena utkṣiptā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:3095: yā tasyā upādhyāyī vā ācāryāyiṇī vā ca yā prakṛtisthā bhikṣuṇyāḥ tā saṃjñāpayitavyāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3105: tasyāḥ saṃghena amukasmin vastuni utkṣepanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3109: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgham itthannāmā pratyosāraṇāṃ yāceya /
K01bhivin_u:3115: atha tatra kācit pṛatihati karmakriyamāṇe prakṛtisthābhir bhikṣuṇībhiḥ saṃjñāpayitavyāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3117: bhikṣur api jānan bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptaṃ svayam eva pratyosārayati sthūlātyayam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:3119: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānanti bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ apratikṛtāṃ akṛtāṃ akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaṃ svayam eva pratyosārayati /
K01bhivin_u:3129: jānāsi ārye kasya vayam arthāya āryāya dadāmaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3137: ayaṃ tv aham āryāya arthikaḥ āryāya dadāmi /
K01bhivin_u:3141: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahaprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayeyuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3150: nanu te paścimā nāma janatā avalokayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:3152: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:3154: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī anavaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya pratigṛhṇīyāt pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā bhakṣyaṃ vā bhojyaṃ vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ vā ayam api dharmaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3155: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yāvad upasampannā ubhayataḥ saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:3159: pātram iti jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyamaṃ kanyasam vā /
K01bhivin_u:3163: antaśaḥ glānabhaiṣajyam iti saptāhikaṃ vā yāvajjīvikam vā /
K01bhivin_u:3166: eṣo tāvan manuṣyo bhikṣuṇīya dadāti pātram vā cīvaram /
K01bhivin_u:3174: tavaiva bhavatu dīrghāyuḥ labhiṣyāmaḥ vayam anyato pi /
K01bhivin_u:3176: atha vācaṃ na bhāṣati hastavikāraṃ vā pādavikāraṃ vā akṣivikāraṃ vā karoti /
K01bhivin_u:3183: atha khalu denaṃ deti prasannair indriyaiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3184: atha khalu tayā bhikṣuṇyā āśayena pratīcchitavyaṃ pratīcchati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3185: evaṃ bhikṣor api raktacittā strī dadāti /
K01bhivin_u:3191: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya pātram cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānabhaiṣajyam vā pratigṛhṇeya ayam api dharmo prathamāpattiko
K01bhivin_u:3195: na kṣamati avaśrutasya puruṣasya pātraṃ vā yāvat pratigṛhṇātuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3196: sā jetā tasya puruṣasya na praticchati /
K01bhivin_u:3204: mā ārye etāṃ bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vada /
K01bhivin_u:3206: kin te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā /
K01bhivin_u:3210: dvitīyam tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramati /
K01bhivin_u:3211: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayanti /
K01bhivin_u:3218: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:3220: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīṃ evaṃ vadeya /
K01bhivin_u:3226: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhiḥ ucyamānā etad eva vastuṃ pratigṛhya tiṣtheya na pratinissaret /
K01bhivin_u:3227: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya
K01bhivin_u:3228: vastusya pratiniḥsargāya yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣyamāṇā vā
K01bhivin_u:3229: taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3232: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:3233: tāṃ bhikṣuṇīm iti yathā tāṃ jetāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3235: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhi evam asya vacanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:3237: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tad evaṃ vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
K01bhivin_u:3238: ayam api dharmo yāvat tṛtīyakaḥ yathā bhikṣuvinaye /
K01bhivin_u:3242: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vadeya /
K01bhivin_u:3244: kiṃ te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā /
K01bhivin_u:3247: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:3248: mā ārye etāṃ bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vade /
K01bhivin_u:3250: kin te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā /
K01bhivin_u:3253: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
K01bhivin_u:3255: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanuśāsitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3256: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā samanubhāṣyamāṇā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3257: no ca pratiniḥsareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
K01bhivin_u:3261: dvau bhedena tathaiva kartavyo yāvat tena bhagavān āha /
K01bhivin_u:3262: yā puna bhikṣuṇī samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya bhedanasamvartanīyaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
K01bhivin_u:3263: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:3264: mā ārye samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya /
K01bhivin_u:3265: bhedanasamvartanīyam vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭhāhi /
K01bhivin_u:3267: samagro hi saṃgho sahito sammodayamāna avivadamāno /
K01bhivin_u:3268: ek'uddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānaḥ sukhañ ca phāsuñ ca viharati /
K01bhivin_u:3269: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
K01bhivin_u:3271: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3272: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsareya /
K01bhivin_u:3276: tasyāḥ khalu bhikṣuṇyā bhikṣuṇyo bhavanti sahāyikā /
K01bhivin_u:3277: ekā vā dvau vā trayo vā saṃbahulā vā /
K01bhivin_u:3280: mā āryamiśrikāḥ etāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ kiñcid avavadittha /
K01bhivin_u:3282: dharmavādinī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī vinayavādinī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:3283: asmākaṃ caiṣā bhikṣuṇī chandañ ca ruciṃ ca samādāya pragṛhya vyavaharati /
K01bhivin_u:3284: yañ caitasyāḥ bhikṣuṇyāḥ kṣamate ca rocate ca asmākam api taṃ kṣamate ca rocate ca /
K01bhivin_u:3285: jānantī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī bhāṣate no ajānanti /
K01bhivin_u:3286: tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3293: sahito sammodayamāno avivadamāno ek'uddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3295: evañ ca tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhiḥ ucyamānā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ity etat kuśalaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3296: no ce pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhiḥ yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3297: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ity etat kuśalaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3299: tad eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheyuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3304: tatra sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī adhikaraṇāny utpādayati /
K01bhivin_u:3306: sā saṃghaṃ ākrośati saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayati /
K01bhivin_u:3316: mā ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpaya /
K01bhivin_u:3319: yāvan na mohan niśrāya yāvad āryā evaṃ chandagāmī /
K01bhivin_u:3320: mā ārye chandan niśrāya saṃgham ākroṣitavyam manyasi paribhāṣitavyam manyasi /
K01bhivin_u:3321: sā tvam evam ucyamānī na pratikramasi dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam adhyucyamāni na pratikramasi /
K01bhivin_u:3326: tṛṣkṛtvā saṃghamadhye samanugrāhatha samanubhāṣatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3328: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:3329: alam ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3330: yāvat khalu te ārye mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāya hitaiṣiṇīya karoti /
K01bhivin_u:3335: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:3338: sā tāva saṃghamadhye pi vaktavyā peyālaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3340: anubhāṣṭā bhagavan āryā nandā triṣkṛtvā kuvege triṣkṛtvā mahājane triṣkṛtvā saṃghamadhye etasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3349: nanv ahaṃ nande anekaparyāyeṇa daurvacasyaṃ vigarhāmi yāvan naivaṃ kurvato vṛddhir bhavati kūśaleṣu dharmeṣu atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:3364: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:3373: ārye ca chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohan niśrāya saṃgham ākrośitavyaṃ manyati /
K01bhivin_u:3374: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamāna tad eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
K01bhivin_u:3375: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣūṇībhiḥ yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3376: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamānā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etat kuślaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3379: yāvad eṣā bhikṣuṇī triṣkṛtvā kuvege samanugrāhiyamānā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati /
K01bhivin_u:3381: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:3384: evam dvitīyātṛtīyām vā vācāyāṃ yāvad vyavaropitāyāṃ saṃghātiśeṣaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3389: sthūlātyayāḥ sarve te pratiprasrabhyanti sthāpayitvā aṣṭau sthūlātyayāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3392: kathaṃ tāvat pratiniḥ sargārhaṃ katham apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3393: abhūṣi me saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayiṣyan ti prāpayāmi prāpayiṣyāmi ceti evaṃ pratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3395: abhūṣi me saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayiṣyan ti prāpitañ ca /
K01bhivin_u:3396: na khalv idānīṃ prāpayāmi na ca prāpayiṣyāmīty apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3402: saṃgho doṣagāmī ca bhayagāmī ca saṃgho /
K01bhivin_u:3404: chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohaṃ niśrāya samākrośitavyām paribhāṣitavyām manyati /
K01bhivin_u:3405: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:3411: na ca saṃgho chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohaṃ niśrāya āryām ākrośitavyām paribhāṣitavyām manyati /
K01bhivin_u:3412: āryā evaṃ chandagāminī doṣagāminī bhayagāminī mohagāminī /
K01bhivin_u:3413: āryā eva chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohan niśrāya saṃegham ākrośitavyaṃ roṣitavyaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ manyati /
K01bhivin_u:3415: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam evi vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭhet /
K01bhivin_u:3417: sā bhikṣuṇ bhikṣunībhir yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3419: taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3426: sā uddeśaparyavasānehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā /
K01bhivin_u:3431: sā uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karoti /
K01bhivin_u:3433: mā me āryamiśrikāyo kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇam vā pāpakaṃ vā /
K01bhivin_u:3434: aham apy āryamiśrikāṇān na kiñcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇam vā pāpakam vā /
K01bhivin_u:3436: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:3437: mā ārye uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karohi /
K01bhivin_u:3439: āryā pi bhikṣuṇīyo vadantu śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena /
K01bhivin_u:3440: āryam api bhikṣuṇīyo vakṣyanti śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena /
K01bhivin_u:3441: evaṃ saṃvṛddhā khalu punar ārye tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya parṣā yad idam anyamanyavacanīyā anyamanyāpattivyutthāpanīyā
K01bhivin_u:3442: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
K01bhivin_u:3444: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3445: yāvāttṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇa vā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3446: no ca pratiniḥsareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
K01bhivin_u:3450: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māsorakadhītā kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā hi viharanti /
K01bhivin_u:3454: kinti dāni kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti /
K01bhivin_u:3459: māryamiśrikāyo kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā viharatha mā vācikena mā kāyikavācikena /
K01bhivin_u:3462: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramanti /
K01bhivin_u:3463: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tā bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3466: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu punar dve saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti /
K01bhivin_u:3468: tā bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:3471: nānā vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
K01bhivin_u:3473: evaṃ ca tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānās taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3475: no ca pratinissareṃsuḥ tā bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyāḥ samanubhāṣitavyāḥ tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3476: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsuḥ itya etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3477: no ca pratinissareṃsuḥ tam evam vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3479: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu puna dve saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhītā /
K01bhivin_u:3482: tā bhikṣuṇīyo yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhītā /
K01bhivin_u:3488: yāvat tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3489: yaṃ taṃ vastuṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti anyamanyasyāvadyāni praticchādayanti /
K01bhivin_u:3490: tā bhikṣuṇīyo ti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhitā /
K01bhivin_u:3491: bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahājanena ekapudgalena yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:3492: trikkhutto kuvege trikkhutto mahājane trikkhutto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3493: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3494: no ca pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ayam api dharmo yāvat tṛtīyako saṃghātiśeṣo /
K01bhivin_u:3497: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuvege samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastun na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vācāyāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:3498: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:3501: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ vācāyām adhyoropitāyāṃ thūl'-accayaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3510: abhūṣi khalu mo saṃsṛṣṭā vihariṣyāmo anyonyasyāvadyapraticchādikā ti te dānīm viharāmo vihariṣyāmo na vihṛtaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3513: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu puna dve saṃsṛṣṭāyo viharanti anyonyasyāvadyapraticchādikā /
K01bhivin_u:3520: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi saṃsṛṣṭā viharitun ti /
K01bhivin_u:3521: nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhītā bhikṣuṇīyo nānā viharanti /
K01bhivin_u:3525: tāsāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
K01bhivin_u:3529: na ca saṃgho tāsāṃ kiñcid āha /
K01bhivin_u:3530: yuṣmān eva saṃgho avajñāya paribhavena omarditavyāṃ parimarditavyām manyati /
K01bhivin_u:3532: mā ārye nande etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo evaṃ vada saṃsṛṣṭā eva āryamiśrikāyo viharatha /
K01bhivin_u:3536: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramati /
K01bhivin_u:3537: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
K01bhivin_u:3540: yady eṣā sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī nandāṃ śākyakanyāṃ uttarāṃ ca māśorakadhītām evam āha /
K01bhivin_u:3544: dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi uktā na pratikramati /
K01bhivin_u:3545: tena hi gacchatha nantrikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhayatha samanubhāṣatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya
K01bhivin_u:3547: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande etā bhikṣuṇīyo evam vadasi yāvad āmo ty āha /
K01bhivin_u:3549: mā ārye nande etā bhikṣuṇīyo evaṃ vada /
K01bhivin_u:3551: yaṃ khalu te ārye nande mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāye hitaiṣiṇīye anukampikāya anukampām upādāya karoti /
K01bhivin_u:3552: taṃ mitrā ekā vācā gacchati dve vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsarāmity āha /
K01bhivin_u:3555: evaṃ eva yāvad anubhāṣṭā na pratiniḥsarati /
K01bhivin_u:3557: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3564: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvat sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:3565: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīyo nānā viharantīyo evam vadeya /
K01bhivin_u:3567: saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
K01bhivin_u:3569: kiṃ punar yūyam eva evaṃrūpā saṃghe /
K01bhivin_u:3571: na ca tāsāṃ saṃgho kiñcid āha /
K01bhivin_u:3572: yuṣmān eva saṃgho avajñāya paribhāvena omarditavyāṃ parimarditavyām manyati /
K01bhivin_u:3573: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:3574: mā ārye nande itthannāmāṃ ca itthannāmāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīṃ nānā viharantīṃ anuvicārehi /
K01bhivin_u:3577: nānāsaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
K01bhivin_u:3579: kim punar yūyam eva evaṃrūpā saṃsṛṣṭā saṃghe /
K01bhivin_u:3581: na ca saṃgho tāsāṃ kiñcid āha /
K01bhivin_u:3582: yuṣmākam eva saṃgho avajñāya paribhavena omarditavyāṃ parimarditavyām manyati /
K01bhivin_u:3583: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya na pratinissareya /
K01bhivin_u:3584: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3585: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3589: tā bhikṣuṇīyo ti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māsorakadhītā /
K01bhivin_u:3591: saṃsṛṣṭā eva yūyam āryamiśrikāyo viharatha anyamanyasyāvadyapraticchādikā ti kāyikena vācikena kāyikavācikena saṃsargeṇa /
K01bhivin_u:3592: mā nānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo 'dhiviharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi na parihāṇiḥ / peyālaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3594: bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahājanena ekapudgalena evam asya vacanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:3598: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvattṛtīyakam ti trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye /
K01bhivin_u:3600: satyaṃ tvam ārye itthannāme itthannāmāṃ ca itthannāmāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīm yāvad āmo ty āha /
K01bhivin_u:3602: mā ārye itthannāmāñ ca itthannāmāñ ca bhikṣuṇīṃ nānā viharantīṃ anuvicārehi /
K01bhivin_u:3606: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuvege samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vācāyāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:3607: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:3610: yāvat kin ti dāni pratiniḥsargārhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ kim apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3611: abhūṣi khalu ime itthannāmāyo bhikṣuṇīyo vadiṣyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3616: abhūṣi khalu me itthannāmāyo bhikṣuṇīyo vadiṣyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3619: vaditaṃ khalu me idānīm vadāmi na vadiṣyāmi ceti evam apratiniḥsargārham draṣṭavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3621: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīyo nānā viharantīyo evam vadeya /
K01bhivin_u:3623: yāvad ayaṃ pi dharmo yāvat tṛtīyako /
K01bhivin_u:3627: tahiṃ dānī dve mātādhītare agārasyānagārikāṃ pravrajite /
K01bhivin_u:3631: kiṃ vayaṃ jīvantikā eva anyamanyaṃ na paśyāmaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3635: na mayā yathā vā tathā vā śakyam āgantuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3637: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi saha vāco vācikaṃ karoti /
K01bhivin_u:3638: sā yadā paryādinnā bhavati tadā āha /
K01bhivin_u:3640: evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śikṣām uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ sambhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:3646: mā ārye buddhaṃ pratyākhyāhi yāvat mā śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi /
K01bhivin_u:3647: asādhu ārye buddhapratyākhyānaṃ yāvad asādhu śākyaputrīya bhāvapratyākhyānaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3649: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam pi uktā na pratikramati /
K01bhivin_u:3650: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3660: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramati /
K01bhivin_u:3662: tāṃ trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhatha samanubhāṣatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3664: satyaṃ tvam ārye itthannāme śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāsi /
K01bhivin_u:3665: sā tvam evam vadasi buddhaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:3667: yāvat kiṃ punar etā eva śramaṇikā śākyaputrīyāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3671: sā tvaṃ kuvege vuccasi mā tvam ārye itthannāme buddhaṃ pratyākhyāhi yāvac chākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi /
K01bhivin_u:3674: yaṃ khalu te ārye itthannāmāya mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāya hitaiṣīṇīye karoti /
K01bhivin_u:3676: dve vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsara na pratinissarāmīty āha /
K01bhivin_u:3678: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye avalokanā kartavyā yāvad etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo bhagavato ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3687: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:3692: dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śikṣām uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ saṃbhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ śramaṇībhāvaṃ śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:3696: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:3699: mā dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śikṣām uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ saṃbhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ śramaṇibhāvaṃ śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi /
K01bhivin_u:3705: evañ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya na pratiniḥsareya /
K01bhivin_u:3706: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3707: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3711: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yathā sā bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:3712: śikṣāpratyākhyāyikā ti sā evam āha buddhaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:3718: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:3719: mā ārye buddhaṃ praytākhyāhi yāvad asādhu ārye śākyaputrīya bhāvapratyākhyānaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3720: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya na pratiniḥsareya /
K01bhivin_u:3722: sā bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahājanena ekapudgalena yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhato saṃghamadhye /
K01bhivin_u:3724: satyaṃ tvam itthannāme evaṃ vadasi buddhaṃ pratyākhyāmi yāvac chākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:3729: yaṃ khalu te ārye itthannāmāya mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3732: dve vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsara na pratiniḥsarāmīty āha /
K01bhivin_u:3735: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3736: no ca pratiniḥsareya ayam api dharmo yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3737: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhiyamāṇā
K01bhivin_u:3738: vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vācāyāṃ
K01bhivin_u:3740: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:3743: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ vācāyām adhyoropitāyāṃ thūl'-accayam /
K01bhivin_u:3745: yadā saṃghātiṣeśam āpattim āpannā bhavati tadā ye ca kuvege ye ca mahājane ye ca saṃghamadhye thūl'-accayā ca vinayātikramā ca sarve te pratiprasrabhyante
K01bhivin_u:3746: ekā gurukā āpattiḥ saṃsthihati yad idaṃ saṃghātiśeṣo /
K01bhivin_u:3748: kin ti dāni pratiniḥsargārhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ kim apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3750: na khalu me pratyākhyānaṃ prtiniḥsargārhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3752: abhūṣi khalu me śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāsyan ti /
K01bhivin_u:3753: pratyākhyātam dāni na pratyākhyāsi pratyākhyāmi ceti /
K01bhivin_u:3761: uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ saṃbhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ śramaṇībhāvaṃ śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
K01bhivin_u:3765: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:3770: mā uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ sambhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ śramaṇībhāvaṃ śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi /
K01bhivin_u:3778: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vuccamānā taṃ eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
K01bhivin_u:3780: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
K01bhivin_u:3781: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamānā vā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya /
K01bhivin_u:3786: uddiṣṭā me āryamiśrikāyo ekūnaviṃśati saṃghātiśeṣā dharmāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3788: yeṣāṃ bhikṣuṇī ity anyatarānyatarām āpattim āpadyitvā ardhamāsaṃ ubhayato saṃghe mānatvaṃ caritavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3790: āhvayanapratibaddhā yatra syād viṃśatigaṇo ubhayato saṃgho tatra sā bhikṣuṇī āhvayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:3791: ekenāpi ced ūnoviṃśatigaṇo ubhayato saṃgho tāṃ bhikṣuṇīm āhveya /
K01bhivin_u:3793: te ca bhikṣavo tāś ca bhikṣuṇīyo garhyāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3799: pariśuddhā atrāryamiśrikāyo yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etan dhārayāmi / uddānaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3831: tā dāni striyo kācin māñcasya mūlyan denti /
K01bhivin_u:3838: āryāye nandāye mayā mañcasya mūlyaṃ dattaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3842: khādati ca pibati ca pātraṃ ca jānāpeti /
K01bhivin_u:3845: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3851: satyaṃ tvaṃ nande śayyāsanasyārthāya yācitvā anyaṃ cetāpeti /
K01bhivin_u:3859: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:3861: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śayyāsanasyārthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhaktam vā bhojyam vā glānabhaiṣajyam vā cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ
K01bhivin_u:3864: śayyāsanaṃ nāma mañcaṃ pīṭhaṃ bisi caturasraṃ kuccaṃ bimbohanaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3867: pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3868: nissargikapācattikaṃ ti saṃghe nissariya pācatikaṃ deśayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3875: tam vastuṃ na darśeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:3876: khaṇḍaṃ pralugnaṃ vā vā lepanikām vā kartuṃ kumbhiyo upasthāpayituṃ bhikṣur api śayanāsanasyārthāya yācayitvā anyaṃ cetāpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:3877: vastun darśetvā labhyaṃ khaṇḍaṃ pralugnādi kartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3879: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śayyāsanasyārthāya yācitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānabhaiṣajyaṃ vā cetāpaye niḥsargikapācattikaṃ
K01bhivin_u:3883: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī omalinamalinehi cīvarehi pāṭitavipāṭitehi khaṇḍena pātreṇa chidravichidreṇa piṇḍapātam aṇvati /
K01bhivin_u:3889: ahan te ārye pātrasya mūlyaṃ demi /
K01bhivin_u:3897: sā khādati ca pibati ca naiva pātraṃ na cīvaraṃ jānāpeti /
K01bhivin_u:3900: mayā āryāye nandāye pātrasya mūlyan dattaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3905: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
K01bhivin_u:3910: satyaṃ nande evan nāma tvaṃ nande anyoddeśikenānyaṃ cetāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:3914: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvad evaṃ nāma tvam anyoddeśikena anyaṃ cetāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:3915: tena hi na kṣamati anyoddeśikenānyaṃ cetāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3916: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:3917: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyoddeśikena anyaṃ cetāpayet niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3920: anyaṃ cetāpayed iti bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3922: eṣo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kācit pātram vā cīvaram vā ghṛtam vā tailam vā cetāpayituṃ mūlyan deti /
K01bhivin_u:3927: atha aniyataṃ deti yaṃ icchati taṃ jānāpeti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3931: bhikṣavor apy evam eva āpattis tu vinayātikaramaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3933: yam vā icchasi taṃ gṛhṇāhīti taṃ gṛhṇāti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3935: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyoddeśakenānyaṃ cetāpayati niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3939: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya bhaktakāni samādāyeti /
K01bhivin_u:3943: tā dāni striyo chandakaṃ prajantīntīyo jalpanti /
K01bhivin_u:3946: atha sā khādati ca pibati ca pātraṃ ca jānāpeti /
K01bhivin_u:3947: tāya khāditāvaśeṣeṇa yādṛśaṃ vā bhaktaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3957: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3962: satyaṃ nande evannāma tvam anyeṣām arthāya yācitvā anyaṃ cetāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:3966: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajapatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:3967: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:3968: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān vā cetāpayati
K01bhivin_u:3971: anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā saṃghasya bhaktasya vā tarpaṇasya vā yvāgūpānasya vā yācitvā
K01bhivin_u:3972: ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhaktam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān
K01bhivin_u:3974: atha khalu yasyārthāya yācati tam eva jānāpayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3975: atha dāni vastraṃ vipraṇāmeti bhaktasya vā tarpaṇasya vā yvāgūpānasya vā arthāya yācayitvā vaibhaṅgikaṃ dadāti /
K01bhivin_u:3976: śayyāsanam vā upasthāpeti vārṣikam vā hemantikam vā deti /
K01bhivin_u:3978: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya bhaktaṃ dāpeti /
K01bhivin_u:3980: yadi tahiṃ kiñcic cheṣaṃ bhavati odanam vā sūpam vā yāvad bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā upadarśayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3991: bhikṣor api evam eva āpattis tu vinyātikramaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:3993: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajya pariṣkārān vā cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:3999: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ yāva pātrāṇi saṃkrāmayemaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4000: tāyo dāni anastamite sūrye pravṛttāḥ saṃkrāmayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4009: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
K01bhivin_u:4018: evañ ca nāma yūyaṃ pātrasannicayaṃ karotha /
K01bhivin_u:4019: tena hi na kṣamati pātrasannicayaṃ kartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4020: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:4021: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:4022: yā puna bhikṣuṇī pātrasannicayaṃ kuryān niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4024: pātrasannicayan ti pātran nāma sumbhakaṃ upasambhakaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4028: sannicayaṃ kuryād iti saṃgrahaṃ kuryān nissargikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4036: etaṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇaṃ baddhaṃ pātradhāraṇaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4037: kiñcāpi bhikṣuḥ bahukāny api pātrāṇi vikalpetvā paribhuñjāti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4039: yā puna bhikṣuṇī pātrasannicayaṃ kuryān niḥsargikapācattikaṃ
K01bhivin_u:4045: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ yāvac cīvarāṇi saṃkrāmemaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4046: tāyo dāni anastamite sūrye pravṛttāḥ saṃkrāmayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4056: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4064: etaṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇaṃ baddhañ cīvaradhāraṇaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4065: kiñcāpi bhikṣu bahukāni cīvarāṇi mitrāṇāṃ vikalpayitvā paribhuñjāti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4071: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī cīvarāṇi naiva dhovati na sīveti na rañjeti /
K01bhivin_u:4073: upāśraye nikṣiptā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti /
K01bhivin_u:4076: ārye etāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ dhoviya sīviya phoṣiya prāvṛtā /
K01bhivin_u:4078: ānehi ārye etāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ mahyaṃ eṣā saṃghāṭī /
K01bhivin_u:4079: paśyatha āryamiśrikāyo na kiñcic chakyate upāśraye nikṣipituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4081: dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ca sā dāni tāya saṃghāṭī ācchinnā /
K01bhivin_u:4082: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4085: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇyupāśraye purāṇasaṃghāṭiṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti /
K01bhivin_u:4086: uktvā paścāt svayam eva upādiyeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4093: yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti paścāt svayam eva upādīyeta niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4094: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīupāśraye cīvaraṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti yadi kāci upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchindituṃ
K01bhivin_u:4096: atha dāni na kāyaci upādinnam bhavati tasyā eva ca tāya artho bhavati kiñcāpi gṛhṇāti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4097: atha dāni kṣudrānukṣudrakaṃ pariṣkāraṃ nikṣiptam bhavati yadi kāyaci upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchindituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4099: bhikṣur api bhikṣuvihāre pātram vā cīvaram vā upānaham vā kṣudrānukṣudrakam vā pariṣkāraṃ nikṣipitvā yo icchati so upādīyatū ti /
K01bhivin_u:4100: yadi kenacid upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchincituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4102: atha na kenacid gṛhītam bhavati so eva tenārthiko bhavati kiñcāpi gṛhṇāti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4104: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇy upāśraye purāṇasaṃghāṭiṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti uktvā paścāt svayam eva upādīyeya niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4108: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya purāṇasaṃghāṭī omalinamalinā dhovitvā niḥsīvitvā ātape dattvā vāto ca pravāpito /
K01bhivin_u:4111: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
K01bhivin_u:4113: evan nāma tvaṃ purāṇasaṃghāṭīṃ niḥsīvitvā na pratisaṃdhaisi na pratisandhāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:4116: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo lecchavi kanyāyo sukumārāyo bhārikāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ dhovantīyo kilamyanti /
K01bhivin_u:4117: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4121: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīm gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:4123: yā puna bhikṣuṇī purāṇasaṃghāṭiṃ niḥsīvitvā niḥsivāpetvā vā uttari ṣaṭpañcarātram agilānā na pratisandhāye na pratisandhāpayena niḥsargikapācattikaṃ
K01bhivin_u:4129: uttarīti ṣaṭpañcarātram iti na dāni ṣaṭpañca ca /
K01bhivin_u:4130: atha khalu paramaṃ ṣaṭrātran na pratisandheyaiti svayaṃ na pratisandhāpeyā ti pareṇa /
K01bhivin_u:4134: eṣā dāni bhikṣuṇīye saṃghāṭī malinā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:4135: yadi tāva lahukā bhoti tathā yeva dhovitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:4137: atha dāni sārikā bhoti niḥsīvetvā niḥsīvitvā dhovitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:4139: sāharitvā gopiṭake vā kuṇḍake vā paṭalake vā sthāpayitvā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍena vā upalakhaṇḍena vā ākramitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:4141: atha dāni bhājanan na bhavati ekasthāne ākramiya iṣṭakena vā upalakhaṇḍena vā sthāpayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:4142: paścād antevāsiṇīya vā samānopādhyāyinīyā vā bhikṣuṇīya pratisandhāpayitavyā svayam vā pratisandhetavyā /
K01bhivin_u:4143: atha dāni jarādurbalā vyādhidurbalā vā bhavati kiñcāpi cireṇa pratisandheti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4145: yā puna bhikṣuṇī purāṇasaṃghāṭīn niḥsīvitvā vā niḥsīvāpetvā vā uttari ṣaṭpañcarātraṃ aglānā na pratisandhe vā na pratisandhāpeya vā niḥsargikapācattikaṃ
K01bhivin_u:4153: yadi cīvaram desi tato ham upasampādemi /
K01bhivin_u:4159: evam eva yāva sā vilakṣeti nopasampādeti /
K01bhivin_u:4160: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4163: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām evam uktvā yadi me cīvaraṃ desi tato ham upasampādayiṣyāmīti tāye cīvaraṃ gṛhya nopasampādayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ
K01bhivin_u:4166: yadi me cīvaraṃ desi tato ham upasampādayiṣyan ti /
K01bhivin_u:4167: cīvaran ti cīvaraṃ nāma kambalaṃ karpāsaṃ yāvat saṃkakṣikā /
K01bhivin_u:4169: sā taṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇitvā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī na upasampādayed iti svayan na upasampādayet niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4171: eṣā tāva bhikṣuṇī śikṣyamāṇāyā cīvaraṃ gṛhṇāti /
K01bhivin_u:4174: atha dāni apratibalā bhavati jarādurbalā vyādhidurbalā vā anyā adhyeṣitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:4175: vaktavyā etasyā mayā cīvaraṃ gṛhītvā imām upasthāpehi /
K01bhivin_u:4176: atha sā necchati taṃ cīvaraṃ pratidātavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4178: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī cīvaraṃ gṛhītvā na upasthāpeti na cīvaraṃ pratidadāti niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4181: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamānām evaṃ vaditvā yadi me cīvararaṃ desi tato ham upasaṃpādayiṣyan ti tasyāś cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇītvā na upasaṃpādayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ
K01bhivin_u:4185: aparo dāni vāṇijako śatasahasramūlyaṃ kambalaratanam ādāya uttarā pathāto āgato /
K01bhivin_u:4186: so dāni aparehi pṛcchito kim asya mūlyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4189: naiva rājā krīṇāti na rājaputrāḥ na vaṇijāḥ na sārthavāhāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4190: so dāni vāṇijako vīthīm abhiruhitvā cintāsāgaram anupraviṣṭo āsati /
K01bhivin_u:4191: imaṃ mahārghaṃ mūlyaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ bahuśulkaṃ na vikrāyati /
K01bhivin_u:4199: gaccha eṣā bhadrā nāma śramaṇikā sā krīṇīṣyati /
K01bhivin_u:4200: so dāni taṃ ceṭakasya skandhe āropayitvā bhikṣuṇī vihāraṃ gatvā pṛcchati /
K01bhivin_u:4213: sā dāni na paṇeti na paṇāpeti /
K01bhivin_u:4215: gaccha sālohitaṃ jalpāhi imasya śatasahasraṃ vīthīkāto dāpehīti /
K01bhivin_u:4227: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4232: tad eva sarvaṃ yāvad ām bhagavan /
K01bhivin_u:4234: nanu bhadre paścimā pi nāma janatā avalokayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:4235: tena hi na kṣamati uttari catuṣkarṣeṇa guruprāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4237: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari catuṣkarṣeṇa guruprāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayati ṅissargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4238: uttari catuṣkarṣeṇeti karṣo nāma catvāraḥ purāṇāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4242: tad uttariṃ paraṃ ṣoḍaṣehi purāṇehi cetāpayati niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4244: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī guruprāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayitukāmā bhavati catuṣkarṣamūlyaṃ jānāpayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4245: pratyavaro vā tad uttariṃ na kṣamati /
K01bhivin_u:4246: atha dāni kocid ayācito avijñapto mahārghamūlyaṃ pi dadāti pratigṛhṇāty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4248: kiñcāpi bhikṣur mahārghamūlyaṃ pi jānāpayitvā paribhuñjāty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4250: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari catuṣkarṣamūlyāto guruprāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4264: so dāni tam ādāya bhikṣuṇīvihāraṃ gato /
K01bhivin_u:4278: sā na svayaṃ paṇeti na paṇāpeti /
K01bhivin_u:4280: gaccha sālohitaṃ jalpāhi imasya pīṭhikāto daśapurāṇasahasrāṇi dehīti /
K01bhivin_u:4281: so dāni aparehi pṛcchito vikrītaṃ te bhāṇḍaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4290: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4293: nanu bhadre paścimā pi nāma janatā avalokayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:4294: tena hi na kṣamati uttari aḍḍhātiya karṣamūlyāto sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4295: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:4296: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari aḍḍhātiyakarṣamūlyāto sūkṣmaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4302: niḥsargika pācattikaṃ yāvat yā puna bhikṣuṇī sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ jānāpayati daśapurāṇamūlyaṃ jānāpayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4305: atha dānī kocid ayācito avijñapto mahārghamūlyaṃ pi dadāti śatikam vā sāhasrikam vā yadi kiñcāpi paribhuñjāti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4306: kiñcāpi bhikṣu śatasahasramūlyaṃ pi jānāpayaty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4308: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari aḍḍhātiyakarṣamūlyāto sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ / uddānaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4320: so dāni kāṣṭhavāham ādāya antarāpaṇam okasto /
K01bhivin_u:4339: so dāni manuṣya paśyati yady ahaṃ dvau kārṣāpaṇā labhāmi mah'argham mayā vikrītaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K01bhivin_u:4340: so taṃ adhikaritvā kāṣṭhavāhamūlyaṃ gṛhṇiya śakaṭam āruhitvā tasyāpaṇikasyāgratenopayāti /
K01bhivin_u:4358: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti yāvad bhagavān āha /
K01bhivin_u:4359: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī paropagataṃ cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4361: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya ākāravantena darśanena ākāravantena śramaṇena /
K01bhivin_u:4366: etaṃ dāni āpaṇikasya vā prāvarikasya vā kiñcid bhāṇḍam upagatam bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:4367: tena ca bhikṣuṇī arthīkā bhavati na dāni kṣamati tahiṃ antarāyayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4369: atha khu ekā śca sthitvā pratipālayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4379: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye kiñcid upakreyam bhavati pātram vā cīvaram vā na kṣamati antarā yatituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4381: atha dāni saṃghamadhye vaḍḍho vaḍḍhikāya jānāpayati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4382: bhikṣur api paropagataṃ cetāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:4384: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī paropagataṃ cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4396: caturthaṃ ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pratigrahaṃ uddharitvā na jātarūpaṃ samodahet /
K01bhivin_u:4402: tatra nirdiṣṭā triṃśad daśa ca anūnāḥ kāraṇe samutpanne naiḥsargika bhagavatā nirdiṣṭā bhikṣuṇīsūtre //
K01bhivin_u:4405: 183. ime kho punar āryemiśrikāyo ekacattālaṃ śataṃ śuddhapācattikā dharmāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4461: yathā yeva bhikṣuṇā tathā yeva kartavyāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4465: atha bhadrā kāpileyī antevāsinīye apratisaṃviditā saṃghāṭiṃ prāvaritvā jñātikulaṃ gatā /
K01bhivin_u:4471: sā dāni mārgayati ātmanaḥ saṃghāṭin na paśyati /
K01bhivin_u:4472: tāye dāni bhavati avaśyam āryāya saṃghāṭī prāvaritā /
K01bhivin_u:4473: arhati āryā mama saṃghāṭīṃ prāvaritvā gantuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4475: gacchatha yūyaṃ āryamiśrikāyo nāhaṃ gacchāmi kim arthaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4483: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4487: sā dāni śabdapitā yāvat satyaṃ bhadreti /
K01bhivin_u:4490: yāvad evan nāma tvaṃ cīvarasaṃkramaṇaṃ karoṣi /
K01bhivin_u:4492: tena hi na kṣamati cīvarasaṃkramaṇaṃ kartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4493: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:4495: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cīvarasaṃkramaṇaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4497: peyālaṃ cīvaran ti cīvaraṃ nāma saṃghāṭi yāvat dakaśāṭikā /
K01bhivin_u:4500: na dāni kṣamati antevāsinīye apratisaṃviditā saṃghāṭīṃ prāvarituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4501: atha dāni prāvarati vaktavyā iyam mayā saṃghāṭī prāvaritā /
K01bhivin_u:4502: yadi praviśeṣi mama saṃghāṭīṃ prāvaritvā praviśesi /
K01bhivin_u:4506: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī saṃghāṭiṃ dhoveti vā sīveti vā rañjeti vā /
K01bhivin_u:4507: yadi pratibalā bhavati tasyā api saṃvibhāgaṃ kartavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4509: tiṣṭha tvaṃ iheva ahan tava piṇḍapātasaṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
K01bhivin_u:4513: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cīvarasaṃkramaṇaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4521: gartodaro ca gartodaramātā ca gartodarapitā ca āgarasyānāgariyaṃ pravrajitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4522: gartodarapitā gartodaramātā ca śākyehi pravrajitā gartodaro tīrthikehi /
K01bhivin_u:4523: so dāni hastakambalena prāvṛto śītena khaṇakhaṇāyanto dantavīṇikāṃ vādayanto vihāram āgato /
K01bhivin_u:4529: tāya tasya uttarāsaṅgo surabho suphoṣito dinno prāvaraṇāya /
K01bhivin_u:4530: so dāni prāvaritvā pānāgāraṃ gatvā pibanto āsati /
K01bhivin_u:4531: jano dani ojjhāyati kim eṣāṃ mithyādṛṣṭikānāṃ vinipatitānāṃ yānagardabhānāṃ surābhraṣṭānāṃ ṛṣidhvajanena dinnena bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4532: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4541: tena hi na kṣamati āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ śramaṇacīvaraṃ dātuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4542: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:4544: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ pramāṇacīvaraṃ dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4551: na kṣamati āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ śramaṇacīvaraṃ dātuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4552: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī bhavati kṛtapuṇyā striyo dāni maṅgalārthāya dārakasya dārikāye vā kāṣāya khaṇḍaṃ yācanti /
K01bhivin_u:4553: na kṣamati svahastaṃ dātuṃ kalpiyakārikāya dātavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4554: bhikṣur api āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ śramaṇacīvaraṃ deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:4555: atha dāni bhikṣuḥ kṛtapuṇyo bhavati yāvat kalpiyakārakeṇa dātavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4559: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ śramaṇacīvaraṃ dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4567: tena hi na kṣamati kumārīnivastena antaragṛhaṃ praviśituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4569: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni yathāgatān paṭān navān tantrodgatān puṣpadaśān antaravāsaṃ kurvanti /
K01bhivin_u:4572: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:4574: antarvāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīya prāmāṇiko kārāpayitavyo tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ dīrghaso catvāri vitastiyo /
K01bhivin_u:4576: tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4579: bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīyeti svayaṃ vā kuryāt pareṇa vā kārāpayet /
K01bhivin_u:4582: sugatavitastinā ti tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho tasya yo vitasti so dvyardho mañcakapādo tad uttarim kārāpayed iti paraṃ pramāṇato cchedanapācattikaṃ
K01bhivin_u:4584: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī dīrghaśo karoti prāmāṇikaṃ tiryak karoti atirekaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4587: evaṃ tiryak karoti prāmāṇikaṃ dīrghaśo karoti atirekaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4588: ante karoti prāmāṇikaṃ madhye karoti atirekaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4589: madhye karoti prāmāṇikaṃ ante karoti atirekaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4590: dviguṇaṃ māpeti udakena saṃkucati saṃkucitaṃ māpeti udakena phoṣeti śuṣkaṃ vaḍḍhiṣyatīti pācattikam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:4592: antarvāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīya prāmāṇikaṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4595: tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:4600: tāye dāni pīnehi stanehi cīvaram utkṣiptaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4602: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikāya kīdṛśaṃ cīvaram utkṣiptaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4603: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4608: bhikṣuṇīyo tathāgatān paṭān puṣpadaśān saṃkakṣikāṃ kurvanti /
K01bhivin_u:4609: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati tathāgatān paṭān puṣpadaśān saṃkakṣikāṃ kartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4613: saṃkakṣikāṃ bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīya prāmāṇikā kārāpayitavyā tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4620: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī sarpiṇikāṃ nadīṃ snānāya gatā /
K01bhivin_u:4622: pañca licchavikumārāḥ tāye pratibaddhacittāḥ nadītīre sthitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4624: sā dān āha dīrghāyuḥ gacchatha gacchatha yāvad aham uttarāmi /
K01bhivin_u:4629: dirghāyuḥ kim anena pūtikāyena navadvāreṇāśucipragharantena dṛṣṭena /
K01bhivin_u:4634: te dāni yadā na gacchanti cirañ ca bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:4635: sā dāni andho bālajano ti kṛtvā ekaṃ hastam agrato kṛtvā aparaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā uttīrṇā /
K01bhivin_u:4636: te tāṃ vivasanāṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitāḥ patitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4642: paśya bhagavan katham iya pañca licchavikumārāḥ pratibaddhacittāḥ bhadrāyāṃ mūrcchitāḥ patitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4644: naitarhi yeva ete bhadrāyāṃ pratibaddhacittāḥ mūrcchitāḥ patitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4645: anyadāpy ete bhadrāyāṃ pratibaddhacittāḥ anyadāpi bhagavan anyadāpi bhikṣuṇīyo /
K01bhivin_u:4646: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo atītam adhvānaṃ yāvat triṃśabhavane /
K01bhivin_u:4647: anyatarasmiṃ bhavane bharaṇī nāma apsarā upapannā /
K01bhivin_u:4648: prāsādikā darśanīyā atirivānyāsām apsarāṇāṃ abhibhūya bhāsate /
K01bhivin_u:4649: atirivānyāsām apsarāṇāṃ abhibhūya bhāsate tapati virājate /
K01bhivin_u:4657: na tāvad eṣā śakyā asmābhiḥ pañcadhā kartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4659: yo 'tra sarvasuṣṭhu adhyavasito bhaviṣyati sa grahīṣyatīti /
K01bhivin_u:4661: utthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā āsane na labhate sukhaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4662: śayito ca sukhaṃ labhe yadā kāmā jahanti mā // [1] //
K01bhivin_u:4664: sukhaṃ tvam asi devendra yaṃ supto labhase sukhaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4665: bheryā saṃgrāmaśīrṣe vā sadā kāmā hananti māṃ // [2] //
K01bhivin_u:4667: bheryās tu hanyamānāyā bhaved vīcī muhur muhuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4668: kāṣṭhasrotā upapannaṃ vā sadā kāmā hananti me // [3] //
K01bhivin_u:4673: sarve bhavanto sukhitā yeṣāṃ gāthā pratibhānti /
K01bhivin_u:4674: ahaṃ khalu na jānāmi kiṃ jīvāmi marāmi vā // [5] //
K01bhivin_u:4676: tvaṃ suṣṭhu adhyavasito tathaiva eṣā bharaṇī /
K01bhivin_u:4679: syād vo bhikṣuṇiyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā bharaṇī nāma apsarā abhūṣi /
K01bhivin_u:4682: anye te devaputrāḥ etad eva te pañca licchavikumārāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4686: kasya bhagavan karmaṇo vipākena bhadrā prāsādikā darśanīyā mahākulīnā maheśākhyā mahābhogā kṣiprādhigamā ca /
K01bhivin_u:4687: atha khalu bhagavān bhadrāṃ kāpileyīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:4688: pratibhātu te bhadre bhikṣuṇīnām ātmopanāyikāṃ pūrvenivāsapratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4689: atha khalu bhadrā anekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsam anusmarantī bhikṣuṇīyo āmantreti /
K01bhivin_u:4690: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhaginyaḥ atītam adhvānaṃ nagaraṃ vārāṇasī kāśījanapado /
K01bhivin_u:4692: sā dāni anyatarāya śreṣṭhibhāryāya śabdāpitā keśān prasādhanāya /
K01bhivin_u:4695: atha śuṇṭhīka nāma pratyekabuddho piṇḍapātāya caranto tasmin gṛhe piṇḍāya praviṣṭo /
K01bhivin_u:4698: sā dāni strī tāṃ śreṣṭhibhāryāṃ āha /
K01bhivin_u:4701: kā imasyaivaṃ durvarṇasya alpeśākhyasya bhikṣān dāsyati /
K01bhivin_u:4707: āryadhīte dehi me yan mamādyabhaktaṃ tvayā dātavyam tam aham imasya dadāmi /
K01bhivin_u:4709: yan tavādyabhaktaṃ prāpuṇati taṃ gṛhītvā udake prakṣipāhi etasya vā dehīti /
K01bhivin_u:4711: hastasyaivaṃ kṛtvā prasādena tasya pratyekabuddhasya dattaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4712: sa pratyekabuddhas vata eva vaihāyase prakrāntaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4713: sā dāni dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭā /
K01bhivin_u:4714: śreṣṭhinā ca dṛṣṭo gṛhāto ṛṣī vaihāyasena prakrānto /
K01bhivin_u:4723: imāya daridrastriyāya dattaṃ śreṣṭhī utkaṇṭhito īdṛśo dakṣiṇīyo mama gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo na ca saṃmānito /
K01bhivin_u:4724: so dāni śreṣṭhī tāṃ striyam āha /
K01bhivin_u:4725: dehi me etaṃ puṇyaṃ yaṃ tvayā adya sañcitaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4726: dadāmi te prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇaṃ / sā dān āha / sā dān āha /
K01bhivin_u:4727: kṣīyati sarvaṃ dhanadhānyaṃ jātarūpaṃ rajataṃ ca /
K01bhivin_u:4728: na kṣīyante puṇyephalaṃ dattaṃ munīnāṃ sarvathā / [7] //
K01bhivin_u:4729: yad aham evaṃ daridrā para vaktavyā anyathā /
K01bhivin_u:4731: durvarṇatāya mucye haṃ avaikalyatā ca bhogehi /
K01bhivin_u:4733: evaṃ caṅkrameyaṃ na bhe yathā caṅkramase vīra /
K01bhivin_u:4736: bhavāmi muditā [ḥ ḥ] dattvā ṛṣisya āhāraṃ / [11] //
K01bhivin_u:4743: syād vo bhaginyaḥ anyā sā daridrā strī naitad evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4745: yaṃ so mayā pratyekabuddho piṇḍapātena pratimānito prasannacittāya tasya karmaṇo vipākenāhaṃ prāsādikā /
K01bhivin_u:4747: api tu bhaginyaḥ naitad evaṃ mayā kuśalamūlam avaropitaṃ yenāhaṃ prāsādikā darśanīyā /
K01bhivin_u:4750: 189. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhaginyo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasīyaṃ nagare kāyaci striyāya lohacakraṃ
K01bhivin_u:4751: paṭalake kṛtvā puṣpehi okiritvā kāśikena vastreṇa praticchādeyitvā bhagavato kāśyapasya dattaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4753: rathasya cakraṃ sanābhinemikaṃ vastrottamena praticchādayitvā ye munivarasākṣikṛtā hi dharmā aham api taṃ sākṣikaromi dharmaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4754: sā dāni kenacit kāryeṇa aparādhinī svāminā avasāditā /
K01bhivin_u:4761: tatra ca nātidūre bhagavato kāśyapasya stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasādajātā /
K01bhivin_u:4765: sā prasannacittā tāni alaṅkārāṇi muñcitvā stūpe avakiritvā kāśikena vastreṇācchādayitvā candanenānulimpitvā praṇidhānaṃ akārṣīt /
K01bhivin_u:4767: sa ca me dharman deśeya tasyāhaṃ dharman deśitam ājāneyan ti /
K01bhivin_u:4770: apsarasahasraparivṛtā sā tahiṃ yāvadāyuḥ sthitvā tataś cyavitvā manuṣyeṣūpapannāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4772: tāye dāni jñātikehi bhadreti nāma kṛtaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4773: anarthikā kāmaguṇehi pañcahi yā niṣkramitvā pravrajitā sarvāsravakṣayam akārṣīt /
K01bhivin_u:4774: kāśikāni vastrāṇi pratyagraṃ cānulepanaṃ bhagavato kāśyapasya yā prasannābhiropayet /
K01bhivin_u:4775: sā kāpileyī bhagavato pādāṃ vandati śāstuno /
K01bhivin_u:4779: paśya bhagavan katham iyaṃ bhadrā sthaviramahākāśyapena sārdhaṃ pravrajitā /
K01bhivin_u:4781: na etarhi yeva ete ubhaye pravrajitā /
K01bhivin_u:4784: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo atītam adhvānaṃ catvāro rājaṛṣayaḥ kumbhakārakule vāsam upagatāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4786: nimī rājā videhānāṃ ugrasenaś ca kṣatriyaḥ // [13] //
K01bhivin_u:4787: ete catvāro rājaṛṣayaḥ ugratejā mahābalā kumbhakārakule vāsa ekarātram upāgamat /
K01bhivin_u:4789: kiṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vā pravrajyām ārocatha /
K01bhivin_u:4794: śabda dvitīyā tu samāgatā yato ramāgatā yato
K01bhivin_u:4820: ayam eva kālo nahi anyad asti /
K01bhivin_u:4824: āmaṃ pakvan na jānanti atha loṇam aloṇakaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4829: nimī rājā bodhisattvaḥ kaliṅga pi śārisutaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4830: ugrasenaś ca maudgalyo ānando āsi bhārgavo /
K01bhivin_u:4831: kumbhakāraḥ kāśyapo āsi bhadrā sā kumbhakārikā // [26] //
K01bhivin_u:4835: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni tathāgatān paṭān dakaśāṭikāṃ kurvanti /
K01bhivin_u:4837: tena hi na kṣamati yathāgataṃ paṭaṃ dakaśāṭikāṃ kartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4843: tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpaye cchedanapācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4844: dakaśāṭikā ti yā sā bhagavatā anujñātā /
K01bhivin_u:4845: kārāpayantīye ti svayaṃ kuryāt pareṇa vā kārāpaye /
K01bhivin_u:4846: prāmāṇikan ti tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ catvāri vitastiyo /
K01bhivin_u:4847: sugatavitastinā ti sugato nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho tasya yo vitasti so dvy ardho mañcakapādo tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpaye pācattikaṃ
K01bhivin_u:4848: atha dāni ekānte nikuñje pradeśe snāyanti vinā dakaśāṭikāya anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4849: bhikṣur api vinā dakaśāṭikāya snāyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:4850: atha nikuñjapradeśe snāyati vinā dakaśāṭikāya anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4862: śakyasi ārye saṃghasya kṛtena paṭān yācituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4878: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ yāvad bhagavān āha /
K01bhivin_u:4879: yā puna bhikṣuṇī durbalāya cīvarapratyāśāya saṃghasya kaṭhināstāraṃ vyatināmayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4882: cīvarapratyāśāyeti cīvaraṃ nāma kālaṃ yāvat kṣaumunikā /
K01bhivin_u:4884: vyatināmayed iti atikrāmayet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4889: atha khalu ye pratibalāḥ pitā putrā vā bhrātarau vā bhaginīyo vā jñātisambandhā vā gotrasambandhā vā te yācitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:4891: atha dān āhaṃsuḥ jñāsyāma jñāsyāma iti vaktavyā /
K01bhivin_u:4893: atha dāni apratibalā bhavati utsāhayitavyā sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya kaṭhinavivarārthāya /
K01bhivin_u:4894: utsahayitvā naiva yācati naiva yāvayeti na bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasyārocayati na labhyatīti pācattikam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:4896: bhikṣur api durbalāya cīvarapratyāśāya saṃghasya kaṭhināstāraṃ vyatināmayeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:4898: yā puna bhikṣuṇī durbalāya cīvarapratyāśāya saṃghasya kaṭhināstāraṃ vyatināmayet pācattikaṃ / phu //
K01bhivin_u:4902: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo sāntararottareṇa prāvṛtā bhagavato pādavandikā āgatā tāsāṃ nirgatānāṃ agnidāha utpannaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4904: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4908: etaṃ va ta dāni yūyaṃ pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharatha /
K01bhivin_u:4912: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākīyakanyāyo ca mallakanyāyo ca kolitakanyāyo ca sukumārapravrajitā ca /
K01bhivin_u:4914: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4918: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:4921: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharati pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4923: pārihārikaṃ cīvaran ti saṃghāṭī yāvat dakaśāṭikā /
K01bhivin_u:4925: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ padaṃ bhagavatā anāpattiḥ gilānāya /
K01bhivin_u:4926: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharati pācattikam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:4927: atha dāni cetiyaṃ vandati caṅkramati vā anto sīmam vā gacchati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4928: bhikṣur api pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:4930: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharati pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4934: bhadrāye dāni kāpileyīye jñātikulāto devasikaṃ bhaktam ānīyati /
K01bhivin_u:4947: asmākaṃ gṛhe na evaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ pacyati /
K01bhivin_u:4952: te dāni gṛhaṃ gatvā tā dāsīyo daṇḍakaśāhatāyo kṛtāyo /
K01bhivin_u:4953: itikitikāye dhītaro evam ettakam upakaraṇaṃ dadāmo yūyam asphātikaṃ karotha /
K01bhivin_u:4961: tena hi na kṣamati parāhṛtaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā pacitum vā pacāyitum vā bhṛjjitum vā bhṛjjāpayitum vā /
K01bhivin_u:4964: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiyakanyāyo ca kolitakanyāyo ca piṇḍāya carantīyo /
K01bhivin_u:4971: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:4973: yāvat labhyaṃ bhagavan bhikṣuṇīya tūṣṇīṃ kṛtvā bhoktuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4975: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:4977: yā puna bhikṣuṇī parāhṛtaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyam vā puno puno pacitvā vā pacāpetvā
K01bhivin_u:4978: vā bhṛjjitvā vā bhṛjjāpetvā vā kaṭhitvā vā kaṭhāpetvā vā agilānā khādaye vā bhuñjeya vā pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:4981: parāhṛtan ti grāmato vā ānītaṃ nagarato vā ānītaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4982: khādanīyan ti khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyan ti bhojanīyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4989: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattir gilānāye /
K01bhivin_u:4991: jarādurbalā vā bhoti vyādhidurbalā vā bhuktvā vā vamati /
K01bhivin_u:4992: aphāsuṃ vā bhoti idam atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4993: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī rasagṛdhyā parāhṛtaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ puno puno paceya vā pacāpeya vā pācāttikam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:4994: atha dāni śītalam bhavati labhyā uṣṇīkartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4995: na dāni thālikāya vā piṭharikāya vā /
K01bhivin_u:4996: atha khalu tāmrapātreṇa vā kupātreṇa vā kāṃsikāya vā uṣṇīkartavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:4997: bhikṣur api svayaṃ pacati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:4999: atha dāni śītalo bhavati piṇḍapāto uṣṇīkaroti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5001: yā puna bhikṣuṇī parāhṛtaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam va puno pacitvā vā pacāpetva
K01bhivin_u:5002: vā bhṛjjitvā vā bhṛjjāpayitvā vā kaṭhitvā vā kaṭhāpayitvā vā agilānā khādeya vā bhuñjeya
K01bhivin_u:5007: gartodaro ca gartodaramātā ca gartodarapitā ca agārasyānagāriyaṃ pravrajitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5008: gartodarapitā ca gartodaramātā ca śākyehi pravrajitā gartodara tirthakeṣu /
K01bhivin_u:5009: gatodarapitā bhuñjati gartodaramātā vījayantī agrato tiṣṭhati pānīyamallakaṃ dhāreti /
K01bhivin_u:5010: so dāni tāye kānicit kānicit pūrvacaritāni jalpati /
K01bhivin_u:5019: agrapariṣā eṣā na labhyā evaṃ kartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5021: ayaṃ khalu akhalla akuśalo aprakṛtijño adyāpi yāni tāni ajalpitavyāni jalpati /
K01bhivin_u:5022: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5026: evaṃ ca dāni bhikṣuṃ bhuñjantaṃ dakavījanena upasthihasi /
K01bhivin_u:5027: tena hi na kṣamati dakavījanena upasthihituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5029: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṃ bhuñjantaṃ dakavījanena upasthiheya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5033: bhuñjantaṃ ti pañcajātakam vā pañcajātakasaṃsṛṣtam vā yad vā kiñcit khādyaṃ bhojyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5037: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī udakamallakan dhārayati nīvījanaṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5038: vījayati na udakamallakan dhāreti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5041: sā eṣā āpattiḥ ekasya bhikṣusya ekabhikṣuṇīye /
K01bhivin_u:5042: atha dāni saṃbahulā bhikṣū bhavanti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5043: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye pitā vā bhrātā vā bhikṣur bhavati kiñcāpi vījayaty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5045: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṃ bhuñjantaṃ dakavījanena upasthiheya pācattikaṃ // 0 //
K01bhivin_u:5051: tā dāni ṣaḍvargiṇīyo khādanti pi mardenti pi ujjhenti pi viśrāṇenti pi ādāya pi gacchanti /
K01bhivin_u:5052: so dāni kadācit vāṭaṃ pratyavekṣituṅ gataḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5053: tena dāni so dṛṣṭo vāṭo vidhvasto /
K01bhivin_u:5057: laśunena tāyo dāni khādanti mardenti pi ujjhenti pi viśrāṇenti pi ādāya pi gacchanti /
K01bhivin_u:5062: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5064: yā puna bhikṣuṇī laśunaṃ khādeya pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:5065: laśunan ti laśunaṃ nāma jātimaṃ sevimaṃ nāgaraṃ kaccharuhaṃ pārvateyaṃ brahmadeyaṃ āvarantakaṃ māgadhakaṃ kosalakaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5066: yaṃ cā punar anya pi kiñcil laśunaṃ sarvaṃ laśunaṃ na kṣamati /
K01bhivin_u:5067: āman na kṣamati pakvan na kṣamati /
K01bhivin_u:5070: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīya gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā bhavati labhyan taṃ mrakṣituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5071: mrakṣayitvā na kṣamati abhyāgame pradeśe sthātuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5072: atha khu pratigupte pradeśe sthātavyaṃ yāvad varttā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:5075: yā puna bhikṣuṇī laśunaṃ khādeya pācattikaṃ // 1 //
K01bhivin_u:5088: sā dāni tāsāṃ bhāgineyakānāṃ nānāprakāraṃ khajjaṃ bhojjaṃ bhakṣayitvā deti /
K01bhivin_u:5090: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā śraddhādeyaṃ gṛhiṇān dadāti /
K01bhivin_u:5091: etam prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5094: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
K01bhivin_u:5098: tena hi na kṣamati āgārikasya svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ dātuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5100: gartodaro ca gartodarapitā ca gartodaramātā ca agārasyānagāriyaṃ pravrajitā /
K01bhivin_u:5103: yāvat sa gartodaramātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrānto tāya gartodaramātāya tasya nānāprakārasya khajjakasya pūraṃ pātraṃ dinnaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5104: so dāni taṃ gṛhya pānāgāraṃ gatvā ātmanā ca khādati pārāṃś ca chandeti /
K01bhivin_u:5118: tena hi na kṣamati āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dātuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5121: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5132: yadi tāvad asya kiñcid dātuṃ bhavati na kṣamati svahastaṃ dātuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5134: atha dāni kalpiyakārī na bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5143: atha dāni pravrajitako āgacchati na kṣamati svahastaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dātuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5145: atha dāni kalpiyakārī na bhavati ato yeva gṛhṇīya khādāhīti /
K01bhivin_u:5147: sālohite kim asmākaṃ caṇḍālehi viya pravartasi /
K01bhivin_u:5150: atha dāni grāmāntaraṃ gacchati labhyan tena kalpiyakṛtyaṃ kārāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5151: ato ātmā ca khādatha asmākañ ca pratigrāhatha /
K01bhivin_u:5155: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dadyāt pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:5160: sā dāni rājakulehi amātyakulehi āpaṇikakulehi śreṣṭhikulehi strīṇāṃ bastiṃ sthapeti /
K01bhivin_u:5162: añjanaṃ pratyañjanaṃ vamanaṃ virecanaṃ svedakarma nastakarma śastrakarma bhaiṣajyām anuprayacchati /
K01bhivin_u:5163: sā upasarpaṇaṃ bhavati khajjaṃ bhojjaṃ labhati /
K01bhivin_u:5166: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5175: tena hi na kṣamati cikitsitavidyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5178: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cikitsitavidyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5179: cikitsitavidyā nāma ahividyā viṣavidyā yāvad grahacaritaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5184: bhikṣur api cikitsitavidyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5186: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cikitsitavidyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:5196: na kṣamati cikitsituṃ bhagavatā śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5197: api tu eṣa detha mama kiñcid vāciṣyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5198: sā āgārikāṃś ca parivrājakāṃś ca cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayati /
K01bhivin_u:5202: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikam vā parivrājakam vā cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5206: cikitsitavidyām iti ahividyā viṣavidyā yāvad grahacaritaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5209: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye āgārikam vā parivrājakam vā cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5211: bhikṣur api cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayati vinayātikramam āsādyati /
K01bhivin_u:5213: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikam vā parivrājakam vā cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayet pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:5217: viśākhāya dāni mṛgāramātāya ubhayato saṃgho bhaktenopanimantrito /
K01bhivin_u:5218: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kalyato yevāgatvā āhaṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5219: upāsike yaṃ dāni tvayā ubhayato saṃgho bhaktenopanimantrito kin dāni vayam upāsikāya upakāraṃ karoma /
K01bhivin_u:5225: evam etad api tu upakāraṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5226: tāyo dāni talakam abhiruhitvā karpāsaṃ gṛhītvā anyāhi cikitsitaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5234: naiṣa mama upakāro yaṃ mamāryamiśrikā piñjeyur vā loḍheyur vā vikaḍḍheyur vā karteyur vā /
K01bhivin_u:5235: eṣo mamopakāro yam āryamiśrikā matsakāśād bhuktvā uddiśatha svādhyāyetha yāvad buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyetha /
K01bhivin_u:5236: yat tāya upāsikāya avadhyāpitaṃ taṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5237: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5241: tena hi na kṣamati gṛhivaiyāpṛtyaṃ kartuṃ / yāvat /
K01bhivin_u:5242: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhivaiyāpṛtyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5245: vaiyāpṛtyam iti karteya vā piñjeya vā yāvat /
K01bhivin_u:5246: ohaneya vā pīṣeya vā paceya vā sīveya vā /
K01bhivin_u:5247: yā punar anya pi kiñcid gṛhivaiyāpṛtyam kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5253: āryamiśrikāhi sāhāyyaṃ kartavyam iti kiñcāpi gandham vā pīṣayati /
K01bhivin_u:5255: bhikṣur api gṛhivaiyāpṛtyaṃ karoti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5257: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhivaiyāpṛtyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ // 4 //
K01bhivin_u:5261: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī madhyāhne vighane aparaṃ kulam upasaṃkrāntā /
K01bhivin_u:5262: tahin dāni dve bhāryāpatikā kleṣotpīḍitā raho saṃjñino maithunaṃ pratiṣetukāmāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5263: sā dāni apratisaṃviditā sahasā tahiṃ praviṣṭā /
K01bhivin_u:5264: so dāni manuṣyo uddhāvito utkaṇṭhito karmaṇy enāṃ rājā tena parivāteti /
K01bhivin_u:5265: imān tāvad itikitikāya dhītāṃ śramaṇikāṃ viṭṭālayiṣyan ti /
K01bhivin_u:5268: manāsmi āryamiśrikāyo brahmacaryāto cyāvitā yāvad etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5271: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī sambhojanīyaṃ kulan divā pūrve apratisaṃvicitā upasaṃkrāmasi /
K01bhivin_u:5272: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:5275: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī saṃbhojanīyaṃ kulaṃ divā pūrve apratisaṃviditā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5277: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
K01bhivin_u:5279: yahiṃ strīpuruṣakaṃ sthālīpiṭharakaṃ kaṇṭikāmusalakaṃ sūpellakaṃ yavaprasthakaṃ imaṃ paścimakaṃ kulaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5280: sambhojanīyan ti strī puruṣasya bhojanaṃ puruṣasyāpi strī bhojanaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5281: yadi vigate madhyāhne pūrve apratisaṃviditā ti aśabdakarṇikāya /
K01bhivin_u:5282: anāhūtā upasaṃkrameyā ti praviśet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5283: yaṃ dāni jñāyate etaṃ saṃbhojanīyaṃ kulan ti nahi kṣamati tahiṃ pūrve apratisaṃviditaṃ anāhūtāya upasaṃkramituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5290: yadi praviśitvā na niṣkrāmati na kṣamati praviśituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5291: atha dāni tuṇutuṇā śabdo bhavati acchaṭikā dātavyā utkāśitavyaṃ vā /
K01bhivin_u:5292: yadi tāva tūṣṇīkā bhavati na kṣamati praviśituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5293: atha dāni pratyudgacchanti svāgatam āryāyeti praviśeti praveṣṭavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5294: bhikṣur api saṃvidito upasamkramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5296: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī saṃbhojanīye kule divā upasaṃkrameya pūrve apratisaṃviditā anāhūtā pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:5300: yā dāni sā kālīyan triyantarā licchavidhītā pravrājitā /
K01bhivin_u:5301: sā dāni āgārikehi ca prāvrājakehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati /
K01bhivin_u:5302: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5305: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:5307: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ārāmikair vā parivrājikair vā saṃsṛṣṭā vihareya divasaṃ vā muhūrtaṃ vā antamasato ārāmikaśramaṇoddeśehi pācattikam //
K01bhivin_u:5314: saṃsṛṣṭā vihared iti kāyikena saṃsargeṇa vācikena saṃsargeṇa /
K01bhivin_u:5316: divasam vā muhūrtam vā antamasato tatkṣaṇantallavaṃ tanmuhūrtam vā antamasato /
K01bhivin_u:5319: śramaṇ'uddeśā iti pañcadaśavarṣān upādāya yāvat saptatikāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5320: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ārāmikehi vā parivrājakehi vā saṃsṛṣṭā viharati pācattikaṃ /
