K01bhivin_u:5321: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīyo anyamanyaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti viharanty abhiratā vivecayitavyāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5323: trir api bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5325: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ārāmikair vā parivrājikair vā sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharet divasam vā muhūrtam vā antamasato ārāmikaśramaṇ'uddeśakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pācattikaṃ
K01bhivin_u:5329: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi sārdhaṃ kalahaṃ karoti /
K01bhivin_u:5330: sā dāni yādā parājītā bhavati tadā upasampati /
K01bhivin_u:5346: yā pi bhadrāyaṇī mām evam āha sā py evam bhavatu /
K01bhivin_u:5347: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5352: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvad bhagavān āha /
K01bhivin_u:5353: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upaśapantī viharet ātmānaṃ sandhāya parām vā sandhāya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5358: yāvat sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ sandhāya param vā upaśapati pācattikam /
K01bhivin_u:5361: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upaśapantī vihared ātmānaṃ vā sandhāya paraṃ vā pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:5365: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi sārdhaṃ kalahaṃ karoti /
K01bhivin_u:5366: sā yadā parājitā bhavati tadā ātmānaṃ khaṭacapeṭamustakehi piṭṭāyati /
K01bhivin_u:5369: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5371: satyaṃ tvaṃ nande evaṃ nāma bhikṣuṇīhi sārdhaṃ kalahaṃ karoṣi /
K01bhivin_u:5376: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande naiṣa dharmo yāvat tena hi na kṣamati ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5377: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:5378: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodeya pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:5381: ātmānaṃ hanitvā ti khaṭehi vā pāṣāṇehi vā yāvad anyena vā kenacit /
K01bhivin_u:5382: rodeyā ti aśruṇi vā pravartayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5384: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ hanti na rodayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5386: hanati ca rodati ca pācattikam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5388: bhikṣur api ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5390: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodeya pācattikaṃ // 8 //
K01bhivin_u:5394: sthūlanandāya dāni bhikṣūṇīya jetā bhikṣuṇī kulehi saṃvarṇitā /
K01bhivin_u:5395: sā jetā bhikṣuṇī bhadrikā kulāny upasaṃkramati prāsādikenātikrāntena pratikrāntenāvalokitena
K01bhivin_u:5396: vyavalokitena saṃmiñjitena prasāritena saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇena anuddhatā anunnaḍā
K01bhivin_u:5402: sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī anākalpasampannā anīryāpathasampannā omalinamalinehi cīvarehi
K01bhivin_u:5403: pāṭitavipaṭitehi vaḍḍaḍiṅgarapuṣṭālaṃbehi stanehi vaḍḍehi sphicakehi uddhatā unnaḍā
K01bhivin_u:5405: te tasyā na gauravaṃ kurvanti na nimantrayanti /
K01bhivin_u:5407: paśyatha āryamiśrikāyo mamaivāryā jetā kulehi saṃvarṇitā mahy'evāvarṇaṃ bravīti /
K01bhivin_u:5411: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5415: yāvad eva nāma tvaṃ duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyasi /
K01bhivin_u:5416: tena hi na kṣamati duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyasi /
K01bhivin_u:5417: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:5419: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣūṇīnām evaṃ vadeya /
K01bhivin_u:5421: tato itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye bhagavaty āghāto apratyaya iti duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:5423: bhikṣuṇīnāṃ evam vadeyā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī yāvad āham ārye amukaṃ kulan
K01bhivin_u:5424: ti kulan nāma kṣatriyakulaṃ kulan nāma kṣatriyakulaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ rājanyakulaṃ yāni
K01bhivin_u:5426: tato itthannāmāye ti yathā jetā pi bhikṣuṇīye /
K01bhivin_u:5427: bhagavaty āghāta iti na ca āghātavastūni asthānaprakopadaśamāni /
K01bhivin_u:5428: apratyaya iti duḥśrutena duravadhāriteneti na ākāravantena darśanena na ākāravantena śramaṇena kṣiyādharmam āpadyeyā ti avadhyāpeya pācattikaṃ
K01bhivin_u:5429: yāvat prajñaptiḥ na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5431: bhikṣur api duḥśrutena dur avadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5433: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnām evam vadeya yadāham ārye amukaṃ kulaṃ upasamkramāmi /
K01bhivin_u:5434: tato itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye bhagavaty āghāto 'pratyaya iti duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ // 9 //
K01bhivin_u:5438: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaram ādāya mahātmehi kulehi dvārakoṣṭhakehi tiṣṭhati /
K01bhivin_u:5440: praviśantu āryāḥ praviśantu āryamiśrāḥ asmākaṃ kṛtena sidhyati /
K01bhivin_u:5441: agrapiṇḍan tāvad dattvā yuṣmākaṃ prathamānām eva paścād ātmanā paribhuñjiṣyan ti /
K01bhivin_u:5449: surābhrastā yānā gardabhāḥ nagnāḥ ahrīkāḥ anotrāpiṇo mithyādṛṣṭikāḥ vinipatitāḥ praviśatha yuṣmākaṃ kṛtena sidhyati /
K01bhivin_u:5450: yuṣmākam agrapiṇḍan tāvad dattvā prathamānām eva paścād ātmānaṃ paribhokṣyan ti /
K01bhivin_u:5455: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5464: duṣkṛtan te nande yāvad evan nāma tvaṃ kulamātsaryaṃ karoṣi /
K01bhivin_u:5465: tena hi na kṣamati kulamātsaryaṃ karoṣi /
K01bhivin_u:5466: tena hi na kṣamati kulamātsaryaṃ kartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5467: atha khalu bhagavān māhāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:5470: yā puna bhikṣuṇī kulamātsaryaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5472: kulamātsaryan ti āvaraṇaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5475: yadi tāvad bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā pṛcchati bhūto guṇo vaktavyo /
K01bhivin_u:5476: atha dāni anyatīrthikā pṛcchanti mā ete mithyādṛṣṭiṃ grāhayiṣyantīti bhṛkuṭiṃ karoti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5477: bhikṣur api kulamātsaryaṃ karoti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5479: yā puna bhikṣuṇī kulamātsaryaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ / ḷṃ // uddānaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5489: gartodaro ca gartodaramātā ca gartodarapitā ca āgārasyānagāriyaṃ pravrajitāh / pe /
K01bhivin_u:5492: so dāni tāye kānicit pūrvacaritāni jalpati strīutsadadauṣṭhulyāni yāni tasyā amanaāpāni /
K01bhivin_u:5498: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5504: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṃ sammukham ākrośituṃ paribhāṣituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5506: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhikṣuṃ sammukham ākrośayed roṣayed paribhāṣayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5509: ākrośayed iti akāraśakāraekāraiḥ roṣayet paribhāṣayet caṇḍālu /
K01bhivin_u:5511: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣuṃ sammukham ākrośituṃ roṣituṃ paribhāṣitum /
K01bhivin_u:5513: atha bhikṣuṇyā pitā vā bhrātā jñātiko vā pravrajitako bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:5514: so ca bhavati uddhato unnaḍo asamāhito labhyā dāni so vaktuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5518: sālohita idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā tvaṃ śikṣiṣyasi /
K01bhivin_u:5521: idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi yadā maṇḍaladvāram anuprāpto bhaviṣyasi /
K01bhivin_u:5522: bhikṣuṇāpi bhikṣuṇīyo na kṣamati sammukham ākrośituṃ muṇḍastrī veśyastrī ti / pe /
K01bhivin_u:5523: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṃ samukham ākrośati pācattikaṃ //1 //
K01bhivin_u:5527: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni ekavarṣā dvivarṣā yāvat ṣaṭvarṣā upasthāpenti /
K01bhivin_u:5529: tā indragavā iva vardhanti śivacchagalā viya vardhanti /
K01bhivin_u:5530: anākalpasampannā anīryapathasampannā na jānanti katham upādhyāyinīye pratipattavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5537: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ / pe /
K01bhivin_u:5541: etad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
K01bhivin_u:5544: tena hi na kṣamati ūnadvādaśodakavarṣāya upasthāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5545: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:5546: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:5547: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:5549: ūnadvādaśavarṣā ti ūnadvādaśavarṣā nāma ūnadvādaśodakavarṣo ūnadvādaśo samvatsaro ūnadvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:5551: ūnadvādaśodakavarṣo atireko dvādaśo samvatsaro ūnadvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:5558: akṛtāhi dvihi pravāraṇāhi upasampādeti ūnadvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:5562: hemante upasampannā tena dvādaśamena upasampādeti kṛtāyāṃ pravāraṇāyāṃ pūradvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:5564: evaṃ purimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ upasampannā kṛtāyāṃ pravāraṇāyām upasampādeti pūradvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:5565: paścimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ upasampannā tena dvādaśamena upasampādeti kṛtāhi dvihi pravāraṇāhi pūradvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:5567: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣā upasthāpayati pācattikaṃ pravrājayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5568: bhikṣur api ūnadvādaśavarṣo upasampādayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5570: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:5576: tena dāni kālena tena samayena ṣaḍvargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo pūradvādaśavarṣā bhavanti /
K01bhivin_u:5581: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ / pe /
K01bhivin_u:5583: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
K01bhivin_u:5586: tena hi na kṣamati anaṅgopetāya upasthāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5587: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:5589: pūradvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati sā ca anaṅgopetā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5591: sā ca anaṅgopetā iti aṅgopetā nāma yasyā daśāṅgāni samvidyante saṃyathaīdaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5598: pratibalā bhavaty āpattim āpannāṃ vyutthāpayitum vā vyutthāpāyayitum vā // 7 //
K01bhivin_u:5599: pratibalā bhavaty āpadāsu vyupakarṣayituṃ vā vyupakarṣāpayitum vā // 8 //
K01bhivin_u:5600: pratibalā bhavati gilānam upasthihitum vā upasthāpayitum vā // 0 //
K01bhivin_u:5602: yasyā imāni daśāṅgāni samvidyante iyam ucyate aṅgopetā /
K01bhivin_u:5607: sā eṣā anaṅgopetā pravrājayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5609: bhikṣur api anaṅgopeto pravrājayati upasampādayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5611: pūradvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati sā ca anaṅgopetā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ // 3 //
K01bhivin_u:5617: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo dvādaśavarṣā aṅgopetāyo upasthāpayanti /
K01bhivin_u:5619: asty eṣā dvādaśavarṣā na punar jñāyate /
K01bhivin_u:5621: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayaṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5626: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ iyam itthannāmā bhikṣunī dvādaśavarṣā aṅgopetā /
K01bhivin_u:5628: yaciṣyati āryamiśrikā itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī dvādaśavarṣā aṅgopetā upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ saṃghaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5629: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etan dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:5634: sādhu bata me āryā saṃgho upasthāpanāsammutin detu /
K01bhivin_u:5639: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśavarṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ dadyāt /
K01bhivin_u:5644: tāye saṃgho itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśavarṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanāsaṃmutin deti /
K01bhivin_u:5645: yāsām āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśavarṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanāsammutin dīyamānāṃ saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:5650: dinnā aryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśavarṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanāsammuti saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:5651: kṣamati taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:5652: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:5653: pūradvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati aṅgopetā sā ca asammatā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5654: aṅgopetā iti daśabhir aṅgehi bhikṣuṇī aṅgopetā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:5657: anaṅgopetā ca asammatā tam ca se karma kurvanti jñaptivipannaṃ gaṇavipannaṃ anuśrāvaṇāvipannaṃ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ evam eṣā asammatā /
K01bhivin_u:5659: sā eṣa bhikṣuṇī asammatā upasthāpayati pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5662: pūra dvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati aṅgopetāsā ca asammatā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //4 //
K01bhivin_u:5666: yā sā kālīya bhikṣuṇīya triyantarā lecchavidhītā pravrājitā /
K01bhivin_u:5668: pratitālakehi pratikuñcikāhi ca paravihārān udghāṭiya āgārikehi parivrājakehi ca saha tiṣthati /
K01bhivin_u:5671: kim imāya duḥśīlāya pratitālakinīya puruṣasahāyikāya upasthāpitāya /
K01bhivin_u:5672: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5675: bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati yāvad āma bhagavan /
K01bhivin_u:5678: naiṣa kāli dharmo yāvad eva nāmā tvaṃ duḥśīlāṃ pratitālakinīṃ puruṣasahāyikām upasthāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:5679: tena hi na kṣamati jānantī duḥśīlāṃ pratitālakinīṃ puruṣasahāyikām upasthāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5680: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:5681: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī duḥśīlāṃ pratitālakinīṃ puruṣasahāyikām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5683: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
K01bhivin_u:5685: pratitālakinīti pratitālakehi pratikuñcikāhi ca anyātakān vihārakān udghāṭayati /
K01bhivin_u:5687: āgārikehi ca parivrājakehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati /
K01bhivin_u:5688: upasthāpayed iti upasampādayet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ yā dāni eṣā āgārikehi parivrājakehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati sā na kṣamati upasthāpayituṃ
K01bhivin_u:5689: atha dāni śaknoti brahmacaryaṃ saṃpādayituṃ labhyā tato saṃsargāto vivecayitvā upasthāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5690: bhikṣur api jānan duḥśīlaṃ śrāmaṇeraṃ strīsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ apratyosārāyetvā upasampādeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5692: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī duḥśilāṃ pratitālakinīṃ puruṣasahāyikām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //5 //
K01bhivin_u:5698: na jānanti katham upādhyāyīye pratipadyitavyaṃ yāvat saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇe pratipadyitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5699: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5703: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati yāvad āma bhagavan /
K01bhivin_u:5705: tena hi na kṣamati ūnaviṃativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtām upasthāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5706: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:5707: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtāṃ upasthāpayet pācatikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5708: ūnaviṃśativarṣā ti ūnaviṃśodakavarṣo ūnaviṃśo samvatsaro ūnaviṃśativarṣā /
K01bhivin_u:5711: hemante jātā tena viṃśena upasaṃpādeti akṛtāyāṃ pravāraṇāyāṃ ūnaviṃśativarṣā /
K01bhivin_u:5713: evaṃ purimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ jātā tena viṃśena upasaṃpādeti ūnaviṃśativarṣā /
K01bhivin_u:5714: paścimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ jātā tena viṃśena upasaṃpādeti /
K01bhivin_u:5717: kumārībhūtām etām ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ sarvā ūnaviṃśativarṣasamjñinīyo upasampādenti sarvāyo pācattikam āsādayanti /
K01bhivin_u:5719: tām etām ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtāṃ eka ūnaviṃśativarṣasamjñinīyo upasampādenti ekā pūrasamjñinīyo /
K01bhivin_u:5720: yā ūnasaṃjñinīyo upasampādenti tāyo pācattikam āsādayanti /
K01bhivin_u:5723: ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ sarvāyo ūnaviṃśativarṣasamjñinīyo upasampādenti sarvāsām anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5725: pūraviṃśativarṣāṃ sarvāyo ūnaviṃśativarṣasaṃjñinīyo upasampādenti sarvā vinayātikramam āsādayanti /
K01bhivin_u:5727: pūraviṃśativarṣām ekā ūnaviṃśativarṣasaṃjñinīyo ekā pūraviṃśativarṣasaṃjñinīyo upasampādenti /
K01bhivin_u:5731: pūraviṃśativarṣāṃ sarvā pūrasaṃjñinīyo upasampādenti sarvāsām anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5736: yā eṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasampadaṃ sā dāni samanugrahitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:5740: atha dāni te pi na jānanti pṛcchitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:5745: na uddhikasya vā citrikasya vā vaśena gantavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5748: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtāṃ upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //6 //
K01bhivin_u:5753: na kṣamati ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtām upasthāpayitun ti /
K01bhivin_u:5754: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo pūraviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtām adeśitaśikṣām upasthāpayanti /
K01bhivin_u:5756: ko jānāti pūraviṃśativarṣā vā eṣā na vā ti /
K01bhivin_u:5757: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5762: tāya saṃgho dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ yācitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:5765: iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5766: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ iyam itthannāmā saṃghaṃ dvevarṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ yāceyyā /
K01bhivin_u:5767: yāciṣyati āryamiśrikā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dvevarṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ saṃghaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5768: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:5771: aham itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣāmi tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5773: sādhu vata me āryā saṃgho dve varṣāṇi śikṣāpadāni sammutiṃ detu /
K01bhivin_u:5776: iyam itthannamā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5777: sā saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ yācati /
K01bhivin_u:5778: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ dadyāt /
K01bhivin_u:5781: iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5782: sā saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇī śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ yācati /
K01bhivin_u:5783: tasyāḥ saṃgho itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varsāṇī śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ deti /
K01bhivin_u:5784: yasyā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ dīyamānāṃ saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:5789: dinnā āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiḥ samghena /
K01bhivin_u:5790: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:5791: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmāntrayati /
K01bhivin_u:5792: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:5801: taṃ ca se karma kurvanti jñaptivipannaṃ gaṇavipannaṃ anuśrāvaṇāvipannaṃ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5813: asty eṣā deśitaśikṣā na jñāyate paripūraśikṣā vā na veti /
K01bhivin_u:5814: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5816: tena hi na kṣamati deśitaśikṣām api aparipūraśikṣām upasthāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5817: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:5819: deśitaśikṣā pi ca bhavati kumārībhūtā tāṃ cāparipūraśikṣām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5821: deśitaśikṣā tañ ca se karma kurvanti /
K01bhivin_u:5822: jñaptisampannaṃ gaṇasampannaṃ anuśrāvaṇāsampannaṃ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena anupakliṣṭaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5824: aparipūraśikṣā ti aṣṭādaśahi varttehi dve varṣāṇi aśikṣitaśikṣā /
K01bhivin_u:5825: katamehi aṣṭādaśahi sarvabhikṣuṇīnāṃ navikety ādi pūrvavat yathā gurudharmeṣu /
K01bhivin_u:5826: na ca tāye kṣamati ekākinīya grāmaṃ piṇḍāya praviśituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5827: atha khu bhikṣuṇīya vā śramaṇerīya vā saha piṇḍāya praviśitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5829: yadi sā aṣṭānām anyatarānyarāpattim āpadyati punaḥ śikṣā deśitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:5830: ekānnaviṃśatim ārabhya sarvaṃ duṣkṛtena kārāpayitavyā yāni ūnakāni dve varṣāṇi śikṣati sāparipūraśikṣā /
K01bhivin_u:5840: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo viṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtāṃ deṣitaśikṣāṃ paripūraśikṣām upasthāpayanti /
K01bhivin_u:5843: no tu jānāma paripūraśikṣā vā na vā ti /
K01bhivin_u:5844: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5847: tena hi yā eṣā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ tāya saṃgho upathāpanāsammutiṃ yācitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:5849: iyam itthannāmā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5850: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ iyam itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasthāpanāsammutiṃ yāceyyā /
K01bhivin_u:5851: yāciṣyati āryā saṃgho iyam itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasthāpanāsammutiṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5852: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:5855: aham itthannāmā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā desitaśikṣā paripūraśikṣā ākāṅkṣāmi tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5857: sādhu vata me āryā saṃgho upasthāpanāsammutiṃ detu /
K01bhivin_u:5858: evaṃ dvir api trir api yācitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5860: iyam itthannāmā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā paripūraśikṣā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5862: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ samgho itthannāmāye upasthāpanāsammutiṃ dadyāt /
K01bhivin_u:5865: iyam itthannāmā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā paripūraśikṣā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5868: yasyā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye viṃśativarṣāye upasthāpanāsammutiṃ dīyamānāṃ saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:5872: dinnā āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye viṃśativarṣāye kumārībhūtāye deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāya upasthāpanāsammutiḥ saṃghena /
K01bhivin_u:5873: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:5874: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:5875: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:5876: [1] paripūraśikṣā pi ca bhavati tāṃ cāsaṃmatām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5877: paripūraśikṣā pi ca bhavatīti aṣṭādaśavarttehi dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā /
K01bhivin_u:5878: tāṃ cāsaṃmatām iti asaṃmatā evam asaṃmatā aparipūraśikṣā pi asaṃmatā tam ca se karma
K01bhivin_u:5879: karonti prajñaptivipannaṃ gaṇavipannaṃ anuśrāvaṇāvipannaṃ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5884: / [2] pūraviṃśativarṣā pi ca bhavati kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā ca paripūraśikṣā ca /
K01bhivin_u:5889: tā dāni śākiyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo kolīyakanyāyo gṛhicaritāyo pravrajitāyo paṭu kāyo uccakṣukāyo kṣipraniśāntikāyo /
K01bhivin_u:5891: labhyā dāni bhagavan ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5899: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:5900: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:5901: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5905: yā eṣā gṛhicaritā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ sā tāya anugrāhitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:5909: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //10 //
K01bhivin_u:5923: na kṣamati ūnadvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayitun ti /
K01bhivin_u:5924: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo pūradvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayanti /
K01bhivin_u:5926: ko jānāti pūradvādaśavarṣā vā na veti /
K01bhivin_u:5927: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ / pe /
K01bhivin_u:5928: yathā kumāribhūtāya aṣṭādaśavarṣāya dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutir yācitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:5931: pūradvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati gṛhicaritā tāṃ cādeśitaśikṣām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //1 //
K01bhivin_u:5943: āryamiśrikāyo yato haṃ pravrajitā nāmabhijānāmy ahaṃ etad dharmam pratiṣevituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5944: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5947: na eṣā jānāty etaṃ dharma pratiṣevituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5949: yā dāni eṣā īdṛśī bhavati na kṣamati upasthāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5950: atha khalu yadi tāvad dārikāṃ janayati yadā stanikā gṛhān nirgatā bhavati tato upasthāpayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:5951: atha dārakaṃ janayati yadā ayaṃ stanībhūto bhavati tato upasthāpayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:5952: atha dāni tāye sālohito bhavati jñātiko vā āhaṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5953: vayaṃ etan dārakam upasthāsyāma iti upasaṃpādayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:5954: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:5957: deśitaśikṣā pi ca bhavati gṛhicaritā nāṃ aparipūraśikṣām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //2 //
K01bhivin_u:5962: na kṣamati ūnadvādaśavarṣām gṛhicaritām upasthāpayitun ti /
K01bhivin_u:5963: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo pūradvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritāṃ deśitaśikṣām upasthāpayanti /
K01bhivin_u:5965: asty eṣā deśitaśikṣā na tu jānāma paripūraśikṣa vā na veti /
K01bhivin_u:5966: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:5968: yathā kumārībhūtāye yāvat tena bhagavān āha /
K01bhivin_u:5974: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo upasthāpiya upasthāpiya nāvavadanti nānuśāsanti /
K01bhivin_u:5975: tāyo dāni indragavā iva vardhanti yāvat kathaṃ saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇe pratipattavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5978: duṣkṛtaṃ vo bhikṣuṇīyo evañ ca nāmā yūyaṃ upasthāpayitvā nāvavadatha nānuśāsatha /
K01bhivin_u:5979: tena hi dve varṣāṇi ovaditavyā anuśāsitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:5980: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:5982: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ dve varṣāṇi nāvavadeya nānuśāsayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5988: nāvavaded iti abhidharme vā abhivinaye vā /
K01bhivin_u:5991: nānuśāsed iti ācāram akurvantīm anācāraṃ kurvantīṃ na nirddhameyā na daṇḍakarma dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:5992: atha dāni sā upasthāpitā durvacā bhavati śaithilikā vā bāhulikā vā aśikṣākāmā nirddhamitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:5993: bhikṣur api sārdhaṃ vihārinaṃ nāvāvadati nānuśāsati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:5995: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ dve varṣāṇi nāvavaden nānuśāset pācattikaṃ //4 //
K01bhivin_u:5999: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo upasthāpitāḥ anyena gacchanti /
K01bhivin_u:6005: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6011: duṣkṛtaṃ vo bhikṣuṇīyo evaṃ nāma yūyam upasthāpitāḥ anyena gacchatha /
K01bhivin_u:6012: tena hi upasthāpitāya upasthāyikā dve varṣāṇi anubandhitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:6013: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:6014: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:6015: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāpitā upasthāyikāṃ dve varṣāṇi nopasthihen nānubandhet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6021: nānubandhed iti yena gacchati tena na gacchati pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6023: atha dāni sā upasthāyikā aśikṣākāmā bhavati śaithilikā vā bāhulikā vā /
K01bhivin_u:6025: sā me brahmacaryāntarāyo bhaveya dṛṣṭvānukṛtim āpadyantīyeti anyena gacchati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6027: bhikṣur api upādhyāyaṃ dve varṣān nopasthihati nānubandhati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6029: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāpitā upasthāyikāṃ dve varṣāṇī nopasthihen nānubandhet pācattikaṃ //5 //
K01bhivin_u:6035: kin nu khalv etaṃ labhyaṃ kartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6039: tena hi na kṣamati anuvarṣam upasthāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6041: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anuvarṣam upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6046: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anuvarṣam upasthāpayeti pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6049: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī kṛtapuṇyā bhavati ekaṃ varṣaṃ śikṣā deśayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:6053: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anuvarṣam upasthāpayet pācattikam //6 //
K01bhivin_u:6058: sā antevāsinīṃ bhikṣuṇīhi upasaṃpādīyāna sthūlanandāṃ bhikṣuṇīm āha /
K01bhivin_u:6059: ārye mama antevāsinī upasampādyā sādhu ārye āryamiśrikānāṃ gaṇaṃ paryeṣehi /
K01bhivin_u:6063: tāya dāni aparaṃ divasaṃ bhadrakāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇāṃ gaṇaṃ samudānayitvā upasaṃpādayitvā /
K01bhivin_u:6064: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo majāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6066: duṣkṛtaṃ te jete evan nāma tvaṃ ekato viśuddhāṃ parivāsikinīm upasthāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:6068: tena hi na kṣamati gaṇam avajānituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6071: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ekato viśuddhāṃ parivāsikinīm upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6075: upasthāpayed iti upasampādayen na bhikṣugaṇena pārājikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6079: atha khalu pratikṛty eva tāva bhadrakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gaṇo samudānayitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:6080: atha dāni anye bhadrakāḥ anye abhadrakāḥ tathā kartavyaṃ yathā bhadrottarāṇi karmāṇi bhavanti /
K01bhivin_u:6082: atha dāni gaṇam avajānāti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6083: atha dāni senābhayaṃ vā bhavati paracakrabhayaṃ vā nagaroparodho vā kiñcāpi pārivāsikinīm upasthāpayety anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6085: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ekato viśuddhāṃ pārivāsikīnīm upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //7 //
K01bhivin_u:6089: yā sā kālīya triyantarā lecchavidhītā upasthāpitā /
K01bhivin_u:6090: sā dāni āgārikehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati /
K01bhivin_u:6092: ārye kāli yā dāni upasthāpitā tvaṃ jānāsi āgārikehi ca parivrājakehi ca saṃṣṛṣṭāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6093: kim arthaṃ na vyapakarṣasi na vyapakarṣāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:6094: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6096: duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti
K01bhivin_u:6097: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ tathārūpāsu āpadāsu na vyapakarṣen na vyapakarṣāpayed antaśaḥ ṣaṭpañca yojanā ti pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6101: tathārūpāsu āpadāsū ti svayam vā pratyodhāvitukāmā jñātikā vā pratyodhāvayitukāmā anyehi vā saṃsṛṣṭā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:6102: na vyupakarṣatīti svayaṃ na vyupakarṣāpayatīti parehi /
K01bhivin_u:6103: antamasato ṣaṭpañca yojanā ti na dāni ṣaṭpañca ca paramaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6106: eṣā dāni bhikṣuṇīye sārdham vihāriṇī vā antevāsinī vā saṃsṛṣṭā bhavati vyapakarṣitavyā vā vyapakarṣāpayitavyā vā cārikāya varṇo bhāṣitavyaḥ
K01bhivin_u:6107: atha dāni jarādurbalāvā vyādhidurbalā vā bhoti anyāhi bhikṣuṇīhi vyakpakarṣayitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:6111: yadā vayaṃ taruṇīyo āsi evam asmābhir aṭitaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6112: bhikṣur api sārdhaṃ vihāriṃ utkaṇṭhitan na vyapakarṣayati na vyapakarṣāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6114: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ tathārūpāsv āpadāsu na vyapakarṣayet na vyapakarṣāpayet antamasato ṣaṭpañca yojanā ti pācattikaṃ //81
K01bhivin_u:6120: tā indragavā viya vardhanti śivacchagalā viya vardhanti /
K01bhivin_u:6123: sā dāni bhikṣuṇīhi vuccati kim punar āryāye anaṅgopetāye upasthāpitena yaṃ āryāmevaṃ vaktavyā anuśāsitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:6125: kiṃ bhadrāyiṇīyo irṣyāpathā mama parṣām upasthāpayantīyo /
K01bhivin_u:6126: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6128: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande evan nāma tvaṃ kṣiyādharmam āpadyesi /
K01bhivin_u:6129: tena hi na kṣamati kṣiyādharmam āpadyituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6130: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
K01bhivin_u:6133: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam ucyamānā /
K01bhivin_u:6135: yaṃ āryā evam vaktavyā anuśāsitavyety uktā samānā kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6138: kim punar āryāye anaṅgopetāye ti daśahi aṅgehi samanvāgatā aṅgopetā /
K01bhivin_u:6144: yasyā imāni daśāṅgāni na samvidyante sā bhavati anaṅgopetā /
K01bhivin_u:6145: kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya ti vivācayet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6146: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yucyamānā kim punar āryāye anaṅgopetāye upasthāpiteneti kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6147: bhikṣur api bhikṣūhi vucyamāno kim punar āyuṣmato anaṅgopetasya upasthāpiteneti kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6149: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evaṃ vucyamānā kim punar āryāye anaṅgopetāye upasthāpiteneti uktā kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ //9 //
K01bhivin_u:6154: sādhu me ārye nande upasaṃpādaya māṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6159: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6167: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām evaṃ vādet /
K01bhivin_u:6168: yadā pūraśikṣā bhaviṣyasi tato ham upasthāpayiṣyan ti vaditvā naivopasaṃpādayen na visarjayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6171: śikṣamāṇeti aṣṭādaśehi varttehi dve varṣāṇi deśtitaśikṣā /
K01bhivin_u:6172: evam vadeyā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī /
K01bhivin_u:6174: atha dāni na pratibalā bhavati anyā adhyeṣitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:6175: atha dāni naivātmanā upasthāpayati nāpy anyāṃ adhyeṣayati na visarjayati /
K01bhivin_u:6177: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām uktvā ahan te upasthāpayiṣyan ti paścān nopasampādayen na visarjayet pācattikaṃ //10 //
K01bhivin_u:6181: atha bhadrā kāpileyī caturyuktaṃ yānam abhiruhitvā jñātikulaṃ gacchati /
K01bhivin_u:6184: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6186: yā puna bhikṣuṇī yānam abhiruhyet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6189: tā dāni śākīyakanyāḥ kolīyakanyāḥ lecchavikanyāś ca prakṛtisukumārāḥ pravrajitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6191: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6194: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati yāvat /
K01bhivin_u:6195: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā yānam abhiruhet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6197: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattiḥ gilānāye /
K01bhivin_u:6198: glānyaṃ nāma jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā prakṛtisukumārā vā na śaknoti pada āgacchantu idam atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6199: yānan nāma hastiyānaṃ aśvayānam uṣṭrayānaṃ goyānaṃ gardabhayānaṃ nāvāyānaṃ śivikāyānaṃ yānayānam eva aṣṭamaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6202: yatra uṣṭrā vā goṇā vā yuktā bhavanti /
K01bhivin_u:6204: yahiṃ uṣṭrīyo vā goṇīyo vā yuktā bhavanti tahiṃ āruhitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6205: atha dāni asaṃjñikā bhavati na strīṃ na puruṣaṃ jānāti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6206: atha dāni nāvāya aparāt param uttaraty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6207: ūrdhvaṅgāminīyam vā adhogāminīyam vā pratyayo adhiṣṭhihitavyo mā mariṣyāmīti /
K01bhivin_u:6208: bhikṣur api agilāno yānamabhiruhati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6211: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā yānam abhiruhet pācattikaṃ /rā //
K01bhivin_u:6215: bhadrā kāpileyī chatreṇa gṛhītena upānahābhyām ābaddhābhyāṃ jñātikulaṃ gacchati /
K01bhivin_u:6217: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā adyāpīyaṃ pravrajitā pi mahacchandā /
K01bhivin_u:6218: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6223: tā dāni śākīyakanyāḥ lecchavikumārāḥ pravrajitā gacchantīyo ātapena dahyante /
K01bhivin_u:6224: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6227: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā chatropānahaṃ dhārayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6229: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattir gilānāye /
K01bhivin_u:6231: jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā va prakṛtisukumārā vā /
K01bhivin_u:6233: chatropānaha iti chatran nāma bhūrjachatraṃ tālachatraṃ veṇuchatraṃ parṇachatraṃ cailachatram /
K01bhivin_u:6237: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā chatran dhāreti na upānahāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6238: upānahān dhāreya na chatraṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6241: bhikṣur api picumastakādi chatraṃ dhāreti saṃpuṭām vā anirmokāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6243: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā chatropānahaṃ dhārayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6248: teṣāṃ śayyā āstṛtapratyāstṛtā dvikaḍevara trikaḍevarehi niśreṇīya āruhyati /
K01bhivin_u:6252: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6255: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
K01bhivin_u:6258: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdasi abhinipadyasi /
K01bhivin_u:6259: tena hi na kṣamati atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdituṃ vā abhinipadyitum vā /
K01bhivin_u:6260: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:6261: yā puna bhikṣuṇī atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhinipadyeya vā pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6264: mañce vā pīṭhe vā ti caturdaśa mañcāḥ caturdaśa pīṭhāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6266: abhinipadyeya vā ti śayyāṃ kalpayet pācatikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6268: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sakṛn niṣaṇṇā divasaṃ pi niṣīdati ekaṃ pācattikam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6269: atha puno puno niṣīdati tāvatyaḥ pācattikāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6270: atirekapramāṇaṃ bhūmau nikhanitvā upaviśati vā nipadyati vā anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6271: bhikṣur api atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā niṣīdati vā abhinipadyati vā vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6273: yā puna bhikṣuṇī atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhinipadyeya vā pācattikaṃ //2 //
K01bhivin_u:6277: tā dāni ṣaḍvargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo ekāstaraṇaprāvaraṇāṃ śayyāṃ kalpayanti /
K01bhivin_u:6278: tāyo mañcāṃ bhañjanti biśikāṃ pāṭenti caturasrakāṃ pāṭenti /
K01bhivin_u:6279: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6284: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ekāstaraṇaprāvaraṇāṃ sahaśayyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6288: śeyyā ti paṅgulamañco paṅgulapīṭho yāvat kaṭakilañjādayo /
K01bhivin_u:6293: trihi pīṭhehi dvihi janāhīti pādāṃ prāsārayantīhi tathā prasārayitavyāḥ yathā anyamanyasya jānukā nākrameyuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6295: tiryak prajñaptāyā tṛhi janehi śayitavyaṃ pāṭiyakapāṭiyakehi pratyāstaraṇehi yathā caturasrake yathā pīṭhe /
K01bhivin_u:6296: atha dāni tṛṇādi saṃstaro bhavati na kṣamati atibahuṃ ākramituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6297: atha khu nirmuṣṭikaṃ samaṃ prajñāpayitavyaṃ pāṭiyakapāṭiyakehi pratyāstaraṇehi /
K01bhivin_u:6298: atha dāni śītam bhavati svakasvakāny antarīkaraṇāni kṛtvā ekaṃ saṃcelī kartavyā /
K01bhivin_u:6299: bhikṣur api sahaśayyāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6301: yā puna bhikṣuṇī sahaśayyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ //3 //
K01bhivin_u:6305: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī sāṃghike vihāre śayyāsanaṃ rundhitvā cārikāṃ prakrāntā /
K01bhivin_u:6307: tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo yathāvṛddhikāya utthāpīyanti tasmin vihāre sāṃghikaṃ śayyāsanaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6309: kim asya dāni sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ nirundhiya cārikāṃ prakramīyati /
K01bhivin_u:6311: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6314: etad eva pṛcchiyati yāvad āma bhagavan /
K01bhivin_u:6316: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakaramasi /
K01bhivin_u:6317: tena hi na kṣamati sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsarivtā cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6318: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:6319: yā puna bhikṣuṇī sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakrāmeya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6321: sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanan ti mañcam vā pīṭham vā bisikām vā caturasrakām vā kuccam vā bimbohanam vā /
K01bhivin_u:6323: cārikāṃ prakrameyā ti anyatra gacchet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6324: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6325: prakramantīya vaktavyaṃ yathā paliguddhaṃ śayanāsanaṃ niḥsarāmīti /
K01bhivin_u:6327: atha dāni ekavastuko saṃghārāmo bhavati aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6329: yā puna bhikṣuṇī sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ /ṇàüka //
K01bhivin_u:6341: kas tāvad atra doṣo 'yaṃ dāni ahaṃ anyadāpi anyadāpi snāpayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:6344: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6346: sā dāni śabdāpitā tad eva sarvaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6352: duṣkṛtan te gartodaramāte yāvad evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī pūrve apratisamviditā anāhūtā upasamkramasi /
K01bhivin_u:6353: tena hi na kṣamati yāvad bhagavān āha /
K01bhivin_u:6354: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sabhikṣukaṃ saṃghārāmaṃ pūrve apratisamviditā anāhūtā upasamkrameya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6356: sabhikṣukan ti antamasato yahiṃ ekabhikṣur api bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:6357: saṃghārāman ti āraṇyakam vā grām'antikam vā /
K01bhivin_u:6363: etā dāni yo bhikṣuṇīyo pariveṇaṃ gacchanti dvārakoṣṭhake sthitvā nivedayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6365: tenāpi dāni bhikṣuṇā bhikṣavo jānāpayitavyā mā dāni bhikṣū viprakaṭā bhaveṃsū ti /
K01bhivin_u:6366: yadi viprakaṭā bhonti mṛttikākarmeṇa vā iṣṭakākarmeṇa vā /
K01bhivin_u:6379: bhikṣur api apratisaṃvidito bhikṣunīupāśrayaṃ praviśati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6380: atha khu dvārakoṣṭhake sthitvā acchaṭikā kartavyā /
K01bhivin_u:6382: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sabhikṣukaṃ saṃghārāmaṃ pūrve apratisaṃviditā anāhūtā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ //tṛ //
K01bhivin_u:6386: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni kośalehi janapadehi cārikāṃ carantīyo grāmavāsake vāsam upagatāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6387: tehi dāni aparā strī vipravastapatikā uktā /
K01bhivin_u:6393: kaḥ punar evaṃ jñāsyati āgamiṣyati vā na veti /
K01bhivin_u:6394: tāya dinno pratiśrayo tāsān dāni bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pratikrāntānāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6396: so dāni khāditvā pibitvā kleśe pīḍito bhāryāya sārdhaṃ mśrībhūto /
K01bhivin_u:6397: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo tena śabdena pratibuddhāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6398: yā dāni avigatarāgāḥ tāsām asparśasaṃjñā utpannā /
K01bhivin_u:6399: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ / pe /
K01bhivin_u:6406: evaṃ ca nāma yūyaṃ jānantīyo saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajjāsanaṃ śayyāṃ kalpayatha /
K01bhivin_u:6410: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni kośalehi janapadehi cārikāṃ carantīyo anyatarasmiṃ grāmavāsake vāsam upagatāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6411: tāyo dāni sarvagrāmam aṇvitāḥ na kahiñcid apuruṣaṃ gṛhaṃ labhanti /
K01bhivin_u:6412: tā dāni rathyāyāṃ pratikrāntāḥ rātrau vātavṛṣṭir utthitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6414: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6421: imaṃ gṛhaṃsuḥ imaṃ gṛhaṃ praviśatha dhūrtakānām iha bhayaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6425: na kṣamati sapuruṣake gṛhe śayyāṃ kārayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6426: tāyo tahiṃ rātrau dhūrtakehi viheṭhitāḥ tatrānyatarā brahmacaryāto cyāvitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6427: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6430: yā puna bhikṣunī jānantī saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajjeśayyāṃ kalpayed anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6431: tatrāyaṃ samayo vātasamayo vṛṣṭisamayo puruṣāśaṅkitasamayo ayam atra samayo //
K01bhivin_u:6433: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
K01bhivin_u:6434: saṃbhojanīyan ti strīyā puruṣo bhojanaṃ puruṣasyāpi strī bhojanaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6435: kulan ti brāhmakulaṃ yāvad rājakulaṃ yāni vā punar anyāny api kāñcit kulāni /
K01bhivin_u:6436: anupakhajja nāma vāsavastu yahiṃ bhāryāpatikā pratikramanti /
K01bhivin_u:6438: anyatra samaya iti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padam anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6447: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye jānantīye saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajje śayyāṃ kalpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6448: atha dāni jñāyate ayaṃ manuṣyaḥ śrāddho ālaptako vā kiñcāpi anupakhajjo śayyāṃ kalpayanti anāpakhajjo śayyāṃ kalpayati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6450: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajje śayyāṃ kalpayed anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6456: bhikṣū dāni vaiśālīyaṃ varṣoṣitāḥ śrāvastīṃ prasthitāḥ bhagavato pādāvandāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6457: bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ bhikṣū kila bhagavato pādavandā gamiṣyantīti /
K01bhivin_u:6459: vandāmy ārya śruṇomaḥ āryamiśrāḥ śrāvastīyaṃ gamiṣyanti bhagavataḥ pādavandā /
K01bhivin_u:6465: bhagavatā śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye saha adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyitum /
K01bhivin_u:6470: tāyo ekadvikāya divasāni gaṇayanti tadaho gamiṣyantīti /
K01bhivin_u:6471: tāyo dāni prakṛtyeva kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā pātracīvaram ādāya mārge sthitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6472: te ca bhikṣavo tāṃ velāṃ prasthitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6474: āyuṣmanto imāyo tāyo bhaginīyo śīghraśīghraṃ gacchanti /
K01bhivin_u:6478: tahiṃ dāni yā bhikṣuṇīyo taruṇīyo balavantīyo tāhi te bhikṣū anujavitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6479: yā taṃhi jarādurbalāyo vyādhidurbalāyo prakṛtisukumārāyo tāyo ce ehi muṣitāḥ paripiṭṭitāś ca /
K01bhivin_u:6480: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6482: evaṃ ca nāma tave tirorājyan tirojanapadaṃ asārthikā prakramatha /
K01bhivin_u:6483: tena hi na kṣamati tirorājyāṃ tirojanapadam asārthikā cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6485: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirorājyaṃ tirojanapadaṃ asārthikā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6489: asārthikā ti sālo nāma gṛhi sārtho vā pravrajitasārtho vā śakaṭasārtho vā paryeṣitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:6492: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī asārthikā cārikāṃ prakramati /
K01bhivin_u:6495: samaṃ prasthitāḥ viṣamaṃ praviśanti vinayātikramam āsādayanti /
K01bhivin_u:6496: viṣamaṃ prasthitāḥ samaṃ praviśanti vinayātikramam āsādayanti /
K01bhivin_u:6498: viṣamaṃ prasthitāḥ viṣamaṃ praviśanti pācattikam āsādayanti /
K01bhivin_u:6499: bhikṣur api asārthiko sabhayaṃ sapratibhayaṃ sāśaṅkasammataṃ mārga pratipadyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6501: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirorājyan tirojanapadam asārthikā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ // grā //
K01bhivin_u:6505: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni strībhiḥ saha udyānabhūmiṃ nirgatāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6507: tatra bhikṣuṇyaḥ strīveṣeṇa caṅkramanti ārāmagṛhakāni vanagṛhakāni citragṛhakāni nīrīkṣantīyo /
K01bhivin_u:6508: tāyo dāni gūḍhe pradeśe puruṣehi viheṭhitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6509: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6511: antorājyaṃ kaṃ pi ca bhavati antorāṣṭraṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6512: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī ārāmagṛhakāni vā vanagṛhakāni vā citragṛhakāni vā darśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6515: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī ārāmagṛhakānīti ete dāni bhavanti /
K01bhivin_u:6516: caṃpakārāmā vā panasārāmā vā atimuktakārāmā vā /
K01bhivin_u:6518: nyagrodhavanā vā drākṣāvanā vā kadalīvanā vā dāḍimavanā vā mātuluṅgavanā vā /
K01bhivin_u:6519: citragṛhakānīti ete bhavanti sabhā vā kūṭāgārā vā /
K01bhivin_u:6523: na kṣamati ārāmagṛhaṃ vā vanagṛhaṃ vā citragṛhaṃ vā darśanāya gantuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6526: atha dāni tatraiva strībhiḥ saha cañcūryate anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6527: bhikṣur api ārāmagṛhaṃ vā vanagṛhaṃ vā citragṛhaṃ vā darśanāya gacchati yatra kāmopabhoginaḥ krīḍanti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6529: antorājyaṃ kaṃpi ca bhavati antorāṣṭraṃ pi /
K01bhivin_u:6530: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī ārāmagṛhakāni vā vanagṛhakāni vā citragṛhakāni vā darśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ //8 //
K01bhivin_u:6533: sujātā nāma bhikṣuṇī āyuṣmato udāyiṣya purāṇadvitīyā /
K01bhivin_u:6537: yadā tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo gocaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ tadāyuṣmān udāyī kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā pātracīvaram ādāya tahiṃ praviṣṭo /
K01bhivin_u:6538: te dāni vihārasya paścāt vastuke ambarīyakeṇa niṣaṇṇā raktacittā karmaṇyenāṅgajātena anyamanyasya aṅgajātāni nidhyāyattā āsanti /
K01bhivin_u:6539: aparā dāni bhikṣuṇī mahallikā uccārakarmāya vā prasrāvakarmāya vā paścād vastukaṃ gatā /
K01bhivin_u:6542: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6546: duṣkṛtan te sujātike yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:6547: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ ekā ekena raho niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6549: ekā ekeneti sā ca bhavati anyo ca tatra bhoti /
K01bhivin_u:6550: supto matto unmattotkṣiptacitto vedanābhinno uttānaśayyāko amānuṣo tiryagyonigato /
K01bhivin_u:6558: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ sakṛn nisaṇṇā divasam pi niṣīdati ekaṃ pācattikam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6559: atha dāni puno puno ucchati ca niṣīdati ca tattikā pācattikam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6560: atha dāni dve janā bhavanti eko vihāraṃ praviśati kasyacid arthāya bhikṣuṇīya śīghram utthihitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6561: nāpi dāni sahasrām ājāneya māṃ eṣā viheṭhayitukāmā ti /
K01bhivin_u:6569: so āsādanāya na mocanāya kettāvatā antareṇāpattir bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:6571: atha dāni ākīrṇajanamanuṣyo bhikṣuṇī upāśrayo bhavati niṣkramanti ca praviśanti ca sthapativardhakicitrakarāḥ kiñcāpi tehi kalpiyakārehi āsati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6572: atha dāni rathyāmukhaṃ dvāraṃ bhavati avīciḥ striyo ca puruṣā ca gacchanti akiñcāpi tehi kalpiyakārehi āsati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6573: atha dāni antarāvīciḥ chinnā bhavati pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6575: atha dāni dve bhūmake kalpiyakāro tiṣṭhati trayāṇām anyatamānyataraṃ paśyaty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6576: tatra vāyo vā vemāntareṇa trayāṇām anyatamānyataraṃ paśyaty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6581: kin ti dāni asti darśanopavicāro na śramaṇopavicāraḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6582: prākṛtena cakṣuṣā paśyati bhikṣur eṣo āsati bhikṣuṇī veti no tu prākṛtena śrotreṇa tayor āyaṃ śṛṇoti /
K01bhivin_u:6585: grāme vāraṇye vā rātrau vā divā vā channe vā abhyavakaśe vā ekasya na mahājane santike na dūre /
K01bhivin_u:6587: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ ekā ekena raho niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ //0 //
K01bhivin_u:6591: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñātikulaṃ gatā bhrātṛkehi bhrātṛputrakehi mātulehi mātulaputrakehi sārdhaṃ ekā ekena saha tiṣṭhati /
K01bhivin_u:6592: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni piṇḍapātaṃ aṇvantīyo dṛṣṭvā ojjhāyanti /
K01bhivin_u:6593: kin tāvad imāye pravrajitāye puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ ekāya ekena raho niṣīdituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6594: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye āhaṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6602: ekāye ekena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ raho niṣīdituṃ yāvad bhagavān aha /
K01bhivin_u:6603: yā puna bhikṣuṇī puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ ekā ekena raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6605: puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ ekā ekeneti sā ca bhavati yāvad evam apy eṣā ekā ekena /
K01bhivin_u:6608: pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ sanniṣaṇṇā divasan niṣīdati ekaṃ pācattikam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6611: yā puna bhikṣuṇī puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ ekā ekena raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ //lṛṃ //
K01bhivin_u:6615: atha bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñātikulaṃ gatā /
K01bhivin_u:6616: bhrātṛduhitṛputrehi mātulaputrehi saha anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhati saṃlapati upakarṇakaṃ jalpati /
K01bhivin_u:6618: kin tāvad imāye pravrajitāye upakarṇakaṃ jalpitena /
K01bhivin_u:6620: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye āhaṃsuḥ yāvat /
K01bhivin_u:6621: yā puna bhikṣuṇī puruṣena sārdhaṃ anto hastapāśasya saṃtiṣṭheya vā saṃlapeya vā upakarṇam vā jalpeya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6623: puruṣeṇa sārdham iti gṛhasthena vā pravrājitena vā /
K01bhivin_u:6628: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhatum vā samlapitum vā upakarṇakam vā jalpitum vā /
K01bhivin_u:6631: atha dāni guhyaṃ jalpitavyaṃ bhavati bhittim vā kuḍyam vā stambham vā vṛkṣam vā yamanikām vā antarīkṛtvā jalpayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6632: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī puruṣeṇa sārdham anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhati vā saṃlapati vā upakarṇakam vā jalpati pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6633: bhikṣur api striyā sārdhaṃ anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhati vā saṃlapati vā upakarṇam vā jalpati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6635: yā puna bhikṣuṇīpuruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ anto hastapāśasya santiṣṭheya vā saṃlapeya vā upakarṇaṃ vā jalpeya pācattikaṃ //1 // uddānaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6646: atha bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñātikulaṃ gatvā putrabhrātṛbhāgineyānāṃ raho gatānāṃ andhakāre apratisamviditā sahasā chatti praviśati /
K01bhivin_u:6648: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye guatamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6652: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ jānantī sapuruṣam āvāsaṃ andhakāre apradīpikā upasaṃkramasi /
K01bhivin_u:6653: tena hi na kṣamati etad eva yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti
K01bhivin_u:6654: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sapuruṣam āvāsam andhakāre apradīpikā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6656: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
K01bhivin_u:6657: sapuruṣo ti yahiṃ puruso ti yahiṃ puruṣo bhaveya andhakāre apradīpiketi yahin na syāt tailapradīpo vā kaṇḍolkā vā /
K01bhivin_u:6658: upasaṃkrameya ti praviśeta pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6659: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya sapuruṣam āvāsam andhakāre apradīpikāya upasaṃkramituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6660: atha dāni kiñcit kāryaṃ bhavati yadi tahiṃ uccaśabdo bhavati praviśaty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6661: atha dāni agnir na bhavati pratisaṃvedayitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:6664: sa eṣā bhikṣuṇī naiva pratisaṃvedayati nācchaṭikāṃ karoti upasaṃkramati pācattikam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6665: bhikṣur api sastrīkam āvāsam andhakāre apratisaṃvidito upasaṃkramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6667: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sapuruṣam āvāsam andhakāre apradīpikā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:6671: tāyo dāni ṣaḍvargiṇo bhikṣuṇīyo giryagrasamājaṃ gacchanti /
K01bhivin_u:6672: tā dāni tahiṃ gatvā pṛthag mañca gṛhṇanti naṭo nāṭayati saprahāsaṃ vastupadā nāṭitam bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:6674: tāyo dāni tūṣṇīkās tiṣṭhanti yogācarā iva /
K01bhivin_u:6675: yadā praśāntam bhavati nāṭakam avatāritaṃ bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:6680: te dāni vicakṣu kṛtā nelāṭikaṃ na prayacchanti /
K01bhivin_u:6683: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6685: tena hi na kṣamati viśokadarśanāya gantuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6686: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:6687: yā punar bhikṣuṇī viśokadarśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6689: viśokam iti naṭanartanakasallamallapāṇisvarikāḥ kumbhabhūmīrāḥ antamasato yahiṃ catvāro pi janāḥ sannipatanti krīḍyārthaṃ tahiṃ darśanāya gacchanti
K01bhivin_u:6692: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī piṇḍacāram aṇvati paśyati devayānaṃ niṣkramantaṃ rājño 'ntaḥpuraṃ niṣkrāntaṃ dāni śakyam akṣīṇi nimīlayituṃ kiñcāpi paśyati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6693: atha dāni ābhogaṃ karoti ime paśyāmi ito paśyāmīti pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6694: atha dāni bhagavato mālyāropaṇaṃ bhavati upāsakopāsikā āhaṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6697: atha dāni tahiṃ kocic cittasya vikāro bhavati na kṣamati sthātuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6698: bhikṣur api viśokadarśanāya gacchati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6700: yā puna bhikṣuṇī viśokadarśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:6704: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam
K01bhivin_u:6705: āpannānāṃ viharantīnāṃ vṛṣabhī samānā adhikaraṇāni na vyupaśamayati na vyupaśamāpayati
K01bhivin_u:6711: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānāṃ vṛṣabhī samānā adhikaraṇāni na vyupasamayasi na vyupasamāpayasi na vyupasamanāyautsukyaṃ karosi /
K01bhivin_u:6714: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānāṃ
K01bhivin_u:6715: viharantīnāṃ vṛṣabhī samanā adhikaraṇāni na vyupaśamayen na vyupasamāpayen na vyupasamanāyautsukhyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6717: kalahajātānām iti vācākalahaṃ kurvantīnāṃ vātayuktaṃ mama yuktam ity ādi /
K01bhivin_u:6718: bhaṇḍanajātānām iti anyamanyaṃ mama ghaṭanaṃ kurvantīnāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6722: gurukā laghukā sapratikarmā apratikarmā sāvaśeṣā niravaśeṣā /
K01bhivin_u:6723: dharmakarma adharmakarma samagrakarma vyagrakarma yāvat sthānārhaṃ karma iti viharantīnāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6727: na vyupasamānāyautsukyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6728: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kalahajātā bhaṇḍanajātā vigrahavivādam āpannā viharanti na dāni kṣamati tāyo adyupekṣituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6730: autsukyaṃ kartavyaṃ upasamanāya pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ parasparaṃ kṣamāpayitavyāḥ prāptakālaṃ yathārūpaṃ paribhāṣayitavyāḥ samagrīkartvyāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6731: atha dāni na śaknoti anyā bhikṣuṇī adhyesitavyā udyojayitavyā upāsakopāsikāyo bhikṣubhikṣuṇīyo /
K01bhivin_u:6732: atha tāny adhikaraṇāni karkkaśāni bhavanti durvyupasamāni teṣām eva adhikaraṇānāṃ kālam āgamayati samayam āgamayati paripākam āgamayati /
K01bhivin_u:6733: kālaṃ ca samayam ca paripākaṃ cāgamya vyupaśamayaty anāpattiḥ bhikṣur api bhikṣūṇāṃ
K01bhivin_u:6734: kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍaṇajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānām viharantānāṃ vṛṣabho samāno
K01bhivin_u:6735: adhikaraṇāni na vyupaśamayati na vyupasamāpayati na vyupasamānāyautsukyaṃ karoti
K01bhivin_u:6738: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānāṃ
K01bhivin_u:6739: viharantīnāṃ vṛṣabhī samānā adhikaraṇāni na vyupasamayen na vyupasamāpayen na vyupasamānāyautsukyaṃ
K01bhivin_u:6744: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñātikulaṃ nīyate udvartanāya snāpanāya gṛhapatinīhi nīyate /
K01bhivin_u:6745: vayam āryām udvartayāmaḥ snāpayiṣyāmaḥ asmākaṃ puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K01bhivin_u:6749: varṇalolāṃ udvartayanti kāleyakena tuṅgeyakena svaṅgakena padmakena gandhacūrṇehi /
K01bhivin_u:6753: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ / pe /
K01bhivin_u:6756: evan nāma tvaṃ gṛhiṇīnām udvartnaparimardanasnāpanasammatena udvartāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:6758: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:6759: yāni khalu punar imāni gṛhiṇīnām udvartanaparimardanasnāpanasammatāni tathārūpehi bhikṣuṇī agilānā udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6760: yāni khalu punar imāni gṛhiṇīnam iti kṣatriyakanyakānāṃ brāhmaṇakanyakānāṃ gṛhapatikanyakānāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6761: udvartanaparimardanasnāpanasammatānīti kāleyakam vā tuṅgeyakam vā cikkasam vā /
K01bhivin_u:6762: yady eko vā tehi bhikṣuṇīhi agilānā udvartāpayet /
K01bhivin_u:6763: kin tāvad atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhavati udvartāpayaty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6765: atha dāni gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā bhavati labhyā bhaiṣajyehi udvartāpayituṃ parimardāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6766: atha dāni pittasaṃkṣobho bhavati labhyā cikkasenāliṃpituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6767: atha dāni vātasaṃkṣobho bhavati labhyā godhūmacikkasenāliṃpituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6768: atha dāni sannipāto bhavati saṃyuktehi bhaiṣajyehi udvartāpayitavyaṃ parimardāpayitavyaṃ āliṃpitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6769: tāya pi dāni āliṃpiya na kṣamati abhyāgame pradeśe sthātuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6772: bhikṣur api agilāno cikkasenodvartāpayet parimardāpayed vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6774: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhiṇīnām udvartanaparimardanasnānasammatehi udvartāpayeta parimardāpayeta pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:6778: bhagavatā dāni śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ na kṣamati gṛhiṇīnām udvartanaparimardanasnānasammatehi udvartāpayituṃ parimardāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6779: sā dāni bhadrā bhikṣuṇīhi udvartāpayati parimardāpayati /
K01bhivin_u:6783: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6786: agilānā ti kin tāvad atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhoti /
K01bhivin_u:6789: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayati na parimardāpayati vinayātikramaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6793: bhikṣur api agilāno bhikṣuṇā udvartāpayati parimardāpayati vinayātikramaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6795: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ // phu //
K01bhivin_u:6800: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā śrāmaṇerīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ // phu //
K01bhivin_u:6804: śikṣamāṇā nāma aṣṭādaśahi vartehi dve varṣāṇi śikṣamāṇā yāvat /
K01bhivin_u:6806: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā śikṣamāṇāya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ //grā //
K01bhivin_u:6813: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā gṛhiṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ // hrā //
K01bhivin_u:6824: yāvatikā kā viśuddhā ahan tāsām anyatamāsāṃ tatra nāgacchāmi /
K01bhivin_u:6825: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ / pe /
K01bhivin_u:6829: tvañ ca nāma poṣadhan na satkaroṣi /
K01bhivin_u:6830: kā anyā satkariṣyati ko ca poṣadhasya satkāro /
K01bhivin_u:6833: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:6834: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardhamāsaṃagilānā viśuddhisaṃvāsaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6836: anvardhamāsaṃ viśuddhisaṃvāsaṃ ti cāturdaśikena vā cāturdaśikaṃ pāñcadaśikena vā pāñcadaśikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6839: eṣā bhavati jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā śirāviddhikā vā bhavati asukhā bhaiṣajyaṃ vā pītam bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:6842: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā poṣadhan na gacchati /
K01bhivin_u:6843: gilānā vā chandan na deti pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6844: bhikṣur api agilāno naiva poṣadhaṃ gacchati na cchandan deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6846: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardhamāsaṃ agilānā viśuddhisaṃvāsan na satkareya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6863: te dāni āyuṣmanto ṣaḍvargikāḥ ovādakavāraṃ na labhanti /
K01bhivin_u:6868: āyuṣmāṃ cchāriputraḥ sa khilo ca mṛduko ca /
K01bhivin_u:6870: na kṣamati asammatena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣuṇīyo ovadituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6872: te dāni niḥsīmaṃ gatvā anyamanyaṃ saṃmanyitvā kalyato yeva nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā ca bhikṣuṇī upāśrayaṃ gatvā āhaṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6875: yāyo yogācārāyo bhikṣuṇīyo tāyo na sannipatanti /
K01bhivin_u:6877: kim artham vayam eṣām avinītānām avavādaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6878: te dāni tāhi saha muhūrtam antaraṃ kākavaṃhā bhañjitvā gatāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6879: āyuṣmān dāni śāriputro kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaram ādāya āyuṣmatā ānandena paścāc chramaṇena sārdhaṃ vistareṇa /
K01bhivin_u:6893: ovaditā vayam āryamiśrakehi ṣaḍvargikehi anyavihitakena ovādena /
K01bhivin_u:6894: athāyuṣmān śāriputro vyagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho ti kṛtvā utthāyāsanāto prakrānto /
K01bhivin_u:6895: bhagavān jānanto yeva pṛcchati kin dāni gautamī mātā śīghram āgato si /
K01bhivin_u:6898: ahaṃ bhagavan kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā yāvad bhikṣuṇīupāśrayaṃ praviṣṭo ovadituṃ mayoktaṃ sannipatatha bhaginīyo ovādo bhaviṣyati /
K01bhivin_u:6900: yāyo ṣaḍvargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo tā na sannipatanti /
K01bhivin_u:6909: na vayam āgamiṣyāmaḥ ovaditā vayam āryamiśrikehi ṣaḍvargikehi anyavihitakena ovādena /
K01bhivin_u:6910: ahaṃ pi bhagavan vyagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho ti kṛtvā utthāyāsanāto sannirgato /
K01bhivin_u:6914: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
K01bhivin_u:6917: duṣkṛtaṃ vo ṣaḍvargiṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhavanti /
K01bhivin_u:6918: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardha māsaṃ bhikṣusaṃghe ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6922: bhikṣusaṃghe ovadopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6923: atha dāni jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā ghṛtapītikā vā bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6925: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na gacchati gilānā vā chandan na deti pācattikam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:6926: yadā poṣadho bhavati tadā cchandahārikāhi bhikṣuvihāraṅ gatvā vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6927: samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagrasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pādāṃ cchirasā vandati poṣadhañ ca pratīcchati avavādaṃ ca yācati evaṃ trikkhatto yācitavyaṃ
K01bhivin_u:6928: yadi tāvat kocid bhikṣuṇīovādako bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6930: atha na kocid bhavati yo taṃhi aṅgopeto bhavati so saṃmanyitavyo /
K01bhivin_u:6932: nāsti bhaginīyo bhikṣuṇīovādako apramādena saṃpādetha āpattiñ ca poṣadhaṃ pratijāgratha sagauravā ca bhavatha sthavirehi bhikṣūhi madhyehi navakehīti
K01bhivin_u:6934: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardhamāsaṃ viśuddhipoṣadhaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:6938: jetāye bhikṣuṇīye saṃbādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam utpannaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6945: so dāni pāṭayitvā dhovāyitvā upanāhayitvā gato /
K01bhivin_u:6947: tāhi dāni so pradeśo dṛṣṭo pūyamrakṣito /
K01bhivin_u:6953: sāhasam āryāya kṛtaṃ saṃbādhe pradeśe śastrakarma kārayantīya /
K01bhivin_u:6954: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ / pe /
K01bhivin_u:6957: evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ upari jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ śastrakarma kārāpayasi /
K01bhivin_u:6960: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam
K01bhivin_u:6961: vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ puruṣeṇa pātāpayed vā dhovāpayed
K01bhivin_u:6966: gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyan ti bhikṣuṇī vaktavyo śastrakarma kārāpayiṣyan ti /
K01bhivin_u:6967: anavalokayitvā saṃghā ti saṃghamadhye avalokanā kartavyā /
K01bhivin_u:6968: śṛṇotu me āryā saṃgho yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī śastrakarma kārāpeya /
K01bhivin_u:6969: kārāpayiṣyati āryā saṃgho itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī śastrakarma /
K01bhivin_u:6970: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
K01bhivin_u:6971: puruṣeṇeti gṛhasthena vā pravrajitena vā pāṭāpayed vā dhovāpayed vā upanāhāpeya vā ti yathā jetā bhikṣuṇīti pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6972: atha dāni saṃbādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā bhavati antevāsinīye vā samānopādhyāyinīye vā samānācāryāye vā yasyā viśvāso tāya ākhyātavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6973: kaṇṭakena vā nakhena vā bhedāpayitavyaṃ bhaiṣajyena vā ālimpāpeyatavyaṃ atha dāni
K01bhivin_u:6974: adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām bhavati gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā puruṣeṇa
K01bhivin_u:6975: pāṭāpayati vā dhovāpayati vā upanāhāpayati vā evam śirām vā vedhāpayati nelāṭikam
K01bhivin_u:6976: vā bāhuśirām vā gulphaśirām vā aparāya bhikṣuṇīya ākramitavyā tena bhagavān āha /
K01bhivin_u:6977: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upari jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam
K01bhivin_u:6978: vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ puruṣeṇa pāṭāpayed vā dhovāpayed
K01bhivin_u:6983: atha kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā sāṃghikaṃ vihāraṃ bandhitvā cārikāṃ prakrāntāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6984: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ / pe /
K01bhivin_u:6987: duṣkṛtam te kāli evan nāma tvaṃ varṣopagatānāṃ cārikāṃ prakramasi /
K01bhivin_u:6988: tena hi na kṣamati varṣopagatāya cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6989: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:6990: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā cārikāṃ prakrāmeya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6993: upagatā ti purimikāṃ paścimikām vā varṣopanāmayikāṃ upagatā /
K01bhivin_u:6994: cārikāṃ prakrāmeyā ti anyatra gaccheya grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6995: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ekarātram pi vipravasati pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:6996: atha dāni rājabhayam vā senābhayam vā paracakrabhayam vā jīvitāntarāyo vā brahmacaryāntarāyo vā bhaveya kiñcāpi gacchati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6997: nāsti bhikṣuṇyā avalokanākarma saptāhaṃ vā kiñcāpi bhikuḥ avalokanākarma kṛtvā saptāhaṃ vā adhiṣṭhiheya gacchaty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:6999: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ //3 //
K01bhivin_u:7003: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni śrāvastīyaṃ varṣoṣitāḥ vaiśālīm āgatāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7012: idṛśī ca idṛśī ca evam ārāmaramaṇīyā /
K01bhivin_u:7018: yadi pravrajyā eṣā pravrajyā iyaṃ punar asmākam āryadhītā ihaiva jātā /
K01bhivin_u:7020: naiva kahiñci gacchati kūpamaṇḍūka iva tiṣṭhati aniḥkramā /
K01bhivin_u:7021: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7023: tena hi varṣāvustāyā bhikṣuṇīya cārikā prakramitavyā /
K01bhivin_u:7025: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣāvustā cārikāṃ na prakrameya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7027: varṣoṣiteti vārṣikāṃ trayo māsān cārikāṃ na prakrameyā ti antamasato grāmāntaraṃ pi vā pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7028: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī evaṃ rātraṃ pi prakramati pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7029: atha dāni jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhoti na pratibalā gantuṃ kiñcāpi gacchati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7030: bhikṣur api varṣāvusto cārikāṃ na prakramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:7032: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣāvustā cārikāṃ na prakrameya pācattikaṃ // ṇka //
K01bhivin_u:7036: sthūlanandāya bhikṣuṇīya jetā bhikṣuṇī rājagṛhaṃ gacchamānī nivāritā /
K01bhivin_u:7037: ihāryāya varṣā vasitavyā tāya sā kulehi samvarṇitā /
K01bhivin_u:7038: āryā jetā bhadrikā guṇavatī anubaddhā tā saṃvṛtā ca /
K01bhivin_u:7039: etāya adhikāraṃ karotha sā dāni kulāni upasaṃkramati prāsādikena atikrāntena pratikrāntena
K01bhivin_u:7044: pratyālapanti pratyutthihenti nimantrayanti pātreṇa cīvareṇa glānapratyayabhaiṣajya pariṣkārehi /
K01bhivin_u:7045: sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇi anākalpasaṃpannā anīryāpathasampannā omalinamalinehi cīvarehi
K01bhivin_u:7046: pāṭitavipāṭitehi vaḍḍaḍiṅgarapuṣṭālaṃbehi stanehi vaḍḍhehi sphicakehi uddhatā unnaḍā
K01bhivin_u:7048: te tasyā na gauravaṃ kurvanti na nimantrayanti /
K01bhivin_u:7049: sā dāni tāṃ udvahati kāyena vācā /
K01bhivin_u:7050: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7052: śabdāpayatha nandāṃ sā dāni śabdāpitā tad eva sarvaṃ pṛcchīyatīti yāvad āma bhagavan /
K01bhivin_u:7053: bhagavān āha duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvat /
K01bhivin_u:7054: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm evam uktvā ihārye varṣaṃ vasitavyaṃ ity uktvā paścād udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7056: bhikṣuṇīm evam vade ihārye varṣāṃ vasitavyam iti trayo māsāṃ uktveti nivārayitvā paścād udvaheya vā ti kāyena vā vācā vā svayaṃ udvahati /
K01bhivin_u:7057: udvāhāpeya vā ti pareṇa kāyena vā vācāya pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7059: na kṣamati nivārayitvā paścād udvahituṃ atha bhavati śithilikā vā bāhulikā vā aśikṣākāmā vā kalahakārikā vā paśyati yadīha vaśiṣyati āśrayam utpādayiṣyatīti /
K01bhivin_u:7061: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm udvahati pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7062: śrāmaṇerīm vā śikṣamāṇāṃ vā udvahati vinayātikramaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7063: antamasato gṛhiṇī pi udvahati samvaragāmīvinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:7064: yā puna bhikṣuṇī yevam vaditvā ihārye varṣam vasitavyan ti uktvā paścād udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā pācattikaṃ // tṛ //
K01bhivin_u:7072: tatra ca bhikṣuṇīhi vihāroddeśaḥ śayanāsanoddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7084: sā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍā ti yatra śākhāni praveśayati /
K01bhivin_u:7088: bhadrāyaṇi kin tvayā vihāro kṛto kim vikrīto /
K01bhivin_u:7089: sāṃghiko vihāro kim arthaṃ na praveśayiṣyam /
K01bhivin_u:7091: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7092: yāvat śabdāpayatha kāliṃ sā dāni śabdāpitā /
K01bhivin_u:7097: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ pūrvopagatāṃ paścād āgatvā udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā kāyena vā vācāya vā pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7099: jānantīti svayaṃ vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
K01bhivin_u:7104: vā ti pareṇa kāyeṇa vā vācā vā pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7106: śrāmaṇerīm vā śikṣamāṇām vā udvahati deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:7109: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ pūrvopagatāṃ paścād āgatvā udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā kāyena vā vācā vā pācattikaṃ // phu //
K01bhivin_u:7113: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya uccāramallakaṃ apratyavekṣitvā rathyāyāṃ choritaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7114: tahiṃ dāni aparo brāhmaṇo śīrṣasnāto āhatavastranivastro tāya rathyāya atikramati /
K01bhivin_u:7117: janena copahāsitaṃ brāhmaṇa susnātaḥ suviliptas tvam iti /
K01bhivin_u:7120: itikitikāya dhīte śramaṇike na paśyasi mama śīrṣaṃ vastrāṇi ca viṣṭhena vināśitāni /
K01bhivin_u:7121: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ / pe /
K01bhivin_u:7124: duskṛtan te evan nāma tvam apratyavekṣiya choresi /
K01bhivin_u:7125: tena hi na kṣamati apratyavekṣiya chorayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7126: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
K01bhivin_u:7127: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirokuḍyaṃ uccāram vā prāsrāvam vā kheṭakam vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā apratyavekṣitvā chorayet pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7129: tirokuḍyan ti tiraḥprakāram uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā vastradhovanam vā bhāṇḍadhovanam vā keśān vā nakhān vā /
K01bhivin_u:7134: yadi tāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā rathyā bhavanti ārāmayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7135: atha dāni anākīrṇā bhavanti kiñcāpi chorayaty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7136: taṃ pi dāni na kṣamati aśabdakarṇikāye chorayituṃ api tu acchaṭikā dātavyā ukkāsitavyam vā /
K01bhivin_u:7137: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī naiva pratyavekṣati nāpi acchaṭikāṃ dattvā chorayati pācattikam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:7138: bhikṣur api apratyavekṣya acchaṭikām akṛtvā chorayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:7140: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirokuḍyaṃ uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭaṃ vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā apratyavekṣya choreya pācattikaṃ // grā
K01bhivin_u:7145: rājño dāni prasenajitasya kośalasya pūrvakoṣṭhakaṃ nāma udyānam puṣkiriṇīsampannaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7146: anāvṛtaṃ bhikṣūnāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āvṛtaṃ itarāye janatāye /
K01bhivin_u:7148: ho bhaṇe ārāmika pūrvakoṣṭhakam udyānaṃ siktasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ karehi /
K01bhivin_u:7152: tāyo dāni pratikṛty eva gatvā tahiṃ haritaśādvalopastarāṇāyāṃ pakvakheṭena ca pakvasiṃghāṇakena
K01bhivin_u:7153: ca vināśayitvā padumapatrehi uccārasya puṭakāni bandhitvā puṣkiriṇīyaṃ pravāhayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7154: tāyo dāni divasaṃ tahiṃ kākāvāhāṃ bhañjiya sāyāhnasamaye nagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ rājā dāni prasenajita kośalo aparejjukāto niragato sāntaḥpuro /
K01bhivin_u:7155: tāyo dāni antaḥpurikāyo kathañcid eva samrodhād avamuktā randhanamokṣam iva manyamānāḥ cañcūryante /
K01bhivin_u:7157: kāścid ito ca ito ca dhāvanti avakāśaṃ gṛhṇanti śādvalopastaraṇe paribhrāmanti /
K01bhivin_u:7158: tāsāṃ dāni pakvakheṭena pakvasiṃghāṇakena vastrāṇi vināśitāni /
K01bhivin_u:7161: tāsāṃ bhavati kulaputrakehi śrutaṃ śvo rājā sāntaḥpuro udyānaṃ pravekṣyatīti tehi ete gandhapuṭakāḥ pravāhitā iti kṛtvā tāyo gṛhṇanti /
K01bhivin_u:7162: te udakena klinnā uccāreṇa cā khāditāḥ prakṛtisukumāraṃ ca padmapatraṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7164: hī hī viṣṭhaṃ tā dāni rājño upasaṃkrāntā āhaṃsu /
K01bhivin_u:7165: mahārāja eṣa tāvad īdṛśī avasthā rājā āha śabdāpayatha ārāmikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7168: ho bhaṇe ārāmika kena udyānaṃ viṭṭālitaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7169: āha ṣaḍvargiṇīyo śramaṇīyo eva divasaṃ kākavāhā bhañjitvā gatāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7172: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7173: mahāprajāpatī pi gautamī bhagavato ārocayet / yāvad
K01bhivin_u:7174: yā puna bhikṣuṇī harite tṛṇe uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:7175: yā puna bhikṣuṇī udake uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:7181: harite tṛṇe iti śādvale acchinnālūnasmiṃ udan ti udakāni nāma daśa /
K01bhivin_u:7182: nādikaṃ tāḍāgaṃ audupānikaṃ śvabhrodakaṃ praghārimaṃ vṛṣṭisthitaṃ ucchodakaṃ antarīkṣapānīyaṃ himavilīnaṃ sāmudram vā uccāram vā prasrāvaṃ vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7183: atha dāni prāvṛṣeṇyā se sarvabhumiḥ śādvalopastareṇā bhavati yahiṃ pradeśe svalpaharitam bhavati tahiṃ kartavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7184: atha dāni alpaharitaṃ na bhavati kaṭāhake vā iṣṭakāyam vā upale vā śuṣkatṛṇe vā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍe vā yatra vā anyena uccāro kṛto bhavati balīvardena vā /
K01bhivin_u:7185: yatra vā anyena manuṣyena kṛto tahiṃ kartavyaṃ atha dāni evaṃ na bhavati antamasato kanīyasiṃ pi aṅguliṃ upadrāhayitvā kartavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7186: tathā kartavyaṃ yathā tahim prathamam nipatati /
K01bhivin_u:7187: atha dāni caṅkramati na kṣamati haritaśādvale śleṣmaṃ chorayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7188: atha khu kaṭe vā patrapuṭikāyāṃ vā chorayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7190: yā puna bhikṣuṇī harite tṛṇe uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7191: yā puna bhikṣuṇī udake uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ //
K01bhivin_u:7197: prajāpati detha cchandakaṃ āryamiśrikāṇāṃ bhaktaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7199: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ āryā yaṃ divasaṃ saṃghabhaktaṃ kariṣyatha tadāsmākam api ārocayetha /
K01bhivin_u:7202: āyuṣmanto śāriputramaudgalyāyanau aniruddho revataḥ kapphiṇo śroṇakoṭīviṃśa upavāno āyuṣmān rāhulo ṣaḍvargikāś ca /
K01bhivin_u:7205: tahiṃ dāni bhikṣū kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā ca praviṣṭāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7206: tato āyuṣmato śāriputrasya dātuṃ śālināmodanaṃ mudgānāṃ sūpo ghṛtaṃ dadhi ca /
K01bhivin_u:7207: āyuṣmato maudgalyāyanasya yavakodano māṣasūpo tailaṃ ca /
K01bhivin_u:7210: apareṣāṃ vyañjanāni dinnāni odano na dīyate /
K01bhivin_u:7211: apareṣāṃ śākaṃ dinnaṃ odano na dīyate /
K01bhivin_u:7214: tā dāni striyo bhakṣyabhojyam ādāya gatāḥ pṛcchanti /
K01bhivin_u:7216: tāyo dāni sthavirān bhikṣūn āvaritvā ṣaḍvargikān darśenti /
K01bhivin_u:7217: tatas teṣān dīyate śālinā modanaṃ mudgānāṃ sūpo ghṛtaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7218: navanītaṃ ambu madhurāṇi gauḍan dadhi śvetaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ samitāsamitaṃ yasyārthaṃ yāv arthaṃ dīyati /
K01bhivin_u:7219: yat kiñcit praṇītasammataṃ bhakṣyabhojyaṃ peyaṃ coṣmaṃ taṃ ṣaḍvargikāṇān dāpayanti /
K01bhivin_u:7220: ime te āryamiśrikāḥ bhikṣū pi bhuktavibhuktakāḥ utthāyotthāya bhagavataḥ pādavandā upasaṃkrāntā /
K01bhivin_u:7222: api tu śāriputra śobhane māsi mṛṣṭam vā praṇītam vā prabhūtam vā /
K01bhivin_u:7228: labdho bhagavan śālināmodanaṃ mudgānāṃ sūpo navanītaṃ ambu madhurāṇi vyañjanani gauḍan
K01bhivin_u:7229: dadhi kṣīraṃ yasyārthaṃ yāvad arthaṃ dīyati yathāpīdaṃ bhaginīnāṃ śraddhāprasannānāṃ parigrahe /
K01bhivin_u:7237: durbhuktaṃ te śāriputra evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viheṭhayantaṃ adhyupekṣasi /
K01bhivin_u:7238: yasya bhagavān durbhuktam ity āha tasya taṃ kalpam vā kalpāvaśeṣam vā tiṣṭheya naiva jarā gaccheya /
K01bhivin_u:7239: sthavireṇa kākapoṭaṃ dattvā sarva daradarāya vāntaṃ /
