K01bhivin_u:7771: tāye aśucir āgato yathā udakadhārāya yāvat /
K01bhivin_u:7772: tena hi na kṣamati udakasrote aṅgajātaṃ dhārayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7774: yā dāni tāyo bhavanti girinadīyo śīghrasrotāyo tahiṃ aṅgajātaṃ dhāreti tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accyam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:7775: atha dāni snāyati na kṣamati agratomukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyituṃ pṛṣṭhatomukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7776: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agratomukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:7782: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo nānāprakārehi mocayanti mūlakena palāṇḍūkebukāye sobhañjanakena latikāya /
K01bhivin_u:7785: tena hi na kṣamati vikṛtīhi mocayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7787: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī mūlakena vā palāṇḍūya vā kebukāya vā sobhañjanakena vā latikāya vā
K01bhivin_u:7788: illādukāya vā trapusena vā allābūya vā kakṣārukena vā anyena vā puna kenacin mocayati
K01bhivin_u:7789: tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:7794: aparasya dāni bhikṣusya utkṣepanīyaṃ karma kriyate /
K01bhivin_u:7798: kin nu khalu labhyā etaṃ kartuṃ utāho na labhyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7803: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣusya karma kartuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7804: karmapratisaṃyuktaṃ na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣusya karma kartuṃ (/ ) /
K01bhivin_u:7805: atha dāni na kocit parikuśalo karmakārako bhavati labhyaṃ bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣusya uddeśituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7806: atha dāni karmakarentasya vismarati labhyā bhikṣuṇīya anupradātuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7807: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣusya karma karoti vinayātikramaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7808: kiñcāpi bhikṣuḥ bhikṣuṇīye karma karoti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7813: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī kauśeyacīvareṇa prāvṛtā jñātikulaṃ gacchati sthūlavṛṣito devo
K01bhivin_u:7814: ovṛṣṭo kauśeyacīvaramovṛṣṭaṃ kāyeśliṣṭaṃ sphaṭikapratyuṣṭo viya kāyodṛśyati jano
K01bhivin_u:7816: sā dāni utkuṭukā upaviṣṭā antevāsinīhi parivṛtā /
K01bhivin_u:7825: karttimaṃ prāvarati samvaragāmīvinayātikramaḥ kiñcāpi bhikṣur ubhayaṃ prāvarati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7830: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī vihārasyākāśatalake ekasaṃkakṣikāya caṅkramati /
K01bhivin_u:7833: janena uccagghāyati paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā alābutumbakena viya nadīṃ taratīti /
K01bhivin_u:7839: saṃkakṣikāye upariṭo osārayitavyo yathā gaṇḍā praticchannā bhaveṃsuḥ sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī gaṇḍapraticchādanaṃ paṭaṃ na prāvarati vinayātikramam āsādayati
K01bhivin_u:7840: na dāni kṣamati prākaṭe pradeśe ekasaṃkakṣikāya āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:7841: na dāni kṣamati prākate pradeśe ekasaṃkakṣikāya caṅkramituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7842: atha dāni vihārasya gupte pradeśe caṅkramati ekasaṃkakṣikāya anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7849: yā dāni kumāriyo vuhyanti navavadhukāyo vā ānīyanti tāyo alaṅkarenti gṛheṇa gṛhan nīyanti /
K01bhivin_u:7850: alaṅkarituṃ khajjabhojjaṃ labhanti tena vṛttiṃ kalpenti /
K01bhivin_u:7857: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī śīrṣam vā prasādheti akṣiṇī vā añjeti cūrṇakena vā mukhaṃ ocūrṇeti tena ca jīvikāṃ kalpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:7858: atha dāni akṣiṇīduḥkham ti śirovedanā vā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:7859: ardhāvabhedakā vā labhyā akṣiṇī añjayituṃ śīrṣam vā mārjayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7864: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mallakanyāyo mahākula pravrajitāyo utpalāni vāpenti vikrīṇanti ca /
K01bhivin_u:7870: tena hi na kṣamati utpalāni vāpayituṃ utpalavāpakapratisamyuktaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7871: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī vāpeti vikrīṇāti ca tena ca jīvikāṃ kalpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:7872: atha dāni caityārthāya vāpeti bhagavataḥ pūjākarmāya vāpeti anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7877: evam eva sumanāvāpanāya kartavyaṃ yāvat idam ucyate sumanāvāpanāpratisaṃyuktaṃ //grā //
K01bhivin_u:7883: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mallakanyāyo licchavikanyāyo utpalāni granthayitvā vikrīṇanti /
K01bhivin_u:7890: tena hi na kṣamati utpalāni granthayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7892: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī utpaladāmām vāmallikādāmām vā āraṅgaṇadāmām vā kṛtvā vikrīṇanti /
K01bhivin_u:7894: atha dāni mālyopahāro bhavati jātimahā vā bodhimahā vā dharmacakramahā vā ānandamahā vā rāhulamahā vā pañcavārṣikā vā /
K01bhivin_u:7898: kiñcāpi bhikṣuṇī mutpalamālām vā mallikāmālām vā āraṅgaṇamālām vā granthayaty anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7902: evam eva sumanāgranthikāya nānākaraṇaṃ granthiguṇaṃ vā mālāguṇam vā puṣpakañcukam vā kṛtvā vikrīṇāti /
K01bhivin_u:7908: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiyakanyāyo yāvan mahākulapravrajitāyo saṃjñikāḥ sūtraṃ kartayitvā vikrīṇanti /
K01bhivin_u:7916: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī kambalam vā karpāsam vā kṣaumam vā kauśeyam vā śāṇam vā bhaṅgam vā anyam vā kartayitvā vikrīṇāti tena jīvikāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:7917: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ pariśrāmaṇaṃ vā kṣīnaṃ vā bhavati labhyaṃ sī
K01bhivin_u:7928: vayaṃ te rakṣiṣyāmaḥ sā dān āha gamiṣyāmi āryāye mūlaṃ āryā me rakṣiṣyati /
K01bhivin_u:7929: tāhi tāye nūpurāṇi ābaddhāni karṇikā ābaddhā valayāni āviddhāni alaṅkṛtā rakṣoparaktehi vastrehi parihitā vāvāguṇṭhitā ca /
K01bhivin_u:7931: so dāni manuṣyo tān dvāre sthitvā avaloketi /
K01bhivin_u:7932: yāṃ velāṃ niṣkramiṣyati tato haṃ gṛhṇīṣyāmīti /
K01bhivin_u:7936: sā dāni bhikṣuṇī upāśrayaṃ gatā bhikṣuṇīhi dṛṣṭā /
K01bhivin_u:7940: nāhaṃ pratyodhāvitā api tu mama devaro pratyodhāvayitukāmo /
K01bhivin_u:7946: evañ ca nāma tvaṃ ācāraṃ vikopayasi /
K01bhivin_u:7947: tena hi na kṣamati ācāraṃ vikopayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7948: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī tyaktamuktena cittena ācāraṃ vikopayati abhikṣuṇī bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:7951: bhikṣur api atyaktamuktena cittena rakṣārthaṃ ācāraṃ vikopayati anāpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:7957: sā dāni aparaṃ mahāntaṃ kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭā /
K01bhivin_u:7967: āryāya ahaṃ ettakaṃ caittakaṃ ca dāsye /
K01bhivin_u:7973: yā prathamā bhikṣā lakṣati tāṃ bhikṣusya vā bhikṣuṇīye vā pratiṣṭhāye ti /
K01bhivin_u:7981: tāya dāni bhītāya tharatharāpantīya pātraṃ praṇāmitaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7985: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ āyuṣmān mahākaśyapo bhikṣuṇām ārocayati /
K01bhivin_u:7993: duṣkṛtan te nande naiṣa dharmo naiṣa vinayo yāvat /
K01bhivin_u:7994: evañ ca nāma tvaṃ pātraṃ praticchādesi /
K01bhivin_u:7995: tena hi na kṣamati pātraṃ praticchādayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7997: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya prākaṭena pātreṇa piṇḍāya aṭituṃ praticchādayitvā aṭitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7998: yadā bhikṣāṃ praticchati tadā ugghāṭiya praticchitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:7999: yadi bhikṣuṃ rathyāyāṃ paśyati ugghāṭiya upadarśayitavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8000: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī prākaṭena pātreṇa aṭati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:8001: bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā na ugghāṭiya darśeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:8006: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo onaddhavarce varcakuṭīye upaviśanti /
K01bhivin_u:8010: te taṃ dārakaṃ ekāyāṃ bāhāyāṃ gṛhītvā ojjhāyanti /
K01bhivin_u:8014: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati onaddhavarce upaviśituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8016: na dāni kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya onaddhavarcakuṭiṃ kārāpayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8020: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī onaddhavarcakuṭīyaṃ āgatodakāyam vā upaviśati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:8025: tāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya śākiyakanyāyo licchavikanyāyo mallakanyāyo jentāke snāyanti /
K01bhivin_u:8029: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye jentāke snāyituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8030: atha dāni gilānā bhavati labhyā vihāre svedayitvā tailena aṅgāni mrakṣayitvā snāyituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8031: sā esā bhikṣuṇī jentāke snāyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:8036: tena kālena tena samayena bhikṣuṇīnām āraṅyakāni śayanāsanāni na pratikṣiptāni grāmāntikāni ca akṛtāni /
K01bhivin_u:8037: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuṇīśatāni mahāprajāpatīpramukhāni rājakārāme viharanti /
K01bhivin_u:8038: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo licchavikanyāyo kolitakanyāyo prāsādikāyo darśanīyāyo /
K01bhivin_u:8044: tāyo puno madhyamayāmaṃ evam paścimaṃ yāmaṃ prahāṇam upaviṣṭāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8047: yāhi ca middham anokrāntaṃ tāḥ sratti vaihāyasam abhyudgatāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8048: yāvanta samāpattikā yāhi ca middham avakrāntaṃ tāyo kulaputrakehi gṛhya viheṭhitāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8051: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati āraṇyake śayanāsane vastuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8052: atha dāni cātuṣpathikā sarvarātrikā bhavati upāsakopāsikā gacchanti labhyaṃ vastuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8053: tahiṃ pi na kṣamati pratigupte pradeśe vastuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8054: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī āraṇyake śayanāsane vāsaṃ upagacchati varṣam vā vasati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:8058: 288. yo bhikṣūṇām āstāro anāstāro so bhikṣuṇīnāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8059: yo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āstāro anāstāro so bhikṣūṇāṃ // grā //
K01bhivin_u:8061: yo bhikṣūṇām uddhāro anuddhāro so bhikṣuṇīnāṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8063: yo bhikṣuṇīnām uddhāro anuddhāro so bhikṣūṇāṃ // 0 //
K01bhivin_u:8065: yo bhikṣūṇām abhihāro anabhihāro so bhikṣuṇīnāṃ // ḷ //
K01bhivin_u:8066: yo bhikṣuṇīnām abhihāro anabhihāro so bhikṣūnāṃ // ḷ //
K01bhivin_u:8072: yaṃ bhikṣuṇīnām āmiṣaṃ akalpiyaṃ kalpiyaṃ tam bhikṣūṇāṃ // 2 //
K01bhivin_u:8074: labhyaṃ bhikṣusya bhikṣuṇīya pratigrahayituṃ sthāpayitvā jatarūparajataṃ agnikalpiyañ ca // 3 //
K01bhivin_u:8075: labhyaṃ bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣūṇā pratigrāhāpayituṃ sthāpayitvā jātarūpaṃ rajataṃ agnikalpiyañ ca // ṇka //
K01bhivin_u:8084: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīnām ekapiṭake eke pi vicāre vastuṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8086: yadāsya bhūyo bhikṣu liṅgaṃ prādurbhavati tadā bhikṣuvihāram āgantavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8087: sā evāsyopasampadā tad eva varṣāgraṃ // tṛ //
K01bhivin_u:8103: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī piṇḍacāram anvaṇṭī taṃhi praviṣṭā /
K01bhivin_u:8106: imam ārye niṣkrāmetu yadi jīvantīyo mucciṣyāmo asmākaṃ bhaviṣyati āryāye vṛttiṃ dāsyāmo āryāye etaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K01bhivin_u:8107: tāya tasyāḥ pātraṃ upanāmitaṃ imaṃhi dehīti /
K01bhivin_u:8108: nānākārāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ pātraṃ pūrayitvā dinnaṃ muktāyāḥ maṇīnāṃ sphoṭikasya musāragalvasya lohikāyāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8110: bhaṭehi ca dṛṣṭā te dān āhaṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8115: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8121: tena hi na kṣamati ratanaṃ praticchādayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8123: etaṃ dāni mahāntaṃ kulaṃ rājakule nophatam bhavati yāvan na lekhyaṃ kṛtam bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:8126: atha dāni lekhyaṃ kṛtam bhavati rakṣā vā kṛtā bhavati bhaṭehi parivāritam bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:8128: imaṃ gṛhaṃ rājakulenopahataṃ yadi tāvaj jīvantīyo mucyāmaḥ asmākaṃ bhaviṣyati āryāyā eva bhaviṣyatīti na kṣamati niṣkāsayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8130: bhagavatā śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ na kṣamati niṣkāsayituṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8132: caityasya demaḥ saṃghasya vā demaḥ āryāye eva demo ti gṛhṇītavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8135: atha pṛcchīyati kasyedan ti caityasya saṃghasya mameti /
K01bhivin_u:8138: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ratanapūrṇapātraṃ praticchādeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
K01bhivin_u:8143: nadīye ajirāvatīye pāre ubhayato sāṃghikaṃ bhaktaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8149: na kṣamati bhikṣusya bhikṣuṇīya saha ekanāvām abhiruhituṃ ti /
K01bhivin_u:8151: ekabhikṣuṇāpi nāvā paliguddhā bhavati dvihi trihi evaṃ paliguddhā bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:8152: yadā te bhikṣū uttaritāḥ tadā bhikṣuṇīyo ekanāvāparipūrakena tāritāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8154: atha kho mahāprajāpatī gautamī sāyāhnasamaye parikilantehi mahābhūtehi bhagavato pādavandīkāṃ upasaṃkrāntā /
K01bhivin_u:8157: atha mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato tad eva sarvam āroceti /
K01bhivin_u:8159: tena hi aṣṭāhi bhikṣuṇīhi yathāvṛddhikāya upaveṣṭavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8161: ete dāni bhavanti bhaktā vā tarpaṇā vā yavāgupānā vā paraṃ vārṣikā vā mahāpañcavārṣikā vā aṣṭānāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āsanāni sthāpayitavyāni yathāvṛddhikāya
K01bhivin_u:8162: aṣṭa vā nirmuṣṭikā hastāḥ pratikṛty' eva gantavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8163: tā etā bhikṣuṇīyo aṣṭānām āsanāni sthāpayitvā niṣīdanti vinayātikramam āsādayanti /
K01bhivin_u:8165: aṣṭābhir bhikṣuṇībhir yathāvṛddhikāya upaveṣṭavyam u śiṣṭābhi yathāgatikāya // 0 //
K01bhivin_u:8178: sarve anye nava padā anūnā pratiṣitavyā puna tahiṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8183: yatrāsi yānaṃ phalavikṛtiṃ nirdiśet tahiṃ vijñaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8184: yatrāsi sahaniṣadyā ekorttakaṃ tahiṃ samādiśet chatraṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8186: yatrāsi śastrakarma nirdiśet tahiṃ and āpattiḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8187: yatrāsi viśokadarśanaṃ āpattipratikarma tatra nirdiśed vijñaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8188: etāvatā uddhārāḥ prakīrṇake ye ca ovṛṣāḥ vargaṃ samuddhariya dvādaśamaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8189: nava padāni punar eva bhikṣuṇīnāṃ prakīrṇake sarvaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhikṣuprakīrṇakato vargās trayodaśa kāryāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8190: anye ca pañca vargāyutakā yathā bhikṣuṇīsūtre /
K01bhivin_u:8192: jentākaṃ varca kaṭhinaṃ uddharitvā avaśeṣā tathaiva kāryāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8194: taṃ sarvaṃ saṅkale puna vargā aṣṭādaśa prakīrṇake svayaṃbhunā nirdiṣṭā /
K01bhivin_u:8196: pañcaśatāni anūnāni apare ca padā catustriṃśat /
K01bhivin_u:8379: 'phagspa dge 'dunphalchen pai 'jig rtenlas 'dasparsmrabai dge sloṅgi 'dulba silbu rdzogsso //
K01bhivin_u:8389: kahiṃ dāni saṃgho śīlavān guṇavān bhadrako śikṣākāmo vaktavyaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8392: kahiṃ dāni abhiyuktā bhikṣubhikṣuṇīyo vā kriyāyāṃ vā /
K01bhivin_u:8393: khaṇḍapralugge vā uddeśe svādhyāye yoge manasikāre kahiṃ vā śīghraṃ parisamāpyet /
K01bhivin_u:8396: amukaṃhi bhikṣū vā bhikṣuṇīyo vā abhiyuktā ity ādi /
K01bhivin_u:8397: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ ātmano pariṇāmayen niḥsargika /
K01bhivin_u:8402: bhikṣur api gaṇalābhaṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayati vinayātikramaḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8404: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī gaṇalābhaṃ pariṇataṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayet pācattikaṃ // lṛ //
K01bhivin_u:8413: vargāvaśeṣāḥ deśanā ca vihāro ca bhikṣuṇīnāñ ca ye daśa praṇītasammatam mātraṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8414: yāvat vāsādanā iha chadanā sahaśayyā ca /
K01bhivin_u:8417: araṇyāyāṃ ca śāṭikā dvāviṃśati śuddhekehi uddhārā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pravuccati /
K01bhivin_u:8418: deśanām uddharitvāna saṃcintyaṃ samodahe puno cātra //
K01bhivin_u:8419: atha puno vihāraṃ uddhariya bhaṇeya ko kuccaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8421: apanetvā samodahe cīvaraṃ puno tatra vijñaptim uddharitvāna aparihatā catu nirdiṣṭā /
K01bhivin_u:8424: tatra chādanā uddharitvāna udakahāsyaṃ ca nirdiṣṭaṃ /
K01bhivin_u:8427: samoho puno bhavati tatra eva tāvatā ca /
K01bhivin_u:8432: yate te bhūṣāḥ purimā ca sapta vargāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8435: yutaṃ yan bhikṣuṇīsūtre taṃ sarvam saṃkaletvāna śataṃ bhavati /
K01bhivin_u:8437: uddiṣṭā āryamiśrikāyo ekacattālaṃ śataṃ śuddhapācattikā dharmāḥ /
K01bhivin_u:8442: yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi // ḥ //
K01bhivin_u:8444: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantreti /
K01bhivin_u:8445: ekam idaṃ gautami samayaṃ tathāgato ihaiva śrāvastīyaṃ viharati /
